31a5(nyi khri): 'byor 'di snyam du sems par gyur te 'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na'ang yod par ma mthong ste/ma
31a6(nyi khri): tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o//'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin/chu las skyes pa ma yin/thang las skyes pa ma yin no//
31a7(nyi khri): 'di ltar lha'i bu dag gis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste/me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam pa dang /de nas lho'i dbang po brgya byin
31b1(nyi khri): gyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'ang skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor ma tog 'di dag ni ma byung ba ste/me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ma yin no//ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam mo//
31b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de skad du me tog 'di dag ma byung ma skyes pa ste/me tog 'di dag yid las byung ba ma yin/ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no zhes zer ba ni/kau shi ka de ltar ma skyes
31b3(nyi khri): pa ni me tog kyang ma yin no//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma byung bar zad dam/'on tam gzugs kyang ma byung /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byeng
31b4(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa'ang ma byung ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka me tog 'di dag nyi tshe ma drung bar ma zad kyi/kau shi ka gzugs kyang ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni gzugs
31b5(nyi khri): ma yin no//kau shi ka tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'odu byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka mig ni ma byung ba
31b6(nyi khri): ste/gang ma byung ba de ni mig ma yin no//kau shi ka rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang lus dang /yid ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni yid ma yin no//kau shi ka gzugs ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma
31b7(nyi khri): byung ba de ni gzugs ma yin no//kau shi kas+tha dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang chos ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni chos ma yin no//kau shi ka mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mabyung ba
32a1(nyi khri): ste/gang ma byung ba de ni mig go rnam par shes pa ma yin na// sh+lo kA rU ba'i rnam par shos pa dang /sna rnam par shos pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /
32a2(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin no//kau shi ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma
32a3(nyi khri): byung ba de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no//kau shi kAn ba'i 'dus te rig pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te rig pa dang /yid kyi
32a4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te rig pa ma yin no//kau shA ka mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni mig
32a5(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi kurna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dang /lho'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
32a6(nyi khri): bya'i tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
32a7(nyi khri): tshor ba ma yin no//kau shi ka sa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sa'i khams ma yin no//kau shi ka chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i
32b1(nyi khri): khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no//kau shi ka ma rig pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni ma rig pa ma yin no//kau
32b2(nyi khri): shi ka 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /skyed pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang skye ba dang /rga shi ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba
32b3(nyi khri): de ni rga shi ma yin no//kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shI ka tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
32b4(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni shes
32b5(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//kau shI ka nang stong pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin no//kau shi ka dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ma byung
32b6(nyi khri): ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no//kau shi ka dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma
32b7(nyi khri): yin no//kau shi ka yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ma byung ba ste/
33a1(nyi khri): gang ma byung ba de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no//kau shi ka 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /chang med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
33a2(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
33a3(nyi khri): dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po
33a4(nyi khri): dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no//kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
33a5(nyi khri): 'bras bu ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma yin no//kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa
33a6(nyi khri): nyid dang /rang byang chub ni ma byung bya ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rang byang chub ma yin no//kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mya byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rnam pa thams
33a7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rgyun tu zhugs pa ma yin no//kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi
33b1(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni dgra bcom pa ma yin no//ka shi ka rlung sangs rgyas ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni rang sangs rgyas ma yin no//kau shi ka
33b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma byung ba ste/gang ma byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa
33b3(nyi khri): ma yin no//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/kye ma gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ltar btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/chos nyid kyang ston pa ni/shes rab
33b4(nyi khri): zab bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/de de bzhin no//kau shi ka de de bzhin te/gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan
33b5(nyi khri): pa ste/de ltar btags pa dang yang mi 'gal la/chos nyid kyang ston to//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di
33b6(nyi khri): btags pa dang yang mi 'gal/chos nyid kyang ston pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi
33b7(nyi khri): ka gzugs ni btags pa tsam mo//btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to//kau shi ka tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du
34a1(nyi khri): byed dang /rnam par shes pa na btags pa tsam mo//btags pa tsam gang min pa dan chos nyid de/do na gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to//kau shi ka n+ya
34a2(nyi khri): phyir zhen/chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal rnam par mi 'bral lo//gang mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal ba de ni gnas bton rab 'byor gyis bstan ti 'gal ba med do//
34a3(nyi khri): skye mched dang //khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni btags pa tsam mo//btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to//
34a4(nyi khri): kau shI ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mo 'gal rnam par mi 'gal lo//gang mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal ba de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba mang ngo //
34a5(nyi khri): kau shi ka sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
34a6(nyi khri): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong brnams dang /
34a7(nyi khri): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa
34b1(nyi khri): rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
34b2(nyi khri): pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de
34b3(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni btags pa tsam mo//btags
34b4(nyi khri): pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to//kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal rnam par
34b5(nyi khri): mi 'gal lo//gang mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal ba de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba med do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
34b6(nyi khri): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub ni btags pa tsam mo//btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis
34b7(nyi khri): mi 'gal bar bstan to//kau shi ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni btags pa tsam mo//btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal
35a1(nyi khri): par bstan to//kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa ni btags pa tsam mo//btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to//
35a2(nyi khri): kau shi ka lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems dpa' dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni btags pa tsam mo//
35a3(nyi khri): btags pa tsam gang yin pa de ni chos nyid de/de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis mi 'gal bar bstan to//kau shi ka de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni mi 'gal
35a4(nyi khri): rnam par mi 'gal lo//gang mi 'gal rnam par mi 'gal ba de ni gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis bstan te 'gal ba med do//kau shi ka de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni btags pa dang yang
35a5(nyi khri): 'gal bar mi byed la chos nyid kyang ston to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/bcom ldan 'das
35a6(nyi khri): kyis kyang chos thams cad ni btags pa tsam du bstan to//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar chos thams cad btags pa tsam du rig par bya ste/shes rab
35a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni gzugs la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya
35b1(nyi khri): ba'i gzugs de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam par
35b2(nyi khri): shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni mig la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i mig de
35b3(nyi khri): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rna ba dang /sna dang lce dang /lus dang yid la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
35b4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni gzugs la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i gzugs de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //sku dang
35b5(nyi khri): dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan
35b6(nyi khri): po de ltar slob pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rna ba'i
35b7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar
36a1(nyi khri): des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa
36a2(nyi khri): la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /
36a3(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de yang dag
36a4(nyi khri): par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la
36a5(nyi khri): bslab par bya ba'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
36a6(nyi khri): dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di
36a7(nyi khri): ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa
36b1(nyi khri): nisa'i khams la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sa'i khams de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //chu dang me dang /rlung dang /nam mkha' dang /rnam par shes
36b2(nyi khri): pa'i khams la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
36b3(nyi khri): chen po de ltar slob pa ni ma rig pa la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nges gang la bslab par bya ba'i ma rig pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'du byed dang /rnam par shes
36b4(nyi khri): pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar
36b5(nyi khri): des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rga shi de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob ste/
36b6(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
36b7(nyi khri): dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab
37a1(nyi khri): par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher ba daltar sgrub pa ni/nang stong pa nyidas sa
37a2(nyi khri): slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nges gang la bslab par bya ba'i nang stong pa nyid de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi slob ste/
37a3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nges gang la bslab par bya ba'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
37a4(nyi khri): chen po de ltar slob pa ni/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhog pa de dag yang dag par rjes su myi
37a5(nyi khri): mthong ngo //yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi slob
37a6(nyi khri): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam
37a7(nyi khri): gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgra
37b1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so
37b2(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag yang
37b3(nyi khri): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub nyid la mi
37b4(nyi khri): slob/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mi slob/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi slob ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar des gang la bslab par bya ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
37b5(nyi khri): de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
37b6(nyi khri): po/ci'i phyir na/gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ci'i phyir na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ci'i
37b7(nyi khri): phyir na skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ci'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang
38a1(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /ci'i phyir na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs meng pa'i snyoms
38a2(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes
38a3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs
38a4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de
38a5(nyi khri): ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //tshor ba tshor bas stong ngo //'du shes 'du shes kyis stong ngo //'du byed 'du byed kyis stong ngo //rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas
38a6(nyi khri): stong ngo //skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas stong ngo //pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi
38a7(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /
38b1(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin
38b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar rnam
38b3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //kau shi ka gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su
38b4(nyi khri): mi mthong ngo //'du shes stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //'du byed stong pa nyid kyis 'du byang stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam par
38b5(nyi khri): shes pa stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi
38b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //kau shi ka de ltar gang stong pa nyid 'di la slob pa de ni gnyis su med pas stong pa nyid la slob pa ste/de gnyis su byar med par gzugs stong pa nyid la slob bo//
38b7(nyi khri): de gnyis su byar med par tshor ba stong pa nyid dang /'du shes stong pa nyid dang /'du byed stong pa nyid dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la slob bo//de gnyis su byar med par skye mched dang /khams
39a1(nyi khri): dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa nyid la slob po//de gnyis su byar med par pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
39a2(nyi khri): rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
39a3(nyi khri): bApA dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so /
39a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa nyid la slob bo//kau shi ka gzugs stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med
39a5(nyi khri): par slob pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar stong pa
39a6(nyi khri): nyid la gang gnyis su byar med par slob pa de ni/gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//de gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
39a7(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//de ni gnyis su byar med par
39b1(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid la slob bo//dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la slob bo//de ni gnyis su byar med par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la slob bo//de ni gnyis su byar med par yang dag par
39b2(nyi khri): spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob bo//de ni gnyis su byar med par 'phags pa'i bden pa
39b3(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
39b4(nyi khri): med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig
39b5(nyi khri): pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la slob bo//de ni gnyis su byar med par rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
39b6(nyi khri): dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /sangs rgyas nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob po//gnyis su byar med par sbyin pa'i pha rol
39b7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan
40a1(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par nang stong pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par dngos po
40a2(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bor la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par 'phags pa'i lam yan
40a3(nyi khri): lag brgyad pa'i bar la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
40a4(nyi khri): 'bras bu la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byung med par dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par rang byang chub la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med
40a5(nyi khri): par lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gang slob pa dang /gnyis su byar med par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
40a6(nyi khri): kyi bar la gang slob pa de ni/gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la slob bo//gnyis su byar med par sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa la gang slob pa de ni/
40a7(nyi khri): gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob
40b1(nyi khri): po//skye mched dang /khams 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel
40b2(nyi khri): bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
40b3(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
40b4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
40b5(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir
40b6(nyi khri): mi slob bo//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshod med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar
40b7(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo
41a1(nyi khri): rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
41a2(nyi khri): 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//de ltar gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba
41a3(nyi khri): dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
41a4(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni/gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
41a5(nyi khri): par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob
41a6(nyi khri): go//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /
41a7(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /
41b1(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
41b2(nyi khri): rnams yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yongs su gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo///
41b3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po sum cu pa//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
41b4(nyi khri): de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /ming par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang //
41b5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin nam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa
41b6(nyi khri): yin nam/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir
41b7(nyi khri): mi slob bo//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su
42a1(nyi khri): gzung ba dang med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo//smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci'i phyir na gzugs yongs su gzung ba dang /med
42a2(nyi khri): par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/ci'i phyir na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/ci'i phyir na rnam
42a3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su gzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar gzugs la yongs su
42a4(nyi khri): 'dzin pa med de/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin to//de ni 'di ltar tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin pa
42a5(nyi khri): med de/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa yongs su mi 'dzin to//de ni 'di ltar skye mched dang /khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su 'dzin
42a6(nyi khri): pa med de/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su mi 'dzin to//de ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad
42a7(nyi khri): dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
42b1(nyi khri): dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting //
42b2(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
42b3(nyi khri): rnams yongs su 'dzin pa med de/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yongs su mi 'dzin to//de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams
42b4(nyi khri): cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa med de/phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su mi 'dzin to//tshe dang ldan pa
42b5(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu da ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //smras pa tshe dang ldan pa
42b6(nyi khri): rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba yin nam/rab 'byor gyis
42b7(nyi khri): smras po/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /chos thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa
43a1(nyi khri): med pa'i tshul gyis/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams/
43a2(nyi khri): cad yongs su bzung ba dang /med par bya ba'i phyir bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la
43a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs kyi skye ba mi mthong /'gag pa dang /blang ba dang dor ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs
43a4(nyi khri): pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /sogs pa dang /'bri ba dang 'grib pa dang /'phel ba mi mthong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis med cing mi
43a5(nyi khri): dmigs so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi mthong 'gag pa dang /blang ba dang /dor ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba
43a6(nyi khri): dang /sogs pa dang /'dri ba dang /'grib pa dang /'phel ba mi mthong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis med cing mi
43a7(nyi khri): dmigs so//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
43b1(nyi khri): rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong
43b2(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang
43b3(nyi khri): dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi mthong /'gag pa dang /blang ba dang /dor ba dang /kun nas nyon mongs
43b4(nyi khri): pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /sogs pa dang /'bri ba dang 'grib pa dang /'phel ba mi mthong ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad
43b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis med cing mi dmigs so//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa
43b6(nyi khri): med pa dang /blang ba med pa dang /dor ba med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byung ba med pa dang /sogs pa med pa dang /'bri ba med pa dang /'grib pa med pa dang /
43b7(nyi khri): 'phel ba med pa'i phyir mi slob/mi 'byung ba'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis//
44a1(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas
44a2(nyi khri): btsal bar bya/shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/lha'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o//
44a3(nyi khri): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor 'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
44a4(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o zhes smras te/de ni khyod kyi mthu'o//khyod kyi byin gyi rlabs so//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau
44a5(nyi khri): shi ka 'di ni bdag gi mthu ma yin/'di ni bdag gi byin gyi rlabs ma yin no//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor 'o na de su'i mthu/de su'i byin gyi rlabs/rab 'byor gyis
44a6(nyi khri): smras pa/kau shi ka de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad byin gyi rlabs
44a7(nyi khri): med na/ci'i phyir de skad du/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o//'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs so//zhes smra byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos nyid las gud na yang de
44b1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs la/de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byin gyi rlabs
44b2(nyi khri): med pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi dmigs la/de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi dmigs so//byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos
44b3(nyi khri): nyi la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs la/de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang byin gyi rlabs med pa'i chos mi dmigs so//de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//
44b4(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
44b5(nyi khri): mi dmigs so//gzugs kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang gzugs kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
44b6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs so//rnam par
44b7(nyi khri): shes pa'i chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mi dmigs so//skye mched dang /khams dang rten cing
45a1(nyi khri): 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang chang
45a2(nyi khri): med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang
45a3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
45a4(nyi khri): 'dres pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
45a5(nyi khri): bzhin nyid mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
45a6(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi chos nyid mi dmigs so//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//gzugs kyi chos nyid
45a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/bral ba'ang ma yin no//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//gzugs kyi chos nyid ma yin pa gzhan
45b1(nyi khri): sa na rnam ba ma yinan// byu /du na du /rnam sa dag spyod du ldan sa // na /
45b2(nyi khri): da dang ldan pa'angam sbyin pal ba ma /rnam sa pa'i dzin sa yin pa zhan dang sbyin
45b3(nyi khri): pagazhan dang ldan pa'ang ma yin tha la 'a ma na//kau shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dri ni rnam pa sems ca ma na na da ma yin na
45b4(nyi khri): ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid dang ldan du'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzhin ma yin pagazhan dang ldan pa
45b5(nyi khri): ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi cho sa nyid ma yin pa gzhan dang ldan du'ang m+b+ha yin bral ba'ang ma yin no//kau shi ka 'di ni gang //'di dag rnams ca dang ldan
45b6(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin pa de'i mthu ste/byin gyi rlab sna med pa'i tshul gyis de'i byin gyi rlabs so//kau shrI ka gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
45b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang nas bcol por bya na so zer dri ni/kau shi kri gzug so las kyang bcal bar mi bya/gzugs las gzhan du'ang 'chal bar mi bya'o//tshor ba dang /
46a1(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di
46a2(nyi khri): ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
46a3(nyi khri): yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/mi ldan pa'ang ma yin no//gzugs med pa bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di
46a4(nyi khri): ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni skye/cheng dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba
46a5(nyi khri): las kyang btsal bar mi bya/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad
46a6(nyi khri): med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid ngo mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /
46a7(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
46b1(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las kyang btsal bar mi bya/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan du'ang btsal bar mi bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
46b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /btsal ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin
46b3(nyi khri): mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyang
46b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mang ngo //gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi de
46b5(nyi khri): bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi chos nyid las kud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
46b6(nyi khri): pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam
46b7(nyi khri): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid
47a1(nyi khri): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//skye mched dang khams dang /rten
47a2(nyi khri): cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'bogs pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
47a3(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
47a4(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin
47a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
47a6(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
47a7(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa
47b1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//de ci'i
47b2(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa ste/de ltar chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas na gzugs kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
47b3(nyi khri): gzugs las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha
47b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa med do//gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/gzugs kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//tshor ba dang 'du shes
47b5(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang shes
47b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
47b7(nyi khri): yin rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad
48a1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid las gung na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mad do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bzhin nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/rnam pa
48a2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin//
48a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos nyid las gud na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras
48a4(nyi khri): so//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//btsun pa rab 'byor byang
48a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
48a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/rgyun tu zhugs
48a7(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo//thob bo 'thob
48b1(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas rnams ni rang byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas so//mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa'
48b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems can yongs su smin par byas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
48b3(nyi khri): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang
48b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni che ba ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
48b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa ste//
48b6(nyi khri): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams kyis ni/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//lan cig
48b7(nyi khri): phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa rnams kyis ni/dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo//thob po 'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/rang byang chub tu
49a1(nyi khri): mngon par sangs rgyas so//mngon par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/
49a2(nyi khri): ni/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas nas/bla na med bya yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
49a3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzugs rgya che ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
49a4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi mo'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus
49a5(nyi khri): mi dmigs so//kau shi ka tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
49a6(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/dbus mi dmigs
49a7(nyi khri): so/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
49b1(nyi khri): rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
49b2(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /
49b3(nyi khri): 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rgya che ba'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
49b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rgya che ba yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/phyi ma'i mtha' mi
49b5(nyi khri): dmigs/dbus mi dmigs so//kau shrI ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rgya che ba ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
49b6(nyi khri): phyin pa'o//kau shi ka gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar
49b7(nyi khri): gzugs kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du gzugs kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do//nam mkha'
50a1(nyi khri): tshad med pa'i phyir gzugs tshad med do//gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka tshor ba tshad med pa dang 'du shes tshad
50a2(nyi khri): med pa dang /'du byed tshad med pa dang /rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med pa
50a3(nyi khri): ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin
50a4(nyi khri): du rnam par shes pa'i tshad ni dmigs su meng ngo //nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa tshad med do//rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
50a5(nyi khri): tshad med do//kau shi ka skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
50a6(nyi khri): bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
50a7(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /stobs bcu dang /mi
50b1(nyi khri): 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
50b2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshad med pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka 'di lta ste
50b3(nyi khri): dper na/nam mkha'i tshad ni dmigs su med do//kau shi ka de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshad kyang dmigs su med do//nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams
50b4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/byang chub sems dpa' sems
50b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni tshad med pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//kau shi ka gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
50b6(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin po 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang
50b7(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
51a1(nyi khri): 'di ltar rnam par shes pa mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong
51a2(nyi khri): nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
51a3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
51a4(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa
51a5(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau na
51a6(nyi khri): kade ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtha' dang dbus mi dmigs so//kau shi ka rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
51a7(nyi khri): pa 'di ni gzugs mtha' yas pa dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mtha' yas
51b1(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
51b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i
51b3(nyi khri): phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi
51b4(nyi khri): ka rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
51b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ni
51b6(nyi khri): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/chos dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems
51b7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka chos kyi dbyings mtha'
52a1(nyi khri): yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//kau
52a2(nyi khri): shi ka gzhan yang de bzhin nyid dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/de ni 'di ltar shes
52a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
52a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhes bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mtha' yas pa'i
52a5(nyi khri): phyir/dmigs pa mtha' yas so//dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid mtha' yas so//kau shi ka de bzhin nyid dang /dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang
52a6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so//kau shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
52a7(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas so//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de rnam pa gang gis na/sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/byang chub
52b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa yin zhes bya/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/'di lta ste sems can sems can
52b2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba de chos gang gis tshig bla dgas yin/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin/chos ma yin pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te/'di//
52b3(nyi khri): ltar sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur du ming du btags pa/dngos po med par ming du btags pa/dmigs pa med par ming du btags pa'o//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
52b4(nyi khri): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las sems can du bshad pa gang yang yod dam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med do//rab 'byor
52b5(nyi khri): gyis smras pa/kau shi ka gang la sems can du bshad pa gang yang med pa de la/sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam/kau shi ka gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
52b6(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs te/sems can sems can zhes gsung du brjod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/de la sems can gang
52b7(nyi khri): yang skye ba 'am/'gag par gyur pa yod dam/smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor de ni med de/de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor gyis
53a1(nyi khri): smras pa/shA ka da ltar rnam gras des ma/sems canamatha mas pa N+ya/shes rab tu na \u0f7fb+hU mtha' mas par rig par byug/de nas nga
53a2(nyi khri): dad bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lharna mas dang /skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i sgra rnams dang /skyes pa dang bung med du bcas pa dgagis lan gsum
53a3(nyi khri): du cad du 'arjod pa ched du brjod de/gang gnas brtan dub 'byor gyis 'di ltar dri bzhin ga shegs pa 'byung ba'i don du/de tsozhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
53a4(nyi khri): mthus po shed cing brjod de bstan pa'i chos 'di ni kye ma legs par bshad do//kyem chos 'di ni legs par bshad do//kye mchos kyi chos nyid 'don legs par bshad //
53a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar
53a6(nyi khri): //choste gang yang nga migs su ma mchis te/gzugs sam+b+ha/tshor ba'am/'du shes som/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/rnam pa thams cad
53a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ngam/chos da yang dmigs su ma mchis kyis kyang theg pa gsum rnam par dag pa mchis te/dbus gang zhen 'a sa ste/nyan thos kyi ga pa nga
53b1(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu dbang po dang bcas pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin
53b2(nyi khri): no//ji skad du smras pa de de bzhin te/chos gang yang dmigs su med de/gzugs sam/tshor ba 'am/'du shes sam/'du byed dam/rnam par shes pa 'am/rnam pa thams
53b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ram/chos gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa yang yod de/gsum gang zhe na/nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang //
53b4(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o//lha'i bu dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
53b5(nyi khri): 'di dang ma bral ba da ni/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum rgya cher bstan to//gsum
53b6(nyi khri): gang zhe na/'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong
53b7(nyi khri): pa nyid thams cad dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam
54a1(nyi khri): dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
54a2(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
54a3(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
54a4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las gzhan du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs so//lha'i budrug /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na chos 'di dag thams cad la slob pa ste/
54a5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi
54a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo//nang stong pa nyid la slob bo//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bor la slob bo//dran pa nye bar
54a7(nyi khri): bzhag pa lo slob bo//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang ba dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam dang /'phags pa'i bden pa
54b1(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam
54b2(nyi khri): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
54b3(nyi khri): stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la slob bo//lha'i bu
54b4(nyi khri): dag de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang mi 'bral bar/spyod pade ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ste/lha'i bu dag gang na
54b5(nyi khri): tshe/de bzhin gau shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mur me mdzad kyi zhabs 'bring byed cing /rgyal po'i khab pad+mo yod pa'i nang gi tshang 'dus kyi dbus na
54b6(nyi khri): 'dug pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur to//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
54b7(nyi khri): dang /bsam gton gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar lo nag
55a1(nyi khri): rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /lam
55a2(nyi khri): rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa
55a3(nyi khri): brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams
55a4(nyi khri): dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang //
55a5(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang yang bral bar ma gyur te/de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad
55a6(nyi khri): med pa gzhan dag dang yang bral bar ma gyur to//lha'i bu dag de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzod kyis/nga la
55a7(nyi khri): bram ze'i khye'u khyod ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa na/bskal pa bzang po'i tshe/'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de bzhin
55b1(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra /bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang rkad par ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/bla na med pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
55b2(nyi khri): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to//de nas lha'i bung dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
55b3(nyi khri): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar gzugs mi lan mo 'dor ba'i tshul dang /tshor bar
55b4(nyi khri): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul dang /skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang //pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
55b5(nyi khri): dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
55b6(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes
55b7(nyi khri): pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
56a1(nyi khri): brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi len mi 'dor ba'i tshul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnam pa thams
56a2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa ni ngo mtshar che'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang /byang
56a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha'i bu de dag 'dus shing tshogs par mkhyen nas/de dag thams
56a4(nyi khri): cad dbang du btsugs te/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/kau shi kA byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen
56a5(nyi khri): nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa
56a6(nyi khri): drung /kun chub par byed pa dang /bsgom pa dang /gzhan la rgya tshar 'chad pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing rlom pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang
56a7(nyi khri): mi 'bral ba de dag ni/bdud sdig to can dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs
56b1(nyi khri): kyi bu mo de dag gis gzugs stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs
56b2(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la glags mi rnyed/mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/smon pa med pas smon pa med
56b3(nyi khri): pa la glags mi rnyed do//de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang /stong
56b4(nyi khri): ba nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
56b5(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes
56b6(nyi khri): pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
56b7(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid shin tu byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la
57a1(nyi khri): glags mi rnyed/mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med pa la glags mi rnyed/smon pa med pas smon pa med pa la glags mi rnyed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di
57a2(nyi khri): ltar gang gis glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /gang du glags rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /gang la glags rnyed par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid med do//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
57a3(nyi khri): bu mo de dag la ni mi 'am/mi ma yin pa glags lta zhing glags 'tshal ba dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/da ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
57a4(nyi khri): de dag gis de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/sems can thams cad la byams pa dang /snying rje dang /dga' ba dang /btang snyoms shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir ro//rigs kyi
57a5(nyi khri): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni nyam nga ba mi spongs pas dus byed par yang mi 'gyur te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
57a6(nyi khri): la spyod pa de dag gis/sems can thams cad la yang dag pa'i rim gros bsnyen bkur byas pa'i phyir ro//kau shi ka gang yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
57a7(nyi khri): khams na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /mtsho mo dang dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /kun
57b1(nyi khri): snang dang ba dang /dge rgyas dang /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang /lha'i bu gang gis shes
57b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma thos pa dang /ma gzung ba dang /ma bcangs pa dang /kun chub par ma byas pa de dag gis kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan par bya'o//
57b3(nyi khri): gzung bar bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//kun chub par bya'o//tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma bral bar bya'o//
57b4(nyi khri): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing
57b5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang yang ma bral bar byed pa de dag ni khyim stong pa na 'dug kyang rung /bla gab med pa na 'dug kyang rung /lam gol ba na 'dug kyang rung ste/'jigs
57b6(nyi khri): pa'am dngang bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so//phyi stong pa
57b7(nyi khri): nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu bsgoms so//de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong
58a1(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang /mtsho ma dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan/
58a2(nyi khri): 'phrul dbang byed dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar g+hi lha ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag
58a3(nyi khri): cag gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mas shing 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul
58a4(nyi khri): bzhin du yid la bgyid cig/gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yid la bgyid pa dang /mi 'bral ba de dag la rtag tu rgyun mi chang
58a5(nyi khri): par bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis ni/sems
58a6(nyi khri): can dmyal ba rnams kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /lha las phongs pa dang /mi las dbul ba dang /nang dang
58a7(nyi khri): gnod po dang /'gro ba'i nang thams cad kyang rgyun chod cing 'jig pa dag ma mchis par 'gyur/mu ga'i myang ma thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur/byang chub sems
58b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/dge byu bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten
58b2(nyi khri): du'abyung bar 'gyur/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
58b3(nyi khri): phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha
58b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/
58b5(nyi khri): dran pa nyo bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
58b6(nyi khri): brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar
58b7(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin
59a1(nyi khri): dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
59a2(nyi khri): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams mchis/
59a3(nyi khri): par 'gyur/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha
59a4(nyi khri): rnams dang /'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams mchis par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchis na/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /rgyun tu zhugs
59a5(nyi khri): pa mchis par 'gyur/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /lon cig phyir 'ong ba mchis par 'gyur/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba mchis par
59a6(nyi khri): 'gyur/dgra bcom pa nyid dang /dgra bcom pa mchis par 'gyur/rang byang chub dang /rang sangs rgyas mchis par 'gyur/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
59a7(nyi khri): chen po mchis na/sems can yongs su smin pa mchis par 'gyur/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mchis par 'gyur/'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa
59b1(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur/chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mchis par 'gyur/sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos dkon mchog dang /dge
59b2(nyi khri): 'dun dkon mchog 'byung bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/lha dang /mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
59b3(nyi khri): la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par bgyi'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kau shi ka
59b4(nyi khri): de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/sems can dmyal ba dang /byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad rgyur
59b5(nyi khri): chad par 'gyur ro//lha las phongs pa dang /mi las dbul ba dang /nad dang gnod pa dang /'go ba'i nod thams cad rgyun chad pa dang /'jig pa dang med par 'gyur ro//mu ge'i mya
59b6(nyi khri): ngam thams cad rgyun chang bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bsam gtan
59b7(nyi khri): bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
60a1(nyi khri): dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
60a2(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
60a3(nyi khri): dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa
60a4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang /bram ze'i rigs che
60a5(nyi khri): zhing mtho ba dang /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba yod par 'gyur ro//'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /'og min gyi bar gyi
60a6(nyi khri): lha rnams yod par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yod na/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa yod par 'gyur ro//lan cig phyir
60a7(nyi khri): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba yod par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid dang /dgra
