122b4(nyi khri): gzung ba dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod par byas nas shin tu dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur
122b5(nyi khri): ro//gnas de na lha mthu chung ngu ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag kyang lha mthu chen po mthu chen po de dag gi gzi brjid dang /dpal dang /zil mi bzod pa'i phyir gnas de nas
122b6(nyi khri): gud du 'dong bar sems so//ji lta ji ltar lha mthu chen po mthu chen po/rdzu 'phrul che ba dang /dbang che ba de dag nye bar 'ong bar sems pa/de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/
122b7(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de yang mos pa rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de'i gnas kyi 'khor kun tu yang gtsang sbra med pa'i spyod pa mi rgyu bar byas te/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
123a1(nyi khri): kyi bu mo des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir de'i 'khor gyis yang spos chu'i chag chag gis btab bo//me tog dang /spos kyis
123a2(nyi khri): gtor ro//bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod bzhag go/dar gyi lda ldi dang /gos kyi bla re bre zhing sa'i phyogs de yang rnam pa du mas brgyan par bya'o//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu
123a3(nyi khri): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de la ngal zhing chad par 'gyur ba med de/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de ni lus bde ba dang /lus yang ba dang /lus gsal ba yang
123a4(nyi khri): nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo des ni sems bde ba dang /sems yang ba dang /sems gsal ba yang nyams su myong bar
123a5(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//de nas nub mo nyal na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bsam pas mos par byas na/sdig to'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro//des
123a6(nyi khri): mthong na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnga' ba/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus kun
123a7(nyi khri): tu brgyan pa/sku gser gyi mdog tu bzhugs pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kun nas bskor ba/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du bad ra ba/chos
123b1(nyi khri): ston pa mthong bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de las 'di lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
123b2(nyi khri): dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi chos bstan pa'ang thos par 'gyur ro//pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de'i don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur ro//stong
123b3(nyi khri): pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po bco brgyad kyi bar de dag gi don rnam par phye ba'ang thos par 'gyur
123b4(nyi khri): ro//byang chub kyi shing yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi shing drung du 'gro ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang
123b5(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang mthong bar 'gyur ro//de ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
123b6(nyi khri): ba'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong mang po chos yang dag par bgro ba byed cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni 'di ltar yongs su bsgrub par
123b7(nyi khri): bya'o//sems can mang po ni 'di ltar yongs su smin par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 'di ltar yongs su bzung bar bya'o//bdud 'khor dang bcas pa ni 'di ltar pham
124a1(nyi khri): bar bya'o zhes zer ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro//shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i sgra'ang thos par 'gyur ro//lho dang /
124a2(nyi khri): nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po'i
124a3(nyi khri): sgra'ang thos par 'gyur te/'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas che ge mo zhig bzhugs te/byang
124a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig dang /nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'di snyed cig gis bskor cing mdun du byas te chos ston to zhes bya ba'i
124a5(nyi khri): sgra thos par 'gyur ro//shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur/stong gi phyogs kyi bar
124a6(nyi khri): gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur te/mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pa bye ba khrag khrig
124a7(nyi khri): brgya stong mang po'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de dag kyang me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /bdug spos dang /byug pa dang /
124b1(nyi khri): phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /mchod pa sna tshogs mang pos rim glor bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /bsti stang du bya
124b2(nyi khri): ba dang /mchod par bya ba mthong bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis rmi lam bzang po de lta bu dag mthong bar 'gyur te/de dag
124b3(nyi khri): bde bar nyal zhing bde bar ldang bar 'gyur ro//de'i lus kyang mdongs dang ldan par 'gyur ro//lus la yang ba'i nyams yod par 'gyur zhing /lci ba'i nyams med par
124b4(nyi khri): 'gyur/zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur/gos la chags pa med par 'gyur/nad kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad la chags pa myed par 'gyur/zas kyi 'du
124b5(nyi khri): shes chung bar 'gyur/gos kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur/nad kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad kyi 'du shes kyang chung bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar dper na/
124b6(nyi khri): rnal 'byor la spyod pa'i dge slong ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la bya bas yongs su bslan pa ni/zas la cher chags pa med pa yin/zas kyi 'du shes chung
124b7(nyi khri): ba yin/kau shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang zas la cher chags pa med par 'gyur ro//zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro//de
125a1(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/de la mi ma yin pa rnams lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo//shar phyogs dang /lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byang shar dang /
125a2(nyi khri): shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed pa
125a3(nyi khri): dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tsa dang /lto 'phye chen po gang ji snyed yod pa de dag
125a4(nyi khri): kyang de'i lus la mdangs nye bar sgrub bo//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo tshe 'di nyid la yon tan 'di dag yongs su bzung bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi
125a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la nan tan du mnyan par bya'o//bzung bar bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//kun chub par bya'o//tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o///
125a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar bya'o//kau shi ka de ste rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
125a7(nyi khri): pa 'di ma bzung ma bcangs/ma bklags/kun chub par ma byas/tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas na'ang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis
125b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing /glegs bam du byas te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /gos dang /gdugs dang /
125b2(nyi khri): rgyal mtshan dang /bdan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o//bkur stir bya'o//bsti stang du bya'o//mchod par bya'o//kau shi kA de ltar na rigs kyi chu
125b3(nyi khri): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba'i don du zhugs pa yin/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'om/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes
125b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing bris te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /
125b5(nyi khri): spros dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /chos gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byed/bkur
125b6(nyi khri): spyir byed/bsti stang du byed/mchod par byed na/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten
125b7(nyi khri): gyi khams na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bzhugs pa rnams la/nam 'tsho'i
126a1(nyi khri): bar du na bza' dang /bshos dang /gzims cha dang /snyun gyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du/
126a2(nyi khri): byas/mchod par byas pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag mya ngan las 'das
126a3(nyi khri): nas kyang /rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /thug pa dang /phye mo dang /chos
126a4(nyi khri): gos dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod
126a5(nyi khri): par byas pas ni ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu gcig pa'o///de nas bcom
126a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gang ba zhig kyang rnyed/
126a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las byin na/de las gang blang bar bya/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te
126b1(nyi khri): bdag 'dzam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa zhig kyang la las stsa la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris pa zhig kyang la las
126b2(nyi khri): stsal na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bdag gis blang bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag la bdag rim gro ma
126b3(nyi khri): mchis pa'ang ma lags/mi ston pa'ang ma lags/btsun par mi bgyid pa'ang ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro bgyi
126b4(nyi khri): bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/bkur stir bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba 'am/bsti stang du bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba'am/mchod par bgyi bar mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags na/bcom
126b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ste/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams kyang rim gror
126b6(nyi khri): bgyi ba lags/bkur stir bgyi ba legs/bsti stang du bgyi ba lags/mchod par bgyi ba lags so//sku gdung de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas
126b7(nyi khri): bsgrubs pa ste/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das nam bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la lha
127a1(nyi khri): rdzas kyi me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan
127a2(nyi khri): dang /lha rdzas kyi sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid cing /bkur stir bgyid pa dang /bsti stang du bgyid pa dang /mchod par bgyid pa'i tshe'ang /de
127a3(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba legs pas na/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim
127a4(nyi khri): gror bgyi ba lags/bkur stir bgyi ba lags/bsti stong du bgyi ba lags/mchod par bgyi ba lags pas bsrung zhing rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti
127a5(nyi khri): stang dang /mchod par bgyid do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces sbas so//kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
127a6(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni gzung du med pa/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa yin na/de la
127a7(nyi khri): khyod ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung du med pa/gzugs med pa/bltar med pa/thogs pa med pa/mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/'di ltar mtshan
127b1(nyi khri): nyid med pa la gzung bar sems/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /dor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin/'grib pa'i phyir ma yin//
127b2(nyi khri): 'phel ba'i phyir ma yin/bskyed pa'i phyir ma yin/bsgyur ba'i phyir ma yin/'bri ba'i phyir ma yin/bsnan pa'i phyir ma yin/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir ma yin//
127b3(nyi khri): rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar sgrub pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin/byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams
127b4(nyi khri): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /slob pa dang /mi slob pa'i chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i chos
127b5(nyi khri): rnams 'dor ba ma yin/'dus ma byas kyi dbyings nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/'dus byas kyi khams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar
127b6(nyi khri): bsgrub pa ma yin/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
127b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po
128a1(nyi khri): dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
128a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang //
128a3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs
128a4(nyi khri): pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nye
128a5(nyi khri): bar bsgrub pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin no//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de
128a6(nyi khri): de bzhin te/btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/so so'i skye bo'i
128a7(nyi khri): chos rnams 'dor bar byed pa ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
128b1(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/shes rab kyi pha
128b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi
128b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
128b4(nyi khri): lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba snang ste/kau shi ka legs so legs so//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa bzhin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
128b5(nyi khri): gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
128b6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su shes par bya ba ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
128b7(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnyis pa'o//kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i
129a1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang
129a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sprin
129a3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/chos kyi dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/da ni 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /sbyin
129a4(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin nyid dang //
129a5(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i
129a6(nyi khri): mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//kau shi ka gang bsam gtan gyi
129a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
129b1(nyi khri): pa la gnyis su 'dod pa de ni/de bzhin nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gnyis su 'dod du zad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin nyid
129b2(nyi khri): dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//de nas lha'i dbang
129b3(nyi khri): po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas
129b4(nyi khri): pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyi bar 'os pa ste/de la bslabs pas ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
129b5(nyi khri): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe
129b6(nyi khri): bdag chos bzang po'i lha'i 'khor du bdag nyid kyi/lha'i dbang po'i stan la mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/der lha'i bu gang ji snyed bdag gi rim gro la mchis pa de dag
129b7(nyi khri): kun kyang bdag la mchod pa bgyid de/nam der bdag ma mchis shing /stan de la ma mchis pa de'i tshe'ang lha'i bu de dag 'khor der mchis shing /lha'i dbang po
130a1(nyi khri): brgya byin stan 'di la 'dug cing /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la chos ston to zhes stan ngal g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bgyis shing phyag btsal te slar
130a2(nyi khri): mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'chang ba dang /kha ton du bgyid cing gzhan la yang rgya cher ston pa der/phyogs
130a3(nyi khri): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po
130a4(nyi khri): ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'di las byung ngo //nyan thos dang /rang sangs
130a5(nyi khri): rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo //sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo zhes/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag bgyis
130a6(nyi khri): shing gdung pa bgyis nas/slar mchi bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams mchod pa mnga' ba yang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs
130a7(nyi khri): su bsgrubs pa'i slad du/mchod pa mnga' ste/de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i
130b1(nyi khri): spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gzhir gyur to//rgyur gyur to//rkyen du gyur to//yongs su sgrub par gyur to//
130b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na cha de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to//bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
130b3(nyi khri): 'di blangs te/chos kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i yid kyis kha ton bgyid pa de'i tshe 'jigs pa 'am/bag tsha ba'i mtshan ma tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //bcom
130b4(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
130b5(nyi khri): phyin pa ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
130b6(nyi khri): dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis brjod du ma mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das
130b7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa de dag ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis brjod du ma
131a1(nyi khri): mchis pa ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni smos su ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
131a2(nyi khri): mtshan ma ma mchis pa zhig lags te/mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags na ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/chos
131a3(nyi khri): thams cad la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/bla na med pa yang dag par
131a4(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /
131a5(nyi khri): smos su ma mchis pa'i chos mi ston te/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma ma mchis/rtags ma mchis/brjod du ma mchis/smos
131a6(nyi khri): su ma mchis pas/de'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos
131a7(nyi khri): su ma mchis par thugs su chud de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la mtshan ma ma mchis
131b1(nyi khri): ba dang /rtags ma mchis pa dang /brjod du ma mchis pa dang /smos su ma mchis pa'i chos bstan to//bcom ldan 'das ngo bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lha dang /mi dang /
131b2(nyi khri): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /bye ma dang /na bza dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bdam
131b3(nyi khri): dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o//bris shing me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /
131b4(nyi khri): byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang
131b5(nyi khri): dang /mchod par bgyi bar 'os pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub pa dang /tshul
131b6(nyi khri): bzhin du yid la bgyid pa dang /de bris shing me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug po dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
131b7(nyi khri): mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod pa bgyid pa de ni nam bla na med pa yang dag par
132a1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du des sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//byol song gi skye
132a2(nyi khri): gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//nyan thos kyi so dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//
132a3(nyi khri): de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
132a4(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /
132a5(nyi khri): rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod par bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs
132a6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
132a7(nyi khri): gos thur bur gtams pa zhig kyang stsal la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang bris te su la ma bcom ldan 'das dkon mchog de gnyis las bang ni rna
132b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung
132b2(nyi khri): rnams te/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang rim gror bgyi ba dang /bkur stir bgyi ba dang /bsti stang du bgyi zhing mchod par bgyi ba lags te/
132b3(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/de dag la rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/bsti stang du bgyis/mchod par bgyis na/log par ltung ba dang /
132b4(nyi khri): ngan song du mchi bar mi 'gyur te/lha dang ma'i phun sum tshogs pa myong nas/smon lam gyi tshul bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/
132b5(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /shes
132b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bris pa mthong ba de ni mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /de bzhin
132b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa la gnyis su ma mchis te gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i
133a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyis cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum la bzhugs te/mdo dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /chos gtan la dbab pa
133a2(nyi khri): bstan pa'i bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/gzhan
133a3(nyi khri): la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
133a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas rnams so//'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo//'di las byung ba ni mdo dang /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /chos
133a5(nyi khri): gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i bar dag go/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
133a6(nyi khri): rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed mang po dang /lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /byong sha ra dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang /steng
133a7(nyi khri): gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mang pos cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum
133b1(nyi khri): la bzhugs te/mdo dang /dbyangs kyis bskyed pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i bar du gsungs te bshad pa dang /rigs kyi bu'am/
133b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung zhing kun chub par bgyis te/gzhan la bstan pa de gnyis kyang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//de ci'i slad
133b3(nyi khri): du zhe na/'di las byung ba ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so//'di las byung ba ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum
133b4(nyi khri): mo//'di las byung ba ni mdo dang dbyangs kyis bskyed pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /chos gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i bar dag go//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs
133b5(nyi khri): bcu'i phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la/me tog dang /
133b6(nyi khri): phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro
133b7(nyi khri): dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod pa bgyis pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /
134a1(nyi khri): spros dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil spyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /
134a2(nyi khri): bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod pa bgyis par yang mi 'dra ba ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
134a3(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba
134a4(nyi khri): dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing /gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston pa des ni/sems can dmyal ba'i rgyud kyi dogs pa ma
134a5(nyi khri): mchis par bgyi'o//byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi
134a6(nyi khri): sa'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par rig par bgyi'o//
134a7(nyi khri): de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin to//'chang ngo //klog go/kun chub par bgyid do//tshul bzhin du yid la
134b1(nyi khri): bgyid do//bris pa de la yang me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil
134b2(nyi khri): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyid/bkur stir bgyid/bsti stang du bgyid/mchod par bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
134b3(nyi khri): 'di ni 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa'o//nad thams cad rab tu sel ba'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo gang shes
134b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /de la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spros dang /byug
134b5(nyi khri): bapa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /
134b6(nyi khri): mchod par bgyis pa des ni/gang nas kyang 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i dogs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu nor gyi bdag po zhig
134b7(nyi khri): 'jigs nas/rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la brten na/de rgyal po la gnas shing rgyal po la brten pas/sus 'jigs pa de dag nyid kyang de la brten pas/
135a1(nyi khri): de dag gis 'dzugs par mi 'gyur ra//de ci'i sbrad du rnam/bcom ldan 'das don 'di ltar ga sha' ste/gang rgyal po la brten pa na mthu dang ldan pa la ldan
135a2(nyi khri): ba'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs pas na mchod pa mnga'o//bcom
135a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang lags pa de'ang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bsgrubs par blta'o//bcom ldan 'das de bas na
135a4(nyi khri): bdag gis cha de gnyis las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid blang bar bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
135a5(nyi khri): sku gdung rnams so//'di las byung ba ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so//'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
135a6(nyi khri): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do//'di las byung ba ni byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po'o//
135a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ste/de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming 'thob bo//'di las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams
135b1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar te/bcom ldan 'das grong ngam/grong rdal lam/grong khyer ram/khams sam/rgyal po'i gnas sam/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
135b2(nyi khri): rten gyi khams gang na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /de bris shing rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /
135b3(nyi khri): mchod pa bgyid pa de dag tu mi 'am/mi ma lags pa glags lta zhing glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur te/sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa gsum
135b4(nyi khri): las theg pa gang yang rung bas mthar gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don
135b5(nyi khri): chen po dang ldan pa ste/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/de ltar sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi don du nye bar gnas so//bcom ldan 'das
135b6(nyi khri): 'jig rten gyi khams gang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchis pa'i/'jig rten gyi khams der ni sangs rgyas byung ba dang 'dra bar blta'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
135b7(nyi khri): ste dper na/nor bu rin po che chen po mi dpogs rin chen zhes bgyi ba mchis te/de ni nor bu rin po che chen po'i yon tan rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/nor bu rin
136a1(nyi khri): po che de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dang der/mi ma lags pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do//mi ma lags pas zin pa'i skyes pa'am/bud med kyang
136a2(nyi khri): nor bu rin po che de bstan na/mi ma lags pa de nor bu rin po che chen po de'i gzi brjid mi bzod de myur du 'pho zhing mi gnas so//mkhris pas gdungs pa'i lus la nor
136a3(nyi khri): bu rin po che chen po de btags na/mkhris pa de'ang 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rlung gis mnar ba'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/rlung de'ang 'byung bar
136a4(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//bad kan gyis non pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na/bad kan de'ang zhi bar 'gyur ro//'dus pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i lus la nor bu rin
136a5(nyi khri): po che chen po de btags na/'dus pa'i nad de'ang zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par mi 'phel lo//nub mo ni nor bu rin po che chen po de snang bar bgyid do//tsha ba'i dus na ni
136a6(nyi khri): nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de bsil bar bgyid do//grang ba'i dus na ni nor bu rin po che chen po de phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de dro
136a7(nyi khri): bar bgyid do//nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs de yang /ha chang yang mi dro ha chang yang mi grang zhing ran pa phun sum tshogs par
136b1(nyi khri): bgyid do//nor bu rin po che chen po de dog sa'i phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i dog sa'i phyogs der sbrul lam/de ma lags pa'i sdig pa la sogs pa gdug pa dang /gzhan dag
136b2(nyi khri): kyang rgyu bar mi 'gyur ro///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po sum cu bzhi pa//bcom ldan 'das skyes pa 'am/bud med
136b3(nyi khri): la la zhig sbrul gdug pas zin pa la/nor bu rin po che chen po de bstan na/des de mthong ma thag tu dug de yang byung bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che
136b4(nyi khri): chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang ldan te/skyes pa 'am bud med la la zhig 'brum bus btab bam mig rab rib can du gyur te/mig gi nad dam/rna
136b5(nyi khri): ba'i nad dam/sna'i nad dam/lce'i nad dam/lkog ma'i nad dam/lus kyi nad ci byung ba las de'i lus la nor bu rin po che chen po de btags na de dag gi 'brum
136b6(nyi khri): bu'am/rab rib bam/mig gi nad dam/rna ba'i nad dam/sna'i nad dam/lce'i nad dam/lkog ma'i nad dam/lus kyi nad de dag kyang zhi bar 'gyur ro//
136b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa 'di lta bu dag dang yang ldan te/gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de dag chab rnyog pa can gyi nang du stsal
137a1(nyi khri): na//de'i mod la chab de thams cad kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan zhing kha dog gcig par 'gyur ro//gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos sngon pos
137a2(nyi khri): dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro//gal te nor bu rin po che chen po de gos ser po 'am/dmar po 'am/dkar po 'am/
137a3(nyi khri): leb rgan nam/shel gyi kha dog gam/gos gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nor bu rin po che chen po de dkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/chab de'ang de'i rang bzhin
137a4(nyi khri): nyid du 'gyur ro//chab de la rnyog pa mchis pa'ang /nor bu rin po che chen po des dang ste/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de ni yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta
137a5(nyi khri): bu dag dang /gzhan yang rnam pa mang po dag dang ldan no//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dang 'dra bar
137a6(nyi khri): yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa ste/sdig pa thams cad sel ba'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras
137a7(nyi khri): so//kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/nor bu rin po che chen po de lha rdzas shig yin nam/'on tam nor bu rin po che chen po de 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la'ang
137b1(nyi khri): soyod/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa dga' bo nor bu rin po che chen po de ni lha rdzas te/btsun pa dga' bo 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la nor bu rin po che gang yod pa de dag na
137b2(nyi khri): rgyuchung zhing rtsi/lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che de dag ni che zhing yang ste/'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de dag ni lha rdzas ltar yan lag de dag gis yongs su
137b3(nyi khri): rdzogs pa ma yin te/'dzam bu'i gling gi nor bu rin po che de dag gis ni/lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po de'i grangs sam/cha 'am/bgrang ba 'am/dpe 'am/rgyur
137b4(nyi khri): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//de nas yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po de snod la la
137b5(nyi khri): zhig gi nang du stsal stsal pa las/snod de nas byung yang snod de ni nor bu rin po tsha de'i yon tan gyis yid du mchi bar 'gyur te/gzhan yang snod de la mos pa skyed do//
137b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang na mchis pa de'i/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gi lus sam sems kyi sdug bsngal dang /gnod
137b7(nyi khri): pa mi las gyur pa'am/mi ma lags pa las gyur pa thams cad kyang ma mchis par 'gyur te/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che chen po zhes bgyi ba ni shes rab
138a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bla dgas so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
138a2(nyi khri): pa'i yon tan lta ji snyed cig brjod par bgyi ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang shes rab kyi
138a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod do//bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
138a4(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar
138a5(nyi khri): bzhag pa bzhi dang /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /
138a6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
138a7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon
138b1(nyi khri): par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
138b2(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam
138b3(nyi khri): pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos
138b4(nyi khri): nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /bag
138b5(nyi khri): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /rtag tu btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan lta ji skad cig
138b6(nyi khri): brjod par bgyi ste/mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi yon tan ni tshad ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag kyang mi nyams pa'i chos nyid kyi snod do//
138b7(nyi khri): de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'i
139a1(nyi khri): snod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /pha rol tu
139a2(nyi khri): phyin pa mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa blang ba ma mchis dor ba ma mchis pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa dbri ba ma mchis bsnan pa ma mchis pa dang /pha rol
139a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'ong ba ma mchis 'gro ba ma mchis/gnas pa ma mchis pa'i snod de/de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan
139a4(nyi khri): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyi snod de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyis
139a5(nyi khri): yongs su bsgoms pa'o//de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag ni mchod pa mnga'o//gzhan yang
139a6(nyi khri): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur yongs su gtams pa lta zhog gi/bcom ldan 'das gal te phyogs
139a7(nyi khri): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gis byur bur gtams pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glags
139b1(nyi khri): bam du bris pa zhig sprul na/bcom ldan 'das rnam pa de gnyis las bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'di las byung
139b2(nyi khri): ba ni/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung rnams te mchod pa mnga'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
139b3(nyi khri): su bsgoms pas na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung de dag mchod pa mnga' ste/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
139b4(nyi khri): sku gdung rnams la rim gror bgyid pa dang /bkur stir bgyid pa dang /bsti stang du bgyid pa dang /mchod par bgyid pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mtha' mi dmigs shing /
139b5(nyi khri): rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'am/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum
139b6(nyi khri): mam/mtshe ma 'am/dga' ldan nam/'phrul dga' 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du mi dang /lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang /bde ba myong
139b7(nyi khri): nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mchod pa'i 'bras bu lta de tsam du bas kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
140a1(nyi khri): 'di bzung zhing bcangs pa dang /bklags shing kun chub par bgyis pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
140a2(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha
140a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i
140a4(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi
140a5(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de tshad du bsams te las yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//lus de dag gis sems
140a6(nyi khri): can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur te/'khor los sgyur ba'i lus sam/rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/khyim
140a7(nyi khri): bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i lus sam/brgya byin gyi gzugs sam/tshangs pa'i gzugs sam/ngal bso po'i gzugs kyang rung ste/de lus de
140b1(nyi khri): dag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi sa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par
140b2(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa 'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa
140b3(nyi khri): thob nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de bas na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung la rim gro ma mchis
140b4(nyi khri): pa yang ma lags/glo ba ma chis pa yang ma mchis/mchod par mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags/gzung bar mi 'tshal ba yang ma lags te/bcom ldan 'das
140b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod pa bgyis na/sangs
140b6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu shin tu bsags pa lags/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang yongs su zin par 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams
140b7(nyi khri): la'ang rim gro dang /bku ra sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod pa bgyid par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
141a1(nyi khri): dang grangs ma mchis pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos
141a2(nyi khri): ston pa de dag chos kyi sku dang /gzugs kyi sku dang /ye shes kyi skur mthong bar 'tshal zhing mchod par 'tshal bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid gzung
141a3(nyi khri): bar bgyi/bcang bar bgyi/klag par bgyi/kun chub par bgyi/mchod par bgyi/gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/tshul bzhin du
141a4(nyi khri): yang yid la bgyid ste/rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs dang /tshad ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
141a5(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro//de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
141a6(nyi khri): spyod pa des/chos nyid du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs/
141a7(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong bar 'tshal bas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzung bar bgyi/bcang bar bgyi//
141b1(nyi khri): klag par bgyi/kun chub par bgyi/mchod par bgyi/gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi/chos nyid tshul bzhin du yang yid la bgyi'o//bcom ldan
141b2(nyi khri): 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de/gnyis gang zhe na/'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do//bcom ldan 'das
141b3(nyi khri): de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /phyi stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /dngos
141b4(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ye shes dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ye shes dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan
141b5(nyi khri): bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
141b6(nyi khri): dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi
141b7(nyi khri): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ye shes dang /dge ba dang /
142a1(nyi khri): mi dge ba'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /zag pa med pa dang /zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /'jig rten pa dang /'jig rten las
142a2(nyi khri): 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes gang lags pa de ni/'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces bgyi'o//de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags
142a3(nyi khri): she na/de ni gang la skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /gnas pa ma mchis pa dang /gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba ma mchis pa dang /kun
142a4(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /'phel ba ma mchis pa dang /'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/de ni chos thams cad kyingo
142a5(nyi khri): bo nyid do//chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid gang lags she na/chos thams cad ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid de/'di ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos
142a6(nyi khri): nyid ces bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
142a7(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
142b1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag
142b2(nyi khri): kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//da ltar byung ba'i phyogs
142b3(nyi khri): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
142b4(nyi khri): skyong ba dang /chos ston pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
142b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas so//'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /ma byon
142b6(nyi khri): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa
142b7(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te//
143a1(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo//'thob bo//'thob/
143a2(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro//'das pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'byung ba dang /da ltar byung ba'i 'jig
143a3(nyi khri): rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na/rang sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig 'khod cing 'tsho skyong ba de dag gis kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la
143a4(nyi khri): brten te rang byang chub thob bo//'thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum po thams cad rgya
143a5(nyi khri): tsher bstan to/de dag kyang mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /dmigs pa med pa'i tshul dang /skye ba med pa'i tshul dang /'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang /kun
143a6(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul dang /zhen pa med pa dang /'dor ba med pa'i
143a7(nyi khri): tshul dang /dbri ba med pa dang /bsnan pa med pa'i tshul dang /blang ba med pa dang /spang ba med pa'i tshul gyis bstan te/de'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
143b1(nyi khri): kyi tshul gyis bstan gyi/don dam par ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba ma yin/pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/shes
143b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshu rol ma yin/pha rol ma yin/thang ma yin/thang du 'dug pa ma yin/gshong du 'dug pa ma yin/mnyam pa ma yin/mi
143b3(nyi khri): mnyam pa ma yin/mtshan ma ma yin/mtshan ma med pa ma yin/'jig rten pa ma yin/'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/'dus byas ma yin/'dus
143b4(nyi khri): ma byas ma yin/dge ba ma yin/mi dge ba ma yin/'das pa ma yin/ma 'ongs pa ma yin/da ltar byung ba ma yin te/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
143b5(nyi khri): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin te/dgra bcom pa'i bar gyi chos rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nye bar bsgrub pa ma yin/so
143b6(nyi khri): so'i skye bo'i chos rnams 'dor ba ma yin no//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po ste/
143b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa rnams ni/sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa
144a1(nyi khri): yang 'tshal te/sems can du dmigs pa ma mchis so//sems can du gdugs par dmigs pa ma mchis so//bdag dang /sems can dang /
144a2(nyi khri): srog dang /'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang /byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /
144a3(nyi khri): mthong ba por dmigs pa ma mchis so//gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes par dmigs
144a4(nyi khri): pa ma mchis so//mig tu dmigs pa ma mchis/yid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so//gzugs su dmigs pa ma mchis/chos kyi bar du dmigs
144a5(nyi khri): pa ma mchis so//mig gi rnam par shes par dmigs pa ma mchis/yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so//mig gi 'dus te reg
144a6(nyi khri): par dmigs pa ma mchis/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so//mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar dmigs pa ma mchis//
144a7(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so//sa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /
144b1(nyi khri): rlung gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//ma rig par dmigs pa ma mchis/'du byed dang /rnam
144b2(nyi khri): par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shir
144b3(nyi khri): dmigs pa ma mchis so//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
144b4(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmigs pa ma mchis so//nang stong pa nyid du dmigs pa
144b5(nyi khri): ma mchis/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs pa ma mchis so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/yang dag par
144b6(nyi khri): spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmigs pa ma
144b7(nyi khri): mchis so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
145a1(nyi khri): rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//rnam par thar pa brgyad du dmigs pa ma mchis/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par
145a2(nyi khri): bar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon par shes pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//ting nge 'dzin rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams su
145a3(nyi khri): dmigs pa ma mchis so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis/mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang //
145a4(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa ma mchis so//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur dmigs pa ma mchis/lan
145a5(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid du dmigs pa ma mchis so//rang byang chub tu dmigs pa ma mchis so//
145a6(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /byang chub dang /sangs rgyas dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos su dmigs pa ma mchis te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dmigs
145a7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul du nye bar gnas pa ma lagaso so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/da ni 'di ltar gang gis dmigs par bgyi ba dang /gang la dmigs par bgyi ba dang /gang du
145b1(nyi khri): dmigs par bgyi ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid de la ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa'
145b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po des mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yun ring por spyad pas/des byang chub kyang mi dmigs na/sangs rgyas lta ci smos/
145b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos lta'ang ci smos/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyi
145b4(nyi khri): dem lags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la mo spyod dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nI pa
145b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug po kun la'ang /de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod de/des sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs/gtong ba'ang mi dmigs/len pa'ang mi dmigs
145b6(nyi khri): so//tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/tshul khrims ngan pa'ang mi dmigs so//bzod pa'ang mi dmigs/bzod
145b7(nyi khri): ba dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/gnod sems kyang mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus kyang mi dmigs/brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/le lo'ang mi
146a1(nyi khri): dmigs so//bsam gtan yang mi dmigs/bsam gtan dang ldan pa yang mi dmigs/'khrug pa'ang myi dmigs so//shes rab kyang mi
146a2(nyi khri): dmigs/shes rab dang ldan pa'ang mi dmigs/shes rab 'chal pa'ang mi dmigs so//kau shi ka 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzugs mi dmigs
146a3(nyi khri): pa'i tshul dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mig mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba dang /sna
146a4(nyi khri): dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /gzugs mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sgra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos mi dmigs
146a5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /sna'i rnam par shes pa dang /lce'i rnam par shes pa dang /
146a6(nyi khri): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te
146a7(nyi khri): reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
146b1(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /lce'i
146b2(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sa'i
146b3(nyi khri): khams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /num mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi dmigs
146b4(nyi khri): pa'i tshul dang /ma rig pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dang /ming dang gzugs dang /skye mched drug dang /reg pa dang /tshor ba
146b5(nyi khri): dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang /srid pa dang /skye ba dang /rga shi mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /tshul khrims kyi
146b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
146b7(nyi khri): phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /byang
147a1(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams
147a2(nyi khri): dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
147a3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /de bzhin
147a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
147a5(nyi khri): brgyad mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom
147a6(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /chos thams cad mi
147a7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba
147b1(nyi khri): la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims bsrung ba'i/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
147b2(nyi khri): par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
147b3(nyi khri): su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsom pa'i/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
147b4(nyi khri): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug
147b5(nyi khri): pa'i/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
147b6(nyi khri): la rnam par lta ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la sngon du 'gro ba'o//kau shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/'dzam bu'i gling gi shing rnams lo
147b7(nyi khri): ma sna tshogs can/me tog sna tshogs can/'bras bu sna tshogs can/dbyibs sna tshogs can/chu zheng sna tshogs can du 'khod kyang /de dag gi grib ma la
148a1(nyi khri): khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs te/gzhan du na grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro bar zad do//kau shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga shes
148a2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngos pa rnams la'ang khyad par ram bye brag mi dmigs so//brgya byin gyis
148a3(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i slad du/yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'o//bcom
148a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/tshad ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha
148a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa ni yon tan mu ma mchis pa dang ldan pa'i slad du/yon tan kun tu mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo
148a6(nyi khri): gang la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris shing glegs bam du bgyis te bcangs pa dang /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye
148a7(nyi khri): ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/bsti stang du bgyis/
148b1(nyi khri): mchod par bgyis te/de nas gong du ji skad bstan pa bzhin du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul bzhin du yid la bgyis pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las
148b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glags bam du bgyis te/gzhan la stsal na/de gnyis las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis
148b3(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas na khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo
148b4(nyi khri): la las/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spros dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal
148b5(nyi khri): mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par byas pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am/
148b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo la las/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam zhig gzhan la byin te bgo ba shar byas pa dang /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
148b7(nyi khri): la las/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs ka ra gyi 'bru tsam po de blangs te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza'
149a1(nyi khri): dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par
149a2(nyi khri): byas na/de dag las gang gi bsod nams cher 'phel ba yin/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don
149a3(nyi khri): 'tshal te/de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mang po la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spros dang /byug pa dang /
149a4(nyi khri): phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bgyis/bkur stir bgyis/bsti stang du bgyis//
149a5(nyi khri): mchod par bgyis pa bas gang la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam gzhan la stsal na/'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//
149a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don de nyid gzigs te/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag
149a7(nyi khri): nas/rdo rje lta bu'i sku bshig ste/sems can gyi ris na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i sems can mchis pa rnams kyi slad du thugs rje
149b1(nyi khri): chen po bskyed de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung du byin gyis brlabs so//bcom ldan 'das gang la las chung ngu na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs kar gyi 'bru tsam
149b2(nyi khri): la/mchod pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis na/de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i mthar mthug par sdug bsngal gyi mthar 'byin par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das
149b3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du byas te/me
149b4(nyi khri): tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim
149b5(nyi khri): gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par byas pa bas/gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te chos kyi dga' bas gzhan la byin
149b6(nyi khri): ma rigs kyi bu'am/rigs kyi bu mo de ni bsod nams cher 'phel lo//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
149b7(nyi khri): pa ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du/gzhan gyi drung du song ste bshad cing bstan pa dang /brjod cing bkrol ba dang /rnam par phye ste gsal bar byas ni/rigs kyi bu
150a1(nyi khri): 'am rigs kyi bu mo da na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de dag pas/bsod nams cher 'phel te/de ni ston pa yin par bsam mo//bla
150a2(nyi khri): ma'i gnas mkhas pa tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa la la zhig yin par bsam mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa
150a3(nyi khri): yin te/ston pa ni gzhan/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ston pa/ston pa nyid kyang shes
150a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs pas/'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung
150a5(nyi khri): paba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
150a6(nyi khri): par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag kyang
150a7(nyi khri): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las gud na med de/de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /bla na med pa yang dag
150b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka shes rab
150b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo//'thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa
150b3(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du thob bo//'thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /rang
150b4(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems
150b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs shing /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs so//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//
150b6(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
150b7(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/me tog dang /
151a1(nyi khri): phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /'a dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs
151a2(nyi khri): kyis mngon du rim gror bya bar 'dod pa dang /bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang /bsti stang du bya bar 'dod pa dang /mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
151a3(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di bris te/me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spros dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil
151a4(nyi khri): snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o//bkur stir bya'o//bsti stang du bya'o//mchod par bya'o//kau shi ka ngas don de nyid kyi dbang yang dag par mthong ste/bla na med
151a5(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di snyam ste/gang zhig la bdag gis rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang //
151a6(nyi khri): mchod pa byas te/brten cing rnam par spyad par bya snyam na'ang /kau shi ka de la ngas 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/bdud dang bcas pa/tshangs pa dang bcas pa/dge
151a7(nyi khri): sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na/nga dang 'dra ba'am/lhag pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong nas/
151b1(nyi khri): de la ngas 'di snyam du bsams te/de lta yin na bdag gis chos zhi ba bzang po gang bdag nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de nyid la rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod
151b2(nyi khri): pa byas te/brten cing rnam par spyad par bya'o snyam du bsams so//kau shi ka chos de'ang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yin to/kau shi ka de
151b3(nyi khri): ltar nga nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/bsti stang du byed/mchod par byed de/de ltar rim gro dang /bkur sti dang /bsti
151b4(nyi khri): stang dang /mchod pa byas shing rnam par spyod na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
151b5(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /thug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
151b6(nyi khri): dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
151b7(nyi khri): 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /
152a1(nyi khri): spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya ba dang /bkur
152a2(nyi khri): stir bya ba dang /bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba lta ci smos/de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems
152a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams so//byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so//de bzhin
152a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams las byung ba ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams so//kau shi ka de lta bas na byang chub
152a5(nyi khri): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo 'am/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mos//
152a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan
152a7(nyi khri): dang /ba dan dang /sil snyan sna tshogs kyis rim gror bya'o//bkur stir bya'o//bsti stang du bya'o//mchod par bya'o//de ltar de la slob pa'i rigs
152b1(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon
152b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang dgra bcom pa nyid thob bo//'thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
152b3(nyi khri): pa pa rnams kyis kyang /rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob bo//'thob bo 'thob par 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u
152b4(nyi khri): nyi shu gnyis pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
152b5(nyi khri): la la zhig gis gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
152b6(nyi khri): mo de de'i rgyus bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis
152b7(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa'am bri ba'am kha ton bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na
153a1(nyi khri): bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos gang la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
153a2(nyi khri): mo slob cing yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur pa dang /'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur pa dang /thob pa
153a3(nyi khri): dang 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur pa dang /thob pa dang 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /bla
153a4(nyi khri): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs pa dang /'jug pa dang 'jug par 'gyur
153a5(nyi khri): ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs
153a6(nyi khri): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos mang po rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
153a7(nyi khri): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dang /nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
153b1(nyi khri): rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
153b2(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa drug dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi
153b3(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang /
153b4(nyi khri): btang snyoms chen po dag ste sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/sems can gcig
153b5(nyi khri): cig rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na/de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel gyi/'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pas ni
153b6(nyi khri): ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shri ka dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa'i sems can rnams ni/sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin
153b7(nyi khri): rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba ma yin no//kau shi ka rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i sems can ni/sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas
154a1(nyi khri): dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas yongs su grol ba'i phyir te lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta ci
154a2(nyi khri): smos/kau shi ka gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa bas la la zhig gis
154a3(nyi khri): sems can gcig cig rang byang chub la bzhag na de'i bsod nams chos mang du 'phel lo//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can
154a4(nyi khri): thams cad rang byang chub la bkod pa bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis sems can gcig cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag na
154a5(nyi khri): de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sems can gcig po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhog pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi
154a6(nyi khri): tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don du zhugs pa'i phyir ro//de'ang tsa'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni rgyan tu zhugs pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid
154a7(nyi khri): kyi ngar dang rang sangs rgyas rnams so//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
154b1(nyi khri): rnams so//kau shi ka rnam grangs des na/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mchod cing rim gror bya ba yin te/'jig rten lha dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa tshangs pa dang
154b2(nyi khri): bcas pa dang /dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil snyan sna tshogs kyis
154b3(nyi khri): rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang /bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba yin par shes par bya'o//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i
154b4(nyi khri): gling gi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
154b5(nyi khri): 'phel lam/brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas
154b6(nyi khri): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la 'dri ba 'am klag pa 'am kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod
154b7(nyi khri): nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs
155a1(nyi khri): kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo//'thob
