155a2(nyi khri): bo/thob par 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/rang byang chub thob par gyur to//'thob bo//thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems
155a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po rnams kyang /yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur te 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
155a4(nyi khri): par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs por 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di lta
155a5(nyi khri): ste/pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams
155a6(nyi khri): dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
155a7(nyi khri): gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
155b1(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po dag ste/sangs
155b2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
155b3(nyi khri): glegs bam du byas te/klag pa dang bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/de ni bsod nams cher mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau
155b4(nyi khri): shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang
155b5(nyi khri): khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum dang mtshem dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang
155b6(nyi khri): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nye phan dang tshangs pa kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams dang nam mkha' mtha'
155b7(nyi khri): yas skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha rnams yang do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yod do//stong pa nyid thams cad yod
156a1(nyi khri): do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i
156a2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do//rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do//rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par
156a3(nyi khri): shes pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par
156a4(nyi khri): rig pa rnams dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do//rgyun tu
156a5(nyi khri): zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dag bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod
156a6(nyi khri): do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi
156a7(nyi khri): lam la bkod pa dang /rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi
156b1(nyi khri): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du
156b2(nyi khri): 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
156b3(nyi khri): kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir
156b4(nyi khri): zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las skyes pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
156b5(nyi khri): cad do//kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /rang byang chub kyi bar la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ko
156b6(nyi khri): shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod/rang
156b7(nyi khri): byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom
157a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/
157a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka stong gi 'jig
157a3(nyi khri): rten gyi khams byur bu lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dag pa
157a4(nyi khri): bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod pa na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
157a5(nyi khri): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas
157a6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam 'dri ba dang klag pa dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams
157a7(nyi khri): ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka stong gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po lta zhog gi/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji
157b1(nyi khri): snod pa dang //rigs kyi bu ram rigs kyi bu mo la las/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod pa dang /rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod pa na// shi ka de ji snyam du
157b2(nyi khri): sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom
157b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam du 'dri ba dang klag pa dang kha ton
157b4(nyi khri): du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog gi/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i
157b5(nyi khri): phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
157b6(nyi khri): rab tu bkod pa dang /rang byang chub kyi bar la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
157b7(nyi khri): 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am
158a1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bri ba dang klag pa dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches
158a2(nyi khri): mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag bslabs shing //
158a3(nyi khri): rigs kyi ngu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag/yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to///
158a4(nyi khri): thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//rang byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang
158a5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
158a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/'di
158a7(nyi khri): lta ste/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags
158b1(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang //
158b2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa drug dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi
158b3(nyi khri): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka
158b4(nyi khri): rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la
158b5(nyi khri): byin na/de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka da ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams
158b6(nyi khri): cad rgya cher bstan te/de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba dang bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba dang khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams
158b7(nyi khri): yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum dang mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang /tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nye phan dang tshangs pa kun
159a1(nyi khri): 'khor dang tshangs chen dang 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams dang /nam mkha' mtha' yus skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchod kyi bar gyi lha
159a2(nyi khri): rnams yod do//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
159a3(nyi khri): rtsa bdun yod do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yod do//thams cad shes pa nyid yod do//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang rnam pa thams
159a4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do//rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//
159a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod do//kau shi ka gzhan
159a6(nyi khri): yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam gtan bzhi la bkod/tshad med pa bzhi la bkod/gzugs med pa'i
159a7(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod/mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
159b1(nyi khri): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu
159b2(nyi khri): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang 'dri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
159b3(nyi khri): lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan to//kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling lta yang zhog/gling chen po
159b4(nyi khri): bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang lta zhog/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang lta zhog/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyang lta zhog/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
159b5(nyi khri): rten gyi khams lta yang zhog gi/kau shi ka shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa dang /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar
159b6(nyi khri): lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi bu
159b7(nyi khri): 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las/bsam gtan bzhi la bkod/tshad med pa bzhi la bkod/gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bkod/mngon par shes
160a1(nyi khri): pa lnga la bkod na/kau shi ka ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
160a2(nyi khri): 'das mang ngo /badri bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha
160a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang bri ba dang kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni
160a4(nyi khri): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/de dag la bslabs shing /rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i
160a5(nyi khri): skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go/'jug par 'gyur ro//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//thob bo/'thob par 'gyur ro//dgra bcom
160a6(nyi khri): po nyid kyi bar du thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thod par 'gyur ro//ra byang chub thob par gyur to//thob bo//'thob par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'
160a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to//'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
160b1(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
160b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/de'i bsod nams ches mang du
160b3(nyi khri): 'phel gyi/'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dang /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham kyi bar gyi sems can dang /phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re re zhing /'jig
160b4(nyi khri): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i
160b5(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni ma yin no//de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni 'di yin te/gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin//
160b6(nyi khri): mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /'chang ba dang klog pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed
160b7(nyi khri): pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol
161a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la
161a2(nyi khri): byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ong ma yin pa'i blos/nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang /kun chub par byed pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang
161a3(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du tshul
161a4(nyi khri): bzhin du yid la byed pa'o///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po sum cu lnga pa//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi
161a5(nyi khri): gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang
161a6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/sangs
161a7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos/rnam pa
161b1(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
161b2(nyi khri): 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher brjod cing ston la/'chad cing 'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/yang dag par ston cing de'i don gtan la
161b3(nyi khri): dbab pa ston par byed na/kau shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta ba ma yin/gnyis su med
161b4(nyi khri): par blta ba ma yin/mtshan mar ma yin/mtshan ma med par ma yin/blang bar ma yin/dor bar ma yin/dbri bar ma yin/bsnun par ma yin/kun
161b5(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs par ma yin/rnam par byang bar ma yin/skye bar ma yin/'gag par ma yin/gzung bar ma yin/mi gzung bar mi yin/len par ma
161b6(nyi khri): yin/dor bar ma yin/gnas par ma yin/mi gnas par ma yin/yang dag par ma yin/log par ma yin/ldan par ma yin/mi ldan par ma
161b7(nyi khri): yin/'gro bar ma yin/mi 'gre bar ma yin/rkyen du ma yin/rkyen med par ma yin/chos su ma yin/chos ma yin par ma yin/de bzhin nyid du
162a1(nyi khri): ma yin de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin/yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/'di ni gnyis su med pa'i don to//
162a2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher brjod cing ston la/'chad cing 'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar
162a3(nyi khri): byed la/yang dag par ston par byed cing /de'i don gtan la dbab par ston na/bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/bdag 'ba' shig gis bzung ba 'am/kun
162a4(nyi khri): chub par byas pa 'am/bcangs pa'am/bklags pa 'am/tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni ma yin no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
162a5(nyi khri): bu mo gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/'chang zhing klog la tshul bzhin du yi de la byed cing /gzhan la'ang
162a6(nyi khri): rgya cher brjod cing ston la/'chad cing 'grel pa dang /rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la/yang dag par ston par byed cing /de'i don gtan la dbab par
162a7(nyi khri): ston na/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ni shin tu mang du 'phel lo//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu
162b1(nyi khri): 'am rigs kyi bu mos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan la yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka
162b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya ste/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
162b3(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med byangs med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la las phyogs bcu kun gyi
162b4(nyi khri): phyogs re re zhing /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la/nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang phreng ba dang spos
162b5(nyi khri): dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang sil spyan sna tshogs dang bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim glor byas pa dang dkur stir byas
162b6(nyi khri): pa dang bsti stang du byas pa dang mchod par byas pa bas/kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher
162b7(nyi khri): don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par/rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas na//
163a1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de ni chos mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs te/'das
163a2(nyi khri): pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
163a3(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan
163a4(nyi khri): yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/bskal pa tshad med grangs med par dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims
163a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
163a6(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa bas ni/gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/gzhan la rgya cher brjod cing
163a7(nyi khri): ston la 'chad cing rnam par 'god pa dang /rab tu 'god cing rnam par 'byed la/gsal bar byed cing yang dag par ston pa byed ma de'i bsod noms ches mang du
163b1(nyi khri): na nas su du bya chu man na tu cu rgyu du du rnam du smram zla
163b2(nyi khri): ni 'di gtong ngo //'di la ni sbyin par bya'o snyam na/des sbyin pa de ltar btang bas sbyin pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bdag ni tshul
163b3(nyi khri): khrims bsrung ngo //tshul khrims ni 'di bsrung ngo snyam na/des tshul khrims de ltar bsrungs pas/tshul khrims nyid du 'gyur gyi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
163b4(nyi khri): ma yin no//bdag ni bzod pa bsgom mo//bzod pa ni 'di bsgrim mo snyam na/des bzod pa de ltar bsgoms pas bzang pa nyid du 'gyur gyi/bzod pa'i pha rol tu
163b5(nyi khri): phyin pa ma yin no//bdag ni brtson 'grus brtsom mo//'di'i don du brtson 'grus brtsam mo snyam na/des brtson 'grus de ltar brtsams pas/brtson 'grus
163b6(nyi khri): nyid du 'gyur gyi/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bdag ni bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug go//bsam gtan ni 'di dag la mnyam par
163b7(nyi khri): bzhag go snyam na/des bsam gtan la de ltar mnyam par bzhag pas/bsam gtan nyid du 'gyur gyi/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//bdag ni shes
164a1(nyi khri): rab bsgom mo//shes rab ni 'di bsgom mo snyam na des shes rab de ltar bsgoms pas/shes rab nyid du 'gyur gyi/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
164a2(nyi khri): yin no//kau shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar dmigs pa la spyod pas ni/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims
164a3(nyi khri): dang bzod pa de dang /brtson 'grus dang /bsam gtan dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/
164a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar spyad na/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ji ltar spyad na tshul khrims
164a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ji ltar spyad na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ji ltar spyad na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
164a6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ji ltar spyad na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ji ltar spyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
164a7(nyi khri): phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gtong
164b1(nyi khri): 2/yongs su gtong ba myi dmigs/sbyin pa dang len pa mi dmigs so//tshul khrims bsrung ba'i tshe/tshul khrims dang tshul khrims yang dag par blang bar
164b2(nyi khri): dmigs so//bzod pa bsgom pa'i tshe/bzod pa dang bzod pa bsgom pa mi dmigs so//brtson 'grus bcom pa'i tshe/brtson 'grus dang /brtson 'grus brtsom pa
164b3(nyi khri): mi dmigs so//bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshe/bsam gtan dang bsam gtan bsgom pa mi dmigs so//shes rab bsgom pa'i tshe/shes rab
164b4(nyi khri): dang shes rab bsgom pa dang /shes rab dang ldan pa mi dmigs so//kau shi ka de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/sbyin pa'i pha
164b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
164b6(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//kau shIka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar khong du chud pa med par
164b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i
165a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus ma
165a2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston pa 'byung ste/der rigs kyi bu
165a3(nyi khri): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag gis kyang /gzugs brnyan de thos nas/lam ston par 'gyur te/de dag la
165a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bya'o//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
165a5(nyi khri): gzugs brnyan gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
165a6(nyi khri): to snyam zhing de dag gzugs brnyan ston pa byed pa'o//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ji ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
165a7(nyi khri): gzugs brnyan ston pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
165b1(nyi khri): pa ston par byed pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston te/de la 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan te/'di ltar gzugs mi rtag go zhes
165b2(nyi khri): bya bar ston/gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes
165b3(nyi khri): pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya
165b4(nyi khri): bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes brjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par
165b5(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par
165b6(nyi khri): shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang mi sdug
165b7(nyi khri): ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag gzugs mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /
166a1(nyi khri): me stug/gzhes bya dang /rkyong ba dang 'du shes dang 'du khyod dang rnam par shes pa ma d+haldan zhes bya ba dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par
166a2(nyi khri): shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dong bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtag pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro//
166a3(nyi khri): mirtag go zhes bya bar ston/mig sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag myed do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid mi rtag go
166a4(nyi khri): zhes bya bar ston/rna ba dang sna dang l-I dang lus dang yid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/gzugs mi rtag go zhes
166a5(nyi khri): byubya bar ston/gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bangagi med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/sgra da'i dri dang ro dang reg dang chos mi rtag go zhes bya bar
166a6(nyi khri): masradang dri dang ro dang rig dang chos sug bsnga ba lo zhes bya ba deng bdog bde nas bya dang po sdug gi'is sto/thig gi rnab par shes pa mi rtag na zhes
166a7(nyi khri): bar ston/mig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sna
166b1(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar
166b2(nyi khri): ston/mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/rna ba'i
166b3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston rna ba'i 'dus te reg
166b4(nyi khri): pa dang sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes
166b5(nyi khri): bya bar ston/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do/
166b6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i
166b7(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/rna ba'i 'dus te reg
167a1(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
167a2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/sa'i khams mi rtag go/
167a3(nyi khri): zhes bya bar ston/sa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung
167a4(nyi khri): gi khams dang /nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/chu'i khams dang /me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang /
167a5(nyi khri): nam mkha'i khams dang /rnam par shes pa'i khams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/ma rig pa mi
167a6(nyi khri): rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ma rig pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/'du byed dang rnam par shes pa
167a7(nyi khri): dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang rig pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba dang rga shi mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/'du byed dang rnam
167b1(nyi khri): par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang /skye ba dang rga shi sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba
167b2(nyi khri): dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi
167b3(nyi khri): sdug go zhes bya bar ston/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
167b4(nyi khri): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
167b5(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/nang
167b6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/dngos po med
167b7(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes
168a1(nyi khri): bya ba dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba
168a2(nyi khri): dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags
168a3(nyi khri): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam
168a4(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag go/
168a5(nyi khri): zhes bya bar ston/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya bar ston/rnam pa thams
168a6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med do zhes bya ba dang mi sdug go zhes bya
168a7(nyi khri): bar ston cing /'di skad du gang de ltar ston pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/su la bstan pa de dag kyang gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog
168b1(nyi khri): par 'gyur ro//gzugs sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /mi sdug ces bya bar rnam par rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
168b2(nyi khri): bar du mi rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya ba dang /bdag med ces bya ba dang /mi sdug ces bya bar rtog par
168b3(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang //
168b4(nyi khri): bdag med do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang /mi sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur te/kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha
168b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gzugs brnyan no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na 'di ltar ston te/tshur
168b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro///
168b7(nyi khri): sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro//tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
169a1(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /byang chub sems
169a2(nyi khri): dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro//sa bcu pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro zhes/de'ang mtshan ma'i tshul dang /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston te/de dus kyi 'du
169a3(nyi khri): shes kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyur te/kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
169a4(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu
169a5(nyi khri): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms na/nyan thos kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro//
169a6(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes ston te/kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
169a7(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa na 'di ltar
169b1(nyi khri): sto te/chur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang /byang chub sems dpa
169b2(nyi khri): skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur ro//mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro//khyod kyis de ltar mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
169b3(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa la gnas te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la/rim gro dang bkur sti dang bsti stang dang mchod
169b4(nyi khri): par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
169b5(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na 'di skad ston te/rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par
169b6(nyi khri): byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de ni bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
169b7(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
170a1(nyi khri): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
170a2(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan
170a3(nyi khri): las 'das pa'i bar gyi/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/rjes su dga' bar gyis la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
170a4(nyi khri): tu yongs su bsngos shig ces/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag de ltar ston cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to//brgya byin gyis
170a5(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/
170a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag
170a7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
170b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis skyong ste/gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin
170b2(nyi khri): pade ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya 'am/gzugs
170b3(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la gzugs nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
170b4(nyi khri): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
170b5(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/tshor
170b6(nyi khri): bA mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/de ci'i
170b7(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa
171a1(nyi khri): do ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi
171a2(nyi khri): dmigs so//de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo
171a3(nyi khri): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de dag/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
171a4(nyi khri): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig
171a5(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin
171a6(nyi khri): gyis stong ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
171a7(nyi khri): pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//de la
171b1(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med na/rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/kau shi ka gzhan de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab
171b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
171b3(nyi khri): bu mo de dag la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/chos gang las kyang yongs su 'da' bar ma
171b4(nyi khri): byed cig/chos gang la'ang gnas gnas par ma byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am/gang la
171b5(nyi khri): gnas par bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang
171b6(nyi khri): yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni blang bar bya ba'am//
171b7(nyi khri): dor bar bya ba 'am/bskyed par bya ba 'am/dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yang med do zhes ston te/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
172a1(nyi khri): ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to//kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
172a2(nyi khri): pa'i don bstan par bya ste/kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
172a3(nyi khri): bu mo snga ma dag gi ni ma yin no//kau shI ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/rgyun tu zhugs
172a4(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan
172a5(nyi khri): 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab
172a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par
172a7(nyi khri): bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/
172b1(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/chos de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir
172b2(nyi khri): zhe na/kau shaM ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can lnga yang zhog/gling tshun
172b3(nyi khri): po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta yang zhog/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta yang zhog/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring
172b4(nyi khri): po'i sems can lta yang zhog/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta yang zhog gi/kau shi ka phyogs
172b5(nyi khri): bcu'i phyogs re re zhing /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs
172b6(nyi khri): pa'i 'bras bu la bkod na/kau shi ka da ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lo//gsol pa/bcom
172b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/
173a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba
173a2(nyi khri): dang yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs
173a3(nyi khri): shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du
173a4(nyi khri): 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling
173a5(nyi khri): gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dag
173a6(nyi khri): bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas mang du 'phel
173a7(nyi khri): lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am
173b1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste

173b3(nyi khri): chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ches de'i
173b4(nyi khri): bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa
173b5(nyi khri): nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro//kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
173b6(nyi khri): bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la bkod pa lta'ang zhog/gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
173b7(nyi khri): byur bu'i sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
174a1(nyi khri): can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la bkod pa lta'ang zhog go/phyogs

174a6(nyi khri): rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes

174b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zung zhig kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lhogs shig/tshul bzhin du yi la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
175a1(nyi khri): nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi
175a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
175a3(nyi khri): rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas
175a4(nyi khri): kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag

175a6(nyi khri): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang
175a7(nyi khri): dag par bskul ba byas pa lta'ang zhog/gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can
175b1(nyi khri): lta'ang zhog/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lha'ang zhog/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag bla na med pa

176a2(nyi khri): pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe//

176a5(nyi khri): par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/chos de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de
176a6(nyi khri): ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so//kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling

176b6(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen po nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe
176b7(nyi khri): khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
177a1(nyi khri): ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
177a2(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'
177a3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'o//kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta'ang zhog/gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig
177a4(nyi khri): rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta'ang
177a5(nyi khri): zhog/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta'ang zhog gi/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs

177b6(nyi khri): chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob por gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

178a2(nyi khri): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/de dag la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu

178a5(nyi khri): la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
178a6(nyi khri): phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
178a7(nyi khri): bslob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams
178b1(nyi khri): thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//kau shi
178b2(nyi khri): ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa lta'ang zhog/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems
178b3(nyi khri): can lta'ang zhog/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byung bu'i sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gsum gyi stong
178b4(nyi khri): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa lta'ang zhog/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i
178b5(nyi khri): phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs
178b6(nyi khri): par gyur te/de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /
178b7(nyi khri): bshad do bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang /'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung zhig/
179a1(nyi khri): kun chub par gyis shig/chongs shig/lcogs shig/tshul bzhin du yod la gyis shig/ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan
179a2(nyi khri): tan du gyis shig/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
179a3(nyi khri): la slob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams
179a4(nyi khri): thob par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
179a5(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can ji snyed po de dag thams
179a6(nyi khri): cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
179a7(nyi khri): bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal
179b1(nyi khri): ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du/bdag myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
179b2(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang
179b3(nyi khri): ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag
179b4(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta'ang zhog/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta 'ang zhog/stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems
179b5(nyi khri): can lta'ang zhog/stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lta'ang zhog/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams bla na med
179b6(nyi khri): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa lta'ang zhog gi/kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
179b7(nyi khri): sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
180a1(nyi khri): de dag la/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang /
180a2(nyi khri): bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang /yang dag par bstan pa byas pa bas/de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la la zhig 'di skad du/bdag
180a3(nyi khri): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes zer la/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/de la shes rab
180a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par rgya cher brjod de bstan na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo//de ci'i phyir
180a5(nyi khri): zhe na/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni nges pa ste/rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gzhol zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
180a6(nyi khri): chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas na/de dag la ni de tsam du chos bstan kyang mi dgos kyi/'di ni 'khor ba nas 'byung bar 'dod la/snying rje chen pos mnar ba'i
180a7(nyi khri): phyir ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
180b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes
180b2(nyi khri): su bstan par bgyi'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
180b3(nyi khri): pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//nang stong pa nyid la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo
180b4(nyi khri): bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
180b5(nyi khri): dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gdams shing rjes su bstan par
180b6(nyi khri): bgyi'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar
180b7(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams
181a1(nyi khri): dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan par 'gyi'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
181a2(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi'o//
181a3(nyi khri): gos dang bsod snyoms dang mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyis kyang rjes su gzung bar bgyi ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la chos kyis bsdu ba
181a4(nyi khri): dang /zang zing gis bsdu bas rjes su 'dzin pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo ste ma
181a5(nyi khri): dag ni ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das de ni yong yang de ltar 'gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang lags pa de ni
181a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad dang /'phags pa'i bden pa
181a7(nyi khri): rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//rnam par thar pa
181b1(nyi khri): brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gdams
181b2(nyi khri): shing rjes su bstan pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs
181b3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gdams shing rjes su bstan pa'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/kau shi ka de ltar
181b4(nyi khri): khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mos pa bskyed pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang yongs su skyong ba lags so//legs so//kau
181b5(nyi khri): shi ka khyod kyis de bzhin du bya'o//'phags pa nyan thos gang sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par 'dod pa des kyang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
181b6(nyi khri): rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos pa bskyed par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams zang zing dang /chos kyis phan gdags pas phan
181b7(nyi khri): gdags shing yongs su bskyang bar bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems
182a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de dag las 'byung ngo //gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi bskyed na//
182a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslab pa ma yin/nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang
182a3(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
182a4(nyi khri): rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge
182a5(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
182a6(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa ma yin te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro//bla na med pa yang dag
182a7(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur na/rang sangs rgyas dang /nyan thos rnams kyang yod par mi 'gyur te/kau shi ka byang chub
182b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la yang slob la/stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden
182b2(nyi khri): pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
182b3(nyi khri): pa dgu dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang
182b4(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la'ang slob pas/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
182b5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
182b6(nyi khri): rgyas pa dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can dmyal ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten
182b7(nyi khri): rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur ro//lha ma yin gyi ris kyang yongs su 'grib par 'gyur ro//lha'i ris kyang mngon por 'phel bar 'gyur ro//rgyal rigs
183a1(nyi khri): tshe zhing mtho ba rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams dang /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams
183a2(nyi khri): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang /mtsho ma dang
183a3(nyi khri): dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshangs ris dang tshangs lha nya phan dang /tshangs
183a4(nyi khri): ba kun 'khor dang tshangs chen dang snang ba dang chung snang dang tshod med snang ba dang kun snang dang ba dang dge ba dang chung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang dge rgyas dang che ba dang
183a5(nyi khri): chung che dang tshad med che ba dang 'bras bu che ba dang mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang shin tu mthong ba dang gya nom snang ba dang 'og min gyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar
183a6(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min
183a7(nyi khri): skye mched kyi lha rnams 'jig rten du 'byung por 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
183b1(nyi khri): dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nang
183b2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
183b3(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar
183b4(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'jig
183b5(nyi khri): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang
183b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//nyan thos kyi theg pa 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'jig
183b7(nyi khri): rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//theg pa chen po 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/brgya byin gyi le'u
184a1(nyi khri): ste nyi shu gsum pa'o///de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/gnas brtan
184a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor la smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin
184a3(nyi khri): pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/de mi dmigs pa'i
184a4(nyi khri): tshul gyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa dang /sems can thams cad kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i
184a5(nyi khri): bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
184a6(nyi khri): tshul khrims las byung ba dang /sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag las/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184a7(nyi khri): po'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
184b1(nyi khri): chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di nyid rab ces bya'o//dam pa zhes bya'o//gtso bo zhes bya'o//mchog ces bya'o//phul zhes bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//bla na med
184b2(nyi khri): pa zhes bya'o//gong na med pa zhes bya'o//mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
184b3(nyi khri): pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po sum cu drug pa//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
184b4(nyi khri): bya ba'i dngos po dang tshul khrims las byung ba dang sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni bdag gdul ba dang /bdag zhi bar bya ba dang bdag yongs su mya
184b5(nyi khri): ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ste/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
184b6(nyi khri): dang bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa
184b7(nyi khri): med pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa drug
185a1(nyi khri): dag kyang /bdag gdul ba dang /bdag zhi bar bya ba dang bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par zad kyi/byang chub
185a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad gdul ba dang /zhi bar bya ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams
185a3(nyi khri): bya ba'i dngos po sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
185a4(nyi khri): bsngo'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so//de ltar byang chub
185a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang
185a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag dang /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shwar dang shar lho
185a7(nyi khri): dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing /'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med dpag tu med pa dag gi/'jig rten gyi khams
185b1(nyi khri): re rer yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa de dag thugs dang po bskyed pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
185b2(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang /
185b3(nyi khri): dam pa'i chos nub kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa dang /nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag gi sbyin pa
185b4(nyi khri): las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /tshul khrims las byung ba dang /sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /slob pa de dag
185b5(nyi khri): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang /mi slob pa de dag gri dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa dag dang /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
185b6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol
185b7(nyi khri): ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang /phan par bzhed pa dang thugs rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos grangs med tshad med pa dang /sangs rgyas
186a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa dang /chos bstan pa de la bslabs shing rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /lan
186a2(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub thob pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i
186a3(nyi khri): skyon med par zhugs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhugs kyang rung /yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung
186a4(nyi khri): ste/de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa de thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gtso bo dam pa/rab phul gya nom pa/bla
186a5(nyi khri): na med pa/gong na med pa/mnyam pa med pa/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ste/de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/rjes su yi rang ba dang
186a6(nyi khri): ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par
186a7(nyi khri): gyur cig ces/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs
186b1(nyi khri): pa des de skad du smras te/sems kyi rnam pa de lta bus yongs su bsngos na/dmigs pa gang dang dngos po gang dag gis sems de lta bu skyes par gyur pa'i dngos po de dag
186b2(nyi khri): dang /dmigs pa de dag rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs su yod pa yin nam/byams pas smras pa/byang chub sems
186b3(nyi khri): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ji ltar mtshan mar byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du/dngos po
186b4(nyi khri): de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag dmigs su yod pa ma yin no//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/gal te de ltar dngos po med pa de dag dmigs su med na/sangs
186b5(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa de dag dang /de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge
186b6(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /slob pa
186b7(nyi khri): rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /mi slob pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus gsogs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
187a1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos na/ji ltar mi rtag pa la rtag go zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log dang /sems phyin ci log pa dang /
187a2(nyi khri): lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa dang /sdug bsngal ba la bde zhes bya ba dang /bdag med pa la bdag ces bya ba dang /mi gtsang ba la gtsang zhes bya bar 'du shes phyin ci log pa
187a3(nyi khri): dang /sems phyin ci log pa dang /lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa de ltar de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu ma gyur tam/de lta yin yang thams cad dngos po ji lta ba dang /dmigs
187a4(nyi khri): pa ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/sems kyang de bzhin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
187a5(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes
187a6(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yang de bzhin/mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid kyang de bzhin/gzugs dang /sgra dang //
187a7(nyi khri): dri dang /ro dang /reg dang /chos kyang de bzhin/khams dang skye mched dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang de bzhin/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
187b1(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang de bzhin/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar yang de bzhin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams/
187b2(nyi khri): dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar
187b3(nyi khri): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
187b4(nyi khri): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin te/gal te de ltar dngos po ji lta ba dang /dmigs pa ji
187b5(nyi khri): lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/sems kyang de bzhin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha
187b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin/nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyo bar yang de bzhin/dran pa nye
187b7(nyi khri): bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam
188a1(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar
188a2(nyi khri): pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
188a3(nyi khri): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
188a4(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/dmigs pa de ni gang zhig yin/byang chub de ni gang
188a5(nyi khri): zhig yin/sems de ni gang zhig yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig yin/rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de ni gang zhig yin/byams pas smras pa/gal
188a6(nyi khri): te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur cing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis kyang yongs su zin pa
188a7(nyi khri): dang /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs pa de dag ni/dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de
188b1(nyi khri): dag dang /rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mtshan mar byas shing /blun modang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi bsdu'o//de dag ni 'di ltar yongs su bcwo
188b2(nyi khri): ste/gnyis kyi tshul gyis ma yin no//gnyis su meng pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//mtshan ma'i tshul gyis ma yin no//mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma
188b3(nyi khri): yin no//dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//nyon mongs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin no//rnam par byang ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no//skye ba'i tshul gyis ma yin no//'gag pa'i tshul gyis
188b4(nyi khri): ma yin no//gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod spyod pa yang ma yin/sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa yang ma yin/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa
188b5(nyi khri): yang ma yin/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa yang ma yin/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la bslabs par gyur pa yang ma yin na/de dag ni dngos po de dag dang //
188b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa de dgu dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing /bla na med
188b7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur te/btsun pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa lagasar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
189a1(nyi khri): dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha
189a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
