189a3(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams
189a4(nyi khri): dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//'phags
189a5(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas
189a6(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams
189a7(nyi khri): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi
189b1(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang //
189b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ltar bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams de ltar
189b3(nyi khri): bstan pa ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du mi bshad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni de la dad pa tsam mam/dga' ba tsam mam/mos pa tsam mam/gus pa
189b4(nyi khri): tsam zhig yod pa de yang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir te/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad cing bstan to//dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs
189b5(nyi khri): su zin pa dang /sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa 'di
189b6(nyi khri): bshad par bya'o//bstan par bya'o//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin
189b7(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o//bstan par bya'o//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o//bstan par
190a1(nyi khri): bya'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
190a2(nyi khri): rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
190a3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa
190a4(nyi khri): rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa
190a5(nyi khri): chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad de ltar bstan pa bshad par bya'o//bstan par bya'o//thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes
190a6(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ltar bstan par bshad par bya'o//bstan par bya'o//de'i mdun du rang gi mtshan nyid kyi stong pa'i chos rnams bshad par bya'o//bstan par
190a7(nyi khri): bya'o//des ni de thos na mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur te/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po
190b1(nyi khri): ya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu da ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byams pa sems gang gis rjes su yi rang zhing /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na
190b2(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ba'i sems de ni zad cing 'gags la med de rnam par gyur la/dngos po de dag dang /dmigs pa de dag dang /dge
190b3(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang zad cing 'gagasol med de rnam par gyur na/rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems de ni gang zhig/dngos po de dag ni gang zhig/dmigs pa de dag ni gang zhig/dge
190b4(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni gang zhig/kla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ci sems kyis sems yongs su bsngo 'am/de ltar sems
190b5(nyi khri): kyis sems yongs su bsngo na ni/sems gnyis 'phrad par 'gyur ba med de/sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//gal
190b6(nyi khri): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'o//
190b7(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos
191a1(nyi khri): po med pa'o//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang //
191a2(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni dngos po med pa'o//'phags pa'i bden
191a3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
191a4(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams ni dngos po med pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /
191a5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
191a6(nyi khri): brgyad ni dngos po med pa'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub dang /thams cad
191a7(nyi khri): shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya bar shes na/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
191b1(nyi khri): rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na bla na med pa yang dag par
191b2(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/gnas brtan rab 'byor la smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub
191b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na/'jigs shing dngang ba 'am/skrag par mi 'gyur ramo btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
191b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya/ji ltar na des rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs
191b5(nyi khri): su bzung zhing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la dmigs
191b6(nyi khri): nas/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /shes
191b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
192a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i
192a2(nyi khri): tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/nang stong pa nyid la spyod cing /nang stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
192a3(nyi khri): la spyod cing /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod cing /dran pa nye bar
192a4(nyi khri): bzhag pa de dag kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan
192a5(nyi khri): lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod cing /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/'phags
192a6(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
192a7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin
192b1(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod cing /
192b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed/thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam
192b3(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin par byed na/des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
192b4(nyi khri): mos pa mang ba dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
192b5(nyi khri): pa la mos pa mang ba dang /nang stong pa nyid la mos pa mang ba dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mos pa mang ba dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mos pa mang ba dang /
192b6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mos pa mang ba dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
192b7(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la mos pa mang ba dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi
193a1(nyi khri): sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs
193a2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mos pa mang ba dang /thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos pa mang bar 'gyur ro///
193a3(nyi khri): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par 'gyur ro//dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par ston par 'gyur te/de'ang byang
193a4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du/ci nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
193a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to//stong pa nyid thams
193a6(nyi khri): cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
193a7(nyi khri): rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang
193b1(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
193b2(nyi khri): po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston to//de la bdud kyi las rnams kyang ston par gyur to//nges bdud kyi los de dag thos nas 'grib pa 'am/
193b3(nyi khri): 'phel ba med par 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar bdud kyi las de dag la ngo bo nyid med do//de ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud kyi bar du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
193b4(nyi khri): rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur te/de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed par 'gyur ro//dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro//byang chub
193b5(nyi khri): sems dpa'i rigs de dang yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro//kau shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems
193b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas/shar phyogs dang /lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /
193b7(nyi khri): 'og dang /steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa dag na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med
194a1(nyi khri): pa bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das spros pa'i tshul chung par gyur pa/tshig gi lam nyams pa mi mnga' ba/khur bor ba/grong gi tsher
194a2(nyi khri): ma rab tu bsal ba/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su chad pa/yang dag par yongs su mkhyen pas/thugs shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
194a3(nyi khri): dang bcas pa de dag gis bsod nams mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /de dag tu rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba 'am
194a4(nyi khri): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha 'am/sum cu rtsa gsum mam/mtshe ma 'am/dga' ldan nam/'phrul dga' 'am/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dam/tshangs ris sam/tshangs lha nye phan nam/
194a5(nyi khri): tshangs pa kun 'khor ram/tshangs chen nam/snang ba 'am/chung snang ngam/tshad med snang ba 'am/kun snang drang ba 'am/dge ba'am/chung dge 'am/tshad med dge ba 'am/dge rgyas sam/
194a6(nyi khri): che ba 'am/chung che 'am/tshad med che ba 'am/'bras bu che ba 'am/mi che ba 'am/mi gdung ba 'am/shin tu mthong ba 'am/gya nom snang ba 'am/'og min gyi lha rnams sam/sus
194a7(nyi khri): kyang rung ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed cig bskyed pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/mchog phul/gtso bo gya
194b1(nyi khri): nom pa/bla na med pa/gong na med pa/mnyam pa med pa/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang bar byas te/rjes su yi rang bar byas nas kyang /sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
194b2(nyi khri): byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
194b3(nyi khri): smras so//gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos
194b4(nyi khri): kyi dge 'dun rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad la sems shing bsams nas/rjes su yi rang ba'i rab dam pa/mchog phul/gtso bo gya nom pa/bla na med pa/gong na med pa/mnyam
194b5(nyi khri): pa med pa/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ba dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed na/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
194b6(nyi khri): po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba yin/sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba yin/lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byams pa gal te byang chub sems
194b7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag la sems kyang /de la sangs rgyas su 'du shes par mi 'gyur/nyan thos su 'du shes par mi
195a1(nyi khri): 'gyur/dge ba'i rtsa bar 'du shes par mi 'gyur zhing /sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la yang sems kyi 'du shes su mi 'gyur na/da ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang
195a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med do//sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med do//lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ba med do//gal te byang chub sems
195a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la sems shing /mtshan mar 'dzin la mtshan mar bzung nas/bla na
195a4(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro//sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro//lta ba
195a5(nyi khri): phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang bcas pa de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la
195a6(nyi khri): sems pa'i sems de la yang dag par sems shing /'di ltar zad pa la zad ces bya bar shes la/gang zad pa des yongs su bsngo bar mi nus te/sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems
195a7(nyi khri): de nyid kyi chos nyid kyang de yin la/chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de'i chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes/gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ste log pa ma yin no//
195b1(nyi khri): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da
195b2(nyi khri): ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs drang po bskyed pa nas/dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge
195b3(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa dang /de dag tu so so'i skye bo mang pos dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /chos bstan pa gang ji snyed cig thos pa dang /de dag tu lha dang /klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang
195b4(nyi khri): lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am tso dang /lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams sam/bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba
195b5(nyi khri): rnams sam/khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams som/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams sam/'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig bskyed pa dang /dam pa'i chos
195b6(nyi khri): ji snyed cig thos te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te/gcig tu brtul nas tshad bzung ste/rjes su yi rang ba'i rab/mchog phul/
195b7(nyi khri): dam pa/gya nom pa/bla na med pa/gong na med pa/mnyam pa med pa/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas/de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing
196a1(nyi khri): gal te 'di ltar chos de dag ni zad do//'gags so//med do//rnam par gyur to//gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes/gal te de ltar yongs su
196a2(nyi khri): bsngo na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no//gal te 'di ltar chos kyis chos yongs su bsngo bar mi bya ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar chos
196a3(nyi khri): thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes la/gal te de ltar yongs su bsngo na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de dag ni de ltar na/byang chub
196a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
196a5(nyi khri): dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro//sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro//lta ba phyin ci log tu mi
196a6(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yongs su bsngo ba la mngon par chags pa med do//dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la'ang mngon par chags pa med do//
196a7(nyi khri): byang chub de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //gang la chags par 'gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
196b1(nyi khri): po'i yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa'o//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams kyis dben par
196b2(nyi khri): shes te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
196b3(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas dben par shes/nang stong pa nyid kyis dben par shes/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dben par shes/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu
196b4(nyi khri): rtsa bdun gyis dben par shes/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
196b5(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis dben par shes
196b6(nyi khri): debazhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis
196b7(nyi khri): dben par shes na/rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
197a1(nyi khri): bsngos pa yin no//gal te de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de/rjes su yi rang ba
197a2(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bya ba de nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben par shes te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//
197a3(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//mngon par 'du bya ba de dag ni mngon par 'du bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//byang chub kyi sems de ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ngo bo
197a4(nyi khri): nyid kyis dben no//yongs su bsngo ba ni yongs su bsngo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
197a5(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
197a6(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid
197a7(nyi khri): kyis dben no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo
197b1(nyi khri): nyid kyis dben no//phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid
197b2(nyi khri): kyis dben no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /
197b3(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /
197b4(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dben no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi
197b5(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis
197b6(nyi khri): dben no zhes bya bar shes na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des dben pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
197b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag
198a1(nyi khri): gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na/'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du/dge ba'i rtsa ba
198a2(nyi khri): 'di dag kyang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ste/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba 'di yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa 'o//sems gang gis bsngo ba'i sems de yang
198a3(nyi khri): de dang tshul mthun te/de'i ngo bo nyid do zhes/gal te de ltar shes na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/de ltar yongs su bsngo na/'du shes phyin ci
198a4(nyi khri): log tu mi 'gyur ro//sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro//lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro//gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
198a5(nyi khri): mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su shes na/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no//'ongs pa'i
198a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag kyang mtshan ma ma yin/mtshan ma'i yul ma yin no zhes gal te de ltar sems na'ang mtshan mar byed pa yin gyis/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med
198a7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te/de ltar na de'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro//sems phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro//lta ba phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro//
198b1(nyi khri): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang /sems bskyed pa de dag yongs su shes pa med cing
198b2(nyi khri): mtshan mar mi byed na/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin te/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi
198b3(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro//lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro//byams pas smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de
198b4(nyi khri): dngag la mtshan mar mi byed cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
198b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di la thabs mkhas pa de dag bslab par bya ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa rig par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha
198b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//byams pas smras pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med de
198b7(nyi khri): mi dmigs so zhes bya ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang /gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i sems bskyed pa de dag kyang med de
199a1(nyi khri): mi dmigs so zhes bya ba 'di skyon du smos par mi 'gyur ram snyam na/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di
199a2(nyi khri): ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/bdag gi lus de dag kyang 'gags par gyur/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang /sems bskyed pa de dag kyang 'gags par gyur na
199a3(nyi khri): bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang /mngon par 'du bya ba de dag dang /sems bskyed pa de dag la mtshan mar byas shing rnam par rtog par blta/de
199a4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/de ltar mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la rjes su dgyes pa dang /mngon par bsngags pa ma
199a5(nyi khri): mdzad do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mtshan mar byas shing /rnam par brtags te dmigs pa ni/de'i dmigs pa chen
199a6(nyi khri): por 'gyur te/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pas/mi dmigs shing mtshan ma med par byas te yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/
199a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dang /mtshan ma'i 'du shes can gyi yongs su bsngo ba de ni don che bar
199b1(nyi khri): ma gsungs so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug can zug rngu can to/'di lta ste dper na kha zas bsod pa/kha dog phun sum tshogs pa/dri phun sum tshogs pa zhig yod kyang dug dang 'dres
199b2(nyi khri): par gyur na/kha dog dang dri dang /ro yid du 'ong ba'ang yin mod kyi 'on kyang dug can du zad na/de la skyes bu byis pa'i ngang tshul can/shes rab 'chal pa'i ngang tshul can ni bza' bar sems te/
199b3(nyi khri): des de zos na yang kha dog dang /dri dang /re zhim par tshor mod kyi/sdug bsngal dang /sdug bsngal gyi rnam par smin par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du 'di la log par rig pa dang /log par shes pa dang /
199b4(nyi khri): log par bslabs pa las don ma rtogs mi shes shing 'di skad du ston te/tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs
199b5(nyi khri): dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar dang /phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su
199b6(nyi khri): mya ngan los 'das kyi bar dang /dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /bsam
199b7(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/dge ba'i
200a1(nyi khri): rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /bsam gtan bzhi la bsgoms pa dang /chad
200a2(nyi khri): med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam
200a3(nyi khri): par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de
200a4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
200a5(nyi khri): la bsgoms te/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa
200a6(nyi khri): gang dag gis/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su dag par gyur pa dang /yongs su dag pa dang /yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang /sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad par gyur pa dang
200a7(nyi khri): yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab
200b1(nyi khri): phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /mi nyams pa'i chos nyid dang /rtag tu btang
200b2(nyi khri): snyoms su gnas pa dang /nyan thos de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med pa rnams dang /gang gis der dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa dang /rjes su yi rang ba dang /rjes su yi
200b3(nyi khri): rung bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis rang sangs rgyas rnams lung bstan par gyur pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /lung bstan par 'gyur ba dang /der lha dang /klu dang gnod
200b4(nyi khri): sbyin dang /dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang /bskyed pa dang /bskyed par gyur pa de dag thams cad mngon
200b5(nyi khri): par bsdus te/gcig tu brtul la tshad bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos shig ces bya bar ston te/de ltar bsngo ba des/mtshan ma'i tshul dang
200b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngos na/dug tu 'gyur ba yin no//'di lta ste dper na/zas dug can de dang 'dra bar dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo ba med do//de ci'i phyir
200b7(nyi khri): zhe na/dmigs pa ni dug dang bcas pa ste/mtshan ma dang bcas pa/rgyu dang bcas pa/rkyen dang bcas pa ste/de de ltar yongs su bsngos na/de bzhin gshegs pa la skur par 'gyur/de
201a1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin/chos bzhin du smra ba yang ma yin par 'gyur te/de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am//
201a2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mos ji ltar na 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtse ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ste/yongs su bsngo bar bya/ji ltar na
201a3(nyi khri): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/bla na med
201a4(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar dang /phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang /
201a5(nyi khri): dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur gyi bar du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang
201a6(nyi khri): mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
201a7(nyi khri): pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad de/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /
201b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi la bsgoms pa dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang
201b2(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par
201b3(nyi khri): shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa
201b4(nyi khri): chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bsgoms te/dge ba'i rtse ba gang ji snyed cig mngon par 'du mdzad par gyur pa dang /mngon par 'du mdzad pa dang /
201b5(nyi khri): mngon par 'du mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang dag gis/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su dag par gyur pa dang /yongs su dag pa dang /yongs su
201b6(nyi khri): dag par 'gyur ba dang /sems can mang po yongs su smin par mdzad par gyur pa dang /yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom
201b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po
202a1(nyi khri): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /mi nyams pa'i chos nyid dang /rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa dang /nyan thos de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba zag pa med
202a2(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /gang gis der dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa dang /rjes su yi rang ba dang /rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/
202a3(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas rnams lung bstan par gyur pa dang /lung bstan pa dang /lung bstan par 'gyur ba dang /de ltar lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding
202a4(nyi khri): dang /mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par gyur pa dang /bskyed pa dang /skyed par 'gyur ba rnams la rjes su yi rang ste/yongs su bsngos na dge ba'i rtsa ba de
202a5(nyi khri): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos par 'gyur ba snyam du bslab par mi bya'o//rab 'byor gyis smras pa/byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i
202a6(nyi khri): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/de bzhin gshegs pa la skur par 'gyur ba med par 'dod pas/'di ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya/
202a7(nyi khri): ste/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pas/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi ngang tshul
202b1(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang /rang bzhin gang yin pa dang /mtshan nyid gang yin pa thugs su chud de/mkhyen la rab tu mkhyen cing chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du/bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o///
202b2(nyi khri): ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thugs su chud pa de bzhin du/bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
202b3(nyi khri): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/de ltar yongs su bsngos na/de bzhin gshegs pa
202b4(nyi khri): la skur par mi 'gyur//de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba dang /chos bzhin du smra bar 'gyur ro//de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongs su bsngo ba de
202b5(nyi khri): dug med cing bdud rtsi'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'di
202b6(nyi khri): ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/ji ltar gzugs 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'ongs
202b7(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin/mi 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med
203a1(nyi khri): pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//skye mched rnams
203a2(nyi khri): dang /khams rnams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa mi yin pa
203a3(nyi khri): de ni 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi
203a4(nyi khri): khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yon/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
203a5(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs
203a6(nyi khri): med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos
203a7(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das
203b1(nyi khri): pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs
203b2(nyi khri): su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /
203b3(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa
203b4(nyi khri): dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag
203b5(nyi khri): par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su
203b6(nyi khri): chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de
203b7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs
204a1(nyi khri): kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma
204a2(nyi khri): yin no//tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /mi nyams pa'i
204a3(nyi khri): chos nyid dang /rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa
204a4(nyi khri): de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar de ni khongs su ma chud pa'i phyir te/de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba'ang khongs su chud pa
204a5(nyi khri): ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//chos gang la yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de'ang khongs su chud pa ma
204a6(nyi khri): yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//gang yongs su bsngo ba de dang khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su
204a7(nyi khri): chung ba ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa
204b1(nyi khri): ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs
204b2(nyi khri): su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//nyan thos de dag dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag kyang khongs su chud pa ma yin/de dag gis dge
204b3(nyi khri): ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang khongs su chud pa ma yin te/gang khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin no//gal te byang chub sems dpa'
204b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de ltar gzugs gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa
204b5(nyi khri): nga ni 'das pa'ang ma yin no//ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te/de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de la rang
204b6(nyi khri): bzhin med do//gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa ste/dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes
204b7(nyi khri): pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te/
205a1(nyi khri): de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de la rang bzhin med do//gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa ste/
205a2(nyi khri): dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
205a3(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong
205a4(nyi khri): po nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad
205a5(nyi khri): med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
205a6(nyi khri): med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par
205a7(nyi khri): rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams
205b1(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /mi nyams pa'i chos nyid dang /rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa gang 'dod pa'i khams dang /gzugs kyi khams dang /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi khongs su chud pa ma
205b2(nyi khri): yin pa de ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/da ltar byung ba'ang ma yin te/de ni mtshan ma'i tshul lam/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/
205b3(nyi khri): de la rang bzhin med do//gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos po med pa ste/dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so zhes/de ltar shes na byang chub sems dpa' sems
205b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i bsngo ba la dug med pa yin te/bdud rtsi'i mthar phyin par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo mtshan ma'i tshul lam/dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
205b5(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo na/de ni log par yongs su bsngo ba yin gyi/yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ma yin no//log par yongs su bsngo ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi
205b6(nyi khri): bsngags pa yin te/gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi bsngags pa'i yongs su bsngo ba nges ni/de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi pha
205b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur
206a1(nyi khri): ro//nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
206a2(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
206a3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin
206a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su
206a5(nyi khri): rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po sum cu bdun pa//pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba
206a6(nyi khri): dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i
206a7(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /chang meng ba rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyang dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
206b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
206b2(nyi khri): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba
206b3(nyi khri): des ni/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par mi 'gyur/sems can rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ro//gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par ma gyur pa dang /sems can rnams
206b4(nyi khri): yongs su smin par ma gyur pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni dug dang bcas pa'i
206b5(nyi khri): phyir ro//gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/'di ltar yongs su brtag par bya ste/ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
206b6(nyi khri): gis chos nyid 'dis dge ba'i rtse ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya ste/de ltar yongs su bsngos na/yongs su bsngo ba'i rab tu 'gyur ro zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid des
206b7(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o zhes yongs su brtag par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
207a1(nyi khri): legs so legs so//rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /dmigs pa med
207a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul dang /skye ba med pa'i tshul dang /'gag pa med pa'i tshul dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshul dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshul dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang /
207a3(nyi khri): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi tshul dang /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul dang /de bzhin nyid kyi tshul dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gyis ston pa ni//
207a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed pa yin no//rab 'byor gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam thob par gyur//
207a5(nyi khri): bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/sems can de dag
207a6(nyi khri): gis bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang /rigs
207a7(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngos pa'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am
207b1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o//gtso bo zhes bya'o//dam pa zhes bya'o//phul zhes bya'o//mchog ces bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//bla na med pa zhes bya'o//gong na med pa zhes
207b2(nyi khri): bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi
207b3(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom par gyur te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/sems can rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom par
207b4(nyi khri): gyur pa de dag thams cad la nam 'tsho'i bar du gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par
207b5(nyi khri): byas na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
207b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med par yongs su bsngo bas/yongs su bsngo ba'i bsod
207b7(nyi khri): nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o//gtso bo zhes bya'o//dam pa zhes bya'o//phul zhes
208a1(nyi khri): bya'o//mchog ces bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//bla na med pa zhes bya'o//gong na med pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
208a2(nyi khri): sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/de la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi
208a3(nyi khri): dang /yo byad mang pos rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par byas na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyas
208a4(nyi khri): mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
208a5(nyi khri): gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ni ches mang du 'phel lo//rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i
208a6(nyi khri): rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba de ni rab ces bya'o//gtso bo zhes bya'o//dam pa zhes bya'o//phul zhes bya'o//mchog ces bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//bla na med pa zhes bya'o//gong na med pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor
208a7(nyi khri): gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par
208b1(nyi khri): gyur te/de la shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/sems can ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re la yang gos
208b2(nyi khri): dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad mang pos bskal pa gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par byas te/bde ba'i tshe
208b3(nyi khri): byubyad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gong+gA'i klung gi bye ma
208b4(nyi khri): snyeskyed na/sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re lo'ang gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad mang
208b5(nyi khri): pos bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang du byas/mchod par byas te/bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas na/rab 'byor de ji snyam du
208b6(nyi khri): sems/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //bcom ldan 'das de ni
208b7(nyi khri): tshad ma mchis/grangs ma mchis/dpag tu ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po de'i dpe bgyi bar yang dka'o//bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams bgyi ba'i
209a1(nyi khri): dngos po de la/gzugs mchis su lags na ni/'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang shong bar mi 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
209a2(nyi khri): 'byor legs so legs so//de de bzhin te/ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no//rab 'byor de bas kyi nga rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chags pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo
209a3(nyi khri): bas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/rab 'byor de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su
209a4(nyi khri): bsngo ba 'di ni rab ces bya'o//gtso bo zhes bya'o//dam pa zhes bya'o//phul zhes bya'o//mchog ces bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//bla na med pa zhes bya'o//gong na med pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor chags
209a5(nyi khri): pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong gi chu dang /brgya stong gi cha dang /bye ba brgya'i cha dang /bye ba stong gi cha dang /bye ba brgya stong gi cha
209a6(nyi khri): dang /bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /grangs dang cha dang bgrang ba dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dge ba bcu'i las kyi
209a7(nyi khri): lam dang ldan par gyur pa dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur pa de dag ni dmigs
209b1(nyi khri): pa'i 'du shes can no//de ltar sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa dang /sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom par gyur pa dang /sems can
209b2(nyi khri): thams cad rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa de dag la gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /mal cha dang /nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad mang pos rim gror byed/bkur stir byed/bsti stang du byed/mchod par byed
209b3(nyi khri): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag kyang dmigs pa'i 'du shes can no//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag nyi shu dang 'grogs te thal mo sbyar nas dga'
209b4(nyi khri): ba'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//kye ma bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs mkhas pos/dmigs
209b5(nyi khri): su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /chags pa ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
209b6(nyi khri): byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi
209b7(nyi khri): yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du ma dang 'grogs te/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma
210a1(nyi khri): dang na bza' dang /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi ba dran mang po thogs te/lha rdzas kyi rol mo byed cing /lha rdzas kyi me tog dang /phreng ba dang spos dang phyug pa dang bya
210a2(nyi khri): mdang na bza' dang /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /lha rdzas kyi bdun de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/'di skad kyi tshig brjod do//bcom ldan 'das de lta du
210a3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thubs mkhas pas dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /bgyid pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis/dge
210a4(nyi khri): rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su ngasngo ba
210a5(nyi khri): de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o//de nas lha'i bu rab mtshe ma dang rab dga' ldan dang rab 'phrul dag re dang lha'i bu dbang byed
210a6(nyi khri): lha'i bu stong phrag du ma drang 'grogs te/lha rdzas kyi me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang /ni bza' dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang bya dan mang po thogs te/lha rdzas kyi rol
210a7(nyi khri): mo byed cing /lha rdzas kyi me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang lha rdzas kyi ba dan de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod nas 'di skad
210b1(nyi khri): kyi tshig brjod do//bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas/dmigs su ma mchis pa'i tshul dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul dang /bgyid pa ma
210b2(nyi khri): mchis pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /ci nas kyang gnyis su mi 'gyur ba dang /gnyis ma lags par yang mi 'gyur
210b3(nyi khri): bapa de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba shin tu che'o//de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das
210b4(nyi khri): gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
210b5(nyi khri): dang /thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba de dag gis/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas po dang mi ldan pa/dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil
210b6(nyi khri): gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags te dbyangs su brjod do//tshangs lha nye phran dang tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /snang ba dang chung snang dang tshad mod snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang dge ba dang
210b7(nyi khri): chung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang dge rgyas dang 'bras bu che ba dang /gnas gceng ma'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
211a1(nyi khri): gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba/
211a2(nyi khri): de dag gis rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo snga ma thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pa dmigs pa'i spyod pa can de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag zil gyis mnan pa ngo mtshar che'o zhes sgrar bsgrags
211a3(nyi khri): te dbyangs su brjod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag gal te stong
211a4(nyi khri): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te/phyogs bcu'i de bzhin
211a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba de dag thams cad dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi sems
211a6(nyi khri): dang po bskyed pa nas dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /nyan thos de dag dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i
211a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/shes
211b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/sbyin pa 'am/tshul khrims sam/bzod pa 'am/brtson 'grus sam/bosam gtan na mo/shoso rab bam/tshul khrims kyi phung po 'am/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung
211b2(nyi khri): po'am/shes rab kyi phung po'am/rnam par grol ba'i phung po 'am/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rung ste/de dag thams
211b3(nyi khri): cad gcig tu bsdus nas/rjes su yi rang bar byas la/de ltar rjes su yi rang nas kyang /dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa bas/rigs kyi
211b4(nyi khri): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/des 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos
211b5(nyi khri): dang rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bzod pa'i pha rol tu
211b6(nyi khri): phyin pa 'am/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar de dag thams
211b7(nyi khri): cad gcig tu bsdus te/dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang /gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /chags pa med pa'i tshul dang /byed pa med pa'i tshul du rjes su yi rang ba'i
212a1(nyi khri): rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang /rjes su yi rang ba'i gtso bo dang /dam pa dang mchog dang phul dang gya nom pa dang bla na med pa dang gong na med pa dang mnyam pa med pa dang mi
212a2(nyi khri): mnyam pa dang mnyam pas rjes su yi rang nas/rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /gnyis su med pa'i tshul dang /mtshan ma med pa'i tshul dang /chags
212a3(nyi khri): pa med pa'i tshul dang /byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma
212a4(nyi khri): de dag pas bsod nams ches mang du 'phel te/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//byang chub sems dpa' sems
212a5(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i dmigs su med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni mchog ces bya'o//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar zhes bya'o//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan
212a6(nyi khri): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gang de skad du rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul
212a7(nyi khri): nas tshad bzung ste/rjes su yi rang ba'i rab kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang /rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar gyis/rjes su yi rang bar byed do zhes bka' stsal na/bcom ldan
212b1(nyi khri): 'das ji tsam gyis na rjes su yi rang ba'i dam par 'gyur/ji tsam gyis na rjes su yi rang ba'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du 'gyur ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nam
212b2(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
212b3(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag dang /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mi len mi gtong ba dang /mi rlom mi 'dzum zhing /dmigs pa'ang ma yin/mi dmigs pa'ang
212b4(nyi khri): ma yin la/de 'di snyam du 'di la chos gang yang skye ba'ang med/'gag pa'ang med/nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'ang med/rnam par byang bar 'gyur pa'ang med de/chos de dag la 'grib pa'ang med//
212b5(nyi khri): 'phel ba'ang med/'ong ba'ang med/'gro ba'ang med/phung por 'gyur ba'ang med do zhes rnam grangs de lta bus 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
212b6(nyi khri): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa nyid ji lta ba de ltar bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o//rjes su yi
212b7(nyi khri): rang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba de ni dam par 'gyur te/
213a1(nyi khri): rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba 'di la ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan thams cad kyis brgya'i
213a2(nyi khri): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod de/rjes su yi rang ba 'di ni de ma yin pa'i rjes su yi rang ba gzhan dag pas rab ces bya'o//gtso bo zhes bya'o//dam pa zhes bya'o//
213a3(nyi khri): mchog ces bya'o//phul zhes bya'o//gya nom pa zhes bya'o//bla na med pa zhes bya'o/gong na med pa zhes bya'o//mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o//mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o//rab 'byor
213a4(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mos 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
213a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas de dag dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas su bcas pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas/dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha
213a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
213a7(nyi khri): dang /gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa'i bar dang /sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod na/'di ltar rjes su yi rang bar
213b1(nyi khri): bya'o//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni gzugs so//rnam par grol ba ji lta bu de lta bu ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnams so//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni skye
213b2(nyi khri): mched rnams dang /khams rnams so//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//rnam par grol ba ji
213b3(nyi khri): lta ba de lta bu ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
213b4(nyi khri): phyin pa'o//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so//
213b5(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//rnam par grol
213b6(nyi khri): ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams
213b7(nyi khri): so//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams so//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi
214a1(nyi khri): dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad do//rnam par grol po ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o//
214a2(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po'o//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni mos pa'o//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rjes su yi rang ba'o///
214a3(nyi khri): rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni 'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams so//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag go/rnam
214a4(nyi khri): par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan
214a5(nyi khri): thos rnams dang /nyan thos de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi yongs su mya ngan
214a6(nyi khri): las 'das pa'o//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos nyid do//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas de dag gi
214a7(nyi khri): chos nyid do//rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de lta bu ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid do zhes/de ltar chos ma chags pa dang /ma bcings pa dang /ma grol ba dang /ma zhen pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs
214b1(nyi khri): pa med pa dang rnam par byang ba med pa rnams kyi chos nyid dang /chos ma skyes pa dang yongs su ma skyes pa dang /ma byung ba dang ma 'gags pa'i chos nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du 'phro ba med pa dang /'jig
214b2(nyi khri): pa med pa nye bar bzung ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rjes su yi rang ba'i rab bo//
214b3(nyi khri): rjes su yi rang ba'i mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bar ro//rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
214b4(nyi khri): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
214b5(nyi khri): pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa dang /lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar lho dang lho nub dang nub byang dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten
214b6(nyi khri): gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa dang /'tsho skyong zhing chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs
214b7(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de dag la/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'amo rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/nam 'tsho'i
215a1(nyi khri): bar du na bza' dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun gyi rkyen rtsi dang /yo byad mang po dang /bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/bkur stir byas/bsti stang
215a2(nyi khri): du byas/mchod par byas pa dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /de dag gi ring bsrel la nyin mtshan du me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa
215a3(nyi khri): dang phye ma dang na bza' dang gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang ba dan mang pos rim gror bya ba dang bkur stir bya ba dang bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba'i don du nyams su len cing /de
215a4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa bsgom pa dang /de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang /de dmigs pa'i tshul
215a5(nyi khri): gyis bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab bsgom pa bas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
215a6(nyi khri): yang dag par zhugs pa gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
215a7(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de
215b1(nyi khri): dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta ni/bsod nams mngon par 'du bya
215b2(nyi khri): ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bdod de/yongs su bsngo ba de nyid rab ces bya'o//gong na med pa'i bar zhes bya'o//rab 'byor de ltar mi dmigs pa'i
215b3(nyi khri): tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
215b4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/thabs mkhas pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
215b5(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o///
215b6(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du snang bar bgyid
215b7(nyi khri): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bdag phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das
216a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyis ma gros pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i mun pa thams
216a2(nyi khri): cad bsal ba la rab rib ma mchis par bgyid pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bgyid pa'o//bcom ldan
216a3(nyi khri): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jigs pa dang /gnod pa dang /'tshe ba thams cad rab tu byang ba'i slad du bde bar bgyid pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
216a4(nyi khri): sems can thams cad kyi mig lnga yongs su thob par bgyid pa la snang bar bgyid pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can shul gol bar zhugs pa rnams
216a5(nyi khri): mtha' las zlog pa'i slad du shul ston pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la thams cad
216a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid du bgyid pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos bskyed pa ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma'o//bcom
216a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi rtag mi 'jig pa'i
216b1(nyi khri): slad du 'khor ba'i gnyen po'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos rin po che thams cad stobs pa'i slad du/sems can mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon bgyid pa'o//
216b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du stobs bcu bgyid pa'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mchis pa'i
216b3(nyi khri): slad du/rnam pa bcu gnyis rgyud gsum du 'khor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du
216b4(nyi khri): chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ston pa'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa 'am/nyan thos sam/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/rang sangs rgyas sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
