259a1(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa mi shes so//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pas chos thams cad ma 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
259a2(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam par dag pas chos thams cad ma 'tshal ba lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
259a3(nyi khri): stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/rnam par dag pas chos thams cad mi shes so//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam
259a4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sman par mi bgyid/gnod par mi bgyid do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/
259a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sman par mi bgyid/gnod par mi bgyid pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
259a6(nyi khri): pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi dbyings 'dug pa nyid kyi phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par mi byed/gnod par mi byed do//gsol pa
259a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa ni chos gang yang yongs su len pa ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po/shA re dwa ti'i bu shin
259b1(nyi khri): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa chos gang yang yongs su len pa ma mchis pa lags/bcom ldan 'das
259b2(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa chos gang yang yongs su len pa med do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab
259b3(nyi khri): 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
259b4(nyi khri): rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas gzugs rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
259b5(nyi khri): pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/bdag med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/tshor
259b6(nyi khri): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom
259b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
260a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/bdag med pa'i phyir tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//
260a2(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/skye mched dang khyams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
260a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na bdag rnam par dag pas skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par
260a4(nyi khri): dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/bdag med pa'i phyir skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung
260a5(nyi khri): ba med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par
260a6(nyi khri): dag pa'i slad du/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes
260a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
260b1(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
260b2(nyi khri): bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
260b3(nyi khri): pa rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
260b4(nyi khri): pa rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang
260b5(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnam par dgra
260b6(nyi khri): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pa'o//bcom
260b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag
261a1(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na/bdag rnam par dag pas/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
261a2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir te/bdag med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad med pa ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o//gsol pa bcom
261a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam
261a4(nyi khri): par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/dgra bcom
261a5(nyi khri): pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i srad du/rang byang chub rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/byang chub rnam
261a6(nyi khri): par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/rgyun tu
261a7(nyi khri): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par dag pa lags/ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /
261b1(nyi khri): rang byang chub rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/lam gyi
261b2(nyi khri): rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das bdag rnam par dag pa'i slad du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
261b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/ci'i slad du bdag rnam par dag pas/
261b4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma
261b5(nyi khri): mchis shing rnam par dag pa ni thob par bgyi ba ma lags/mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag
261b6(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gnyis su ma mchis shing /rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi ba ma lags/mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags/bcom
261b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du gzugs kun tu mtha'
262a1(nyi khri): yas pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas
262a2(nyi khri): gzugs kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//
262a3(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa kun tu mtha' yas pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
262a4(nyi khri): stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag kun tu mtha' yas pas tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes
262a5(nyi khri): pa kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//
262a6(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag kun tu mtha' yas pa'i slad du/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du kun tu mtha' yas pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
262a7(nyi khri): rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/bdog kun tu mtha' yas pas/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kun tu mtha' yas pa rnam
262b1(nyi khri): par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar rtogs
262b2(nyi khri): pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom
262b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das ci'i slad du gang de ltar rtogs pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lam gyi rnam pa shes
262b4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshu rol gyi 'gram mam/pha rol gyi
262b5(nyi khri): 'gram mam/gnyis kyi dbus na mi gnas na/de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor
262b6(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/tshu rol gyi
262b7(nyi khri): 'gram mam/pha rol gyi 'gram mam/gnyi ga'i dbus na mi gnas shing shin tu rnam par dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi
263a1(nyi khri): phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
263a2(nyi khri): 'di la dmigs pa'i tshul du 'du shes su bgyid pa ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spong ba'o//bcom ldan 'das
263a3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin te/rab 'byor legs so legs so//rab 'byor de ni ming du yang chags pa yin/mtshan mar yang chags pa yin/gsol pa
263a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na ming du'ang chags shing mtshon mar yang chags pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
263a5(nyi khri): mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ming du 'dzin tam mtshan mar 'dzin na/de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ming dang mtshan mar 'dzin
263a6(nyi khri): cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rong du spong ngo //rab 'byor gal te
263a7(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshon mar 'dzin cing /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan mar bzung nas/
263b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed na/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas rlom sems su byed cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pas/shes rab kyi pha
263b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa gsog tu 'byin to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring du spang ngo //rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
263b3(nyi khri): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang de ltar legs par bshad cing legs par bstan la chags pa dang ma chags pa de dag kyang ma mchis pa ngo mtshar che'o//de nas tshe dang
263b4(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa ni gang yin//
263b5(nyi khri): ma chags pa ni gang yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas/gzugs
263b6(nyi khri): stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na tshogs pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byeng dang /rnam par shes pa stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//skye mched dang /khams
263b7(nyi khri): dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha
264a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu
264a2(nyi khri): phyin pa stong pa'o//zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//nang stong pa nyid stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong
264a3(nyi khri): po'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang
264a4(nyi khri): dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stod pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
264a5(nyi khri): stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa'o//zhes bya bar 'du shes na
264a6(nyi khri): chags pa'o//rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes
264a7(nyi khri): pa rnams stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par
264b1(nyi khri): rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa'o zhes bya bar 'du shes na
264b2(nyi khri): chags pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa tI'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo thabs mi mkhas pas 'das pa'i chos rnams la/'das pa'i
264b3(nyi khri): chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//dwa ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i
264b4(nyi khri): chos zhes bya bar 'du shes na chags pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dmigs pa'i tshul du/sems
264b5(nyi khri): drang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ba nas/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus
264b6(nyi khri): kyipha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na chags pa'o//nang stong pa nyid la spyod na chags pa'o//dngos po med
264b7(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /
265a1(nyi khri): stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod na chags pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o//
265a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o//rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
265a3(nyi khri): pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod na chags pa'o//ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin
265a4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod na chags pa'o//rnam pa thams cad
265a5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod na chags pa'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
265a6(nyi khri): rnams kyi chags pa med pa gang zhes zer ba ni/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
265a7(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa ni/gzugs la gzugs shes bya ba 'du shes pa med do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa zhes bya bar 'du
265b1(nyi khri): shes pa med do//'das pa'i chos rnams la 'das pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//ma 'ongs pa'i chos rnams la ma 'ongs pa'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//
265b2(nyi khri): da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la da ltar byung ba'i chos zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pa shes
265b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/'di snyam du bdag gis sbyin pa zhig sbyin no//'di la sbyin pa 'di lta bu zhig sprin zhe 'am/bdag gis ni tshul khrims shig bsrung ngo //tshul
265b4(nyi khri): khrims 'di lta bu zhig bsrung ngo /zhe 'am bdag gis ni bzod pa zhig bsgom mo//bzod pa 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe 'am/bdag gis ni brtson 'grus shig brtsam mo//brtson 'grus
265b5(nyi khri): 'di lta bu zhig brtsam mo zhe 'am/bdag gis ni bsam gtan zhig la mnyam par bzhag go/bsam gtan 'di lta bu zhig la mnyam par bzhag go zhe 'am/bdag gis ni shes rab
265b6(nyi khri): cig bsgom mo//shes rab 'di lta bu zhig bsgom mo zhe'am/bdag gis ni bsod nams zhig bskyed do//bsod nams 'di lta bu zhig bskyed do//bsod nams 'di tsam zhig bskyed
265b7(nyi khri): do zhe'am bdag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par chud par bya'o zhe 'am/bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya'o zhe 'am bdag gis ni sems can yongs su
266a1(nyi khri): smon par bya'o zhe'am/bdag gos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems pa med de/tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po thabs mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni/rnam par rtog pa de lta bu thams cad dang nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid
266a3(nyi khri): dang /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /chen po stong pa nyid dang /don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /mtha' las 'das pa
266a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /rang gi mtshan nyid
266a5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir med cing mi rgyu ste/
266a6(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chags pa mang ba dag go//de nas
266a7(nyi khri): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs gang gis na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
266b1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags par 'gyur ba yin/de skad ces smras pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka 'di la byang chub
266b2(nyi khri): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo sems su 'du shes pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
266b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'du shes pa dang /nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa
266b4(nyi khri): dang /phyi stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'du shes pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams su 'du
266b5(nyi khri): shes pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par 'du shes pa dang /
266b6(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang /ched med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
266b7(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams su 'du shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams su 'du shes pa
267a1(nyi khri): dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du 'du shes pa dang /
267a2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'du shes par gyur te/sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i dge ba dag tu 'du shes nas/dge bya'i rtsa ba de dag mngon par bsdus te gcig tu brtul nas/bla
267a3(nyi khri): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo zhing /yongs su bsngo ba der yang 'du shes pa de dag ni/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
267a4(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyi chags pa ste/chags pa de dag la chags par gyur na/chags pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni
267a5(nyi khri): kau shi ka gzugs kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//skye mched
267a6(nyi khri): dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//stong pa
267a7(nyi khri): nyid thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//'phags pa'i bden pa
267b1(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
267b2(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//ting nge
267b3(nyi khri): 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rang
267b4(nyi khri): bzhin yongs su bskyo bar mi nus so//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byung
267b5(nyi khri): chub kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yongs su bsngo bar mi nus so//kau shi ka gzhan
267b6(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzhan zhig/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan tam/yang dag par bskul lam/yang
267b7(nyi khri): dag par spro ba bskyed dam/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas na/yang dag par rjes su song ba'i yid kyis gzhan yang dag par bstan par bya'o//yang dag par bskul bar
268a1(nyi khri): bya'o//yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o//yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/de yang ci nas kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/badrag ni
268a2(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang /bdag ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod do//bdag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
268a3(nyi khri): la spyod do//bdag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//bdag ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes
268a4(nyi khri): bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang /bdag ni nang stong pa nyid la spyod do//bdag ni phyi stong pa nyid la spyod do//bdag ni phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod do//bdag ni dngos po
268a5(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod do//bdag ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod do//bdag ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod do//bdag ni
268a6(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang /tshad meng pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod do//bdag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
268a7(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod do//bdag ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo
268b1(nyi khri): rnams la spyod do//bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod do zhes
268b2(nyi khri): bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba dang /bdag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod do zhes bya bar rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ba de ltar yang dag par bstan par bya/yang
268b3(nyi khri): dag par bskul bar bya/yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya/yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ste/de ltar spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/gzhan bla na med pa yang
268b4(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bstan par bya'o//yang dag par bskul bar bya'o//yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya'o//yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o//de yang
268b5(nyi khri): dag par bstan pa de dang /yang dag par bskul ba de dang /yang dag par spro ba bskyed par bya ba de dang /yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya ba des/gzhan yang dag par ston cing
268b6(nyi khri): yang dag par bskul ba dang /yang dag par spro ba bskyed cing yang dag par dga' bar byed pa'i tshe/rma 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i yang dag par bskul
268b7(nyi khri): bas yang dag par bskul ba yin te/de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des chags pa'i mtha' thams cad yongs su spangs pa yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
269a1(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/rab 'byor de ltar khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chags pa'i rnam pa de lta bu dag ston pa
269a2(nyi khri): lags so legs so//rab 'byor de bas na khyod la chags pa'i rnam pa de bas kyang phra ba bstan par byas/de shin tu legs par nyon la yid la gzung zhig dang bstan par bya'o///
269a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to//bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor
269a4(nyi khri): 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
269a5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na/rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar gyur pa de tsam du chags pa'o//gang yang 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin
269a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags pa thams cad dang bral ba de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/dam pa'i chos gnas pa'i bar gyi dge
269a7(nyi khri): paba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mtshan mar yid la byed cing /yid la byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/rab 'byor ji tsam du
269b1(nyi khri): mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o//gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de dag dang /de ma yin pa'i sems can gzhan rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de/
269b2(nyi khri): thams cad kyang mtshan mar byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo na/rab 'byor ji tsam du mtshan mar yid la byed pa de tsam du chags pa'o//
269b3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan mar yid la bya ba ma yin te/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang mtshan mor yid la bya ba ma yin no//gsol
269b4(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'i phyir ro//gsol
269b5(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas mngon
269b6(nyi khri): par 'du ma byas pa ste/de ni sus kyang mngon par 'tshong rgya bar bya bar mi nus so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mngon par sangs ma rgyas po'o//bcom ldan
269b7(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis ma yin te/chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do//rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gcig po gang yin
270a1(nyi khri): pa de ni rang bzhin ma yin no//gang rang bzhin ma yin pa de ni ma byas pa'o//gang ma byas pa de ni mngon par 'du ma byas pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
270a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/chos kyi rang bzhin gcig po gang rang bzhin ma yin pa ma byas pa mngon par 'dus ma byas pa shes na chags pa'i rnam pa thams cad yongs
270a3(nyi khri): su spangs pa yin no//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ba'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar
270a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sus kyang ma mthong ma rtogs/rnam par mi shes mngon par sangs ma rgyas pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
270a5(nyi khri): phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar sems kyis ma shes so//gzugs dang /tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
270a6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pas ma shes so//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas ma shes so//pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang stong pa nyid rnams dang //
270a7(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis ma shes so//
270b1(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyis ma shes so///
270b2(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis ma shes so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi
270b3(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis ma shes so//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang
270b4(nyi khri): byang chub kyis ma shes so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis ma shes so//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/chos
270b5(nyi khri): thams cad rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
270b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs mi
270b7(nyi khri): dmigs pa dang /tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa
271a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis
271a2(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs la mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol
271a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te skye mched dang
271a4(nyi khri): khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
271a5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mi spyod na/
271a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
271a7(nyi khri): dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi spyod na
271b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
271b2(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad la mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te thams cad shes pa nyid dang /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
271b3(nyi khri): nyid la mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal ta gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
271b4(nyi khri): gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rnam
271b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug
271b6(nyi khri): bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal
271b7(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi spyad na/
272a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te gzugs bdag ces bya ba'am/bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
272a2(nyi khri): spyod do//gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba'am/bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
272a3(nyi khri): spyod do//gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te
272a4(nyi khri): gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes
272a5(nyi khri): pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sdug ces bya ba 'am/
272a6(nyi khri): mi sdug ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gang rtag pa'am mi rtag pa 'am/bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba'am/bdag gam
272a7(nyi khri): bdag med pa 'om/sdig pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs med do//gang rtag pa 'am/mi rtag pa'am bde ba'am/sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam/
272b1(nyi khri): bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa med do//gang rtag pa'am myi rtag pa 'am/bde ba
272b2(nyi khri): 'am sdug bsngal ba 'am/bdag gam bdag med pa 'am/sdug pa 'am mi sdug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med do////shes
272b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bzhi bcu pa//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
272b4(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par
272b5(nyi khri): shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su ma
272b6(nyi khri): rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi
272b7(nyi khri): spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
273a1(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i
273a2(nyi khri): lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//'phags pa'i 'don pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /
273a3(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar po brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid
273a4(nyi khri): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs sum rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
273a5(nyi khri): gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i
273a6(nyi khri): stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs
273a7(nyi khri): su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes
273b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
273b2(nyi khri): spyod do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na/shes rab kyi
273b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du/yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya bar de ltar yang mi spyod na/
273b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
273b5(nyi khri): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang ma chags pa legs par bstan pa 'di ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin
273b6(nyi khri): te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang /ma chags
273b7(nyi khri): pa legs par bstan to//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa
274a1(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ma chags pa
274a2(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi
274a3(nyi khri): spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
274a4(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol
274a5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//nang stong pa nyid chags pa 'am/mi chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/
274a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
274a7(nyi khri): la spyod do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//'phags pa'i
274b1(nyi khri): bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
274b2(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab
274b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de bzhin
274b4(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
274b5(nyi khri): brgyad chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa'am/ma chags pa
274b6(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/gzugs chags pa 'am/ma chags pa
274b7(nyi khri): zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//skye mched
275a1(nyi khri): dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa mod do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid
275a2(nyi khri): thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam
275a3(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
275a4(nyi khri): dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//ting nge 'dzin
275a5(nyi khri): rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so
275a6(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes
275a7(nyi khri): pa med do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
275b1(nyi khri): dang /dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa 'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//rang byang chub chags pa'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//bla na med pa
275b2(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub chags pa'am/ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi
275b3(nyi khri): 'grib/ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/bstan kyang mi 'phel/mi bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/de de bzhin no//rab
275b4(nyi khri): 'byor de de bzhin te/chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/bstan kyang mi 'phel ma bstan kyang mi 'phel lo//rab 'byor 'di lta ste
275b5(nyi khri): dper na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam 'tsho'i bar du bzhugs shing /nam mkha'i legs pa'am/ma legs pa brjod
275b6(nyi khri): kyang /nam mkha' ni legs pa brjod pas yongs su 'phel ba med do//nyes pa brjod pas yongs su 'grib pa med do//num mkha' ni legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba
275b7(nyi khri): 'phel ba med do//nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba med do//nyes pa brjod
276a1(nyi khri): kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do//legs pa brjod kyang chags par 'gyur ba med do//nyes pa brjod kyang khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do//rab 'byor de bzhin
276a2(nyi khri): du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de bstan kyang de bzhin/ma bstan kyang de bzhin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
276a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe zhum pa dang /g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson
276a4(nyi khri): par bgyid cing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'odadi lta ste/byang chub
276a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/nam mkha' la ni gzugs ma mchis so//tshor ba
276a6(nyi khri): dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma mchis so///
276a7(nyi khri): nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
276b1(nyi khri): dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
276b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma mchis so//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams
276b3(nyi khri): dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang //
276b4(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
276b5(nyi khri): pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi
276b6(nyi khri): sgrosgo rnams ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /
276b7(nyi khri): snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang //
277a1(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub ma mchis so//nam mkha' la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so//
277a2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag
277a3(nyi khri): ni nam mkha'i don du brtson pas mos/'bad par mos/rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha'
277a4(nyi khri): yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du go cha 'tshal
277a5(nyi khri): ba de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o//bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don du go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o//bcom ldan 'das
277a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni brtson 'grus chen po thob
277a7(nyi khri): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi don du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha
277b1(nyi khri): chen po 'argyal ba'o//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
277b2(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/dpa' bo bsam gyis mi khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal ba'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das gal te
277b3(nyi khri): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/'di lta ste dper na/'dam bu'i byings sam/'od ma'i tshal lAm/bu ram shing gi tshal lam/smig ma'i tshal lam/'bras
277b4(nyi khri): kyi zhing ngam/til gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su grang bar gyur la/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/bskol pa'i lhag mar chos bstan
277b5(nyi khri): te/de bzhin gshegs pa re ras sems can tshad ma mchis/grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am/
277b6(nyi khri): gang bar mi gda'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/sems can ma mchis pa dang /sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing yang /'jig
277b7(nyi khri): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag 'di lta ste dper na/'dam bu'i byings sam/'od ma'i tshal lam/bu ram shing gi tshal lam/smyig ma'i tshal lam/'bras kyi zhing
278a1(nyi khri): dam/trail gyi zhing bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa 'am/bskal pa'i lhag
278a2(nyi khri): mar chos bstan te/de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang /sems can gyi khams la gang ba 'am//
278a3(nyi khri): 'grib par mi gda'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/sems can ma mchis pa dang /sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na bdag 'di skad du sems
278a4(nyi khri): can rnams kyi spyad du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni nam mkha' yongs su smin par bgyi bar 'tshal
278a5(nyi khri): zhing yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags zhes mchi'o//de nas dge slong gcig cig 'di snyam du gyur te/gang la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa yang med la/tshul khrims
278a6(nyi khri): kyi phung po yang yod/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /shes rab kyi phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/rgyun
278a7(nyi khri): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang yod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub kyang yod/bla na med pa yang dag par
278b1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/rgyun tu zhugs pa'ang yod/lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
278b2(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /chos dkon mchog dang /dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang yod
278b3(nyi khri): pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun
278b4(nyi khri): pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par byed pa zhig yod na/de gang la brtson par byed pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras
278b5(nyi khri): pa/kau shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems pa de ni nam mkha' stong pa la brtson pa'o//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
278b6(nyi khri): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin
278b7(nyi khri): du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
279a1(nyi khri): kyis/lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so//kau shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes rgyu
279a2(nyi khri): mthong ngam+b+ha/smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bsgrub par bye ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo //rab 'byor gyis rgyas te//na
279a3(nyi khri): /gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas na/de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par 'gyur ro//gal te
279a4(nyi khri): skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/de la mi 'am mi ma yin pa glags tshol ba rnams kyi glegs rnyed par 'gyur ro//gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi
279a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o//kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
279a6(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par gang sems pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par sems pa ste/
279a7(nyi khri): de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyi sgyu ma dang /smig rgyu dang /rmi lam dang /sgra brnyan dang /mig yor dang /
279b1(nyi khri): sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par nus sam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor do na mi nus so//smras pa/kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
279b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams/bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro//
279b3(nyi khri): kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par nus sam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/
279b4(nyi khri): btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so//smras pa kau shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /
279b5(nyi khri): bskyab par gang sems pa da ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro//kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis chos kyi dbyings dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang //
279b6(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang bskyab par nus sam/brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so//smras pa/kau
279b7(nyi khri): shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang /bskyang ba dang /bskyab par gang sems pa de ni bsam
280a1(nyi khri): pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam
280a2(nyi khri): gyis na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/rmi lam lta bu'i chos dang /sgyu ma lta bu dang /smig rgyu lta bu dang /sgra brnyan lta bu
280a3(nyi khri): dang /mig yor lta bu dang /sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang /de ltar yongs su shes pas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rmi lam rlom sems
280a4(nyi khri): su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa
280a5(nyi khri): la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/kau shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs
280a6(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi
280a7(nyi khri): byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//tshor ba dang /
280b1(nyi khri): /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/rnam par shes pas rlom sems su mi byed/rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam
280b2(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul
280b3(nyi khri): pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rlom sems su mi byed/rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas rlom sems su mi byed/rten cing 'brel
280b4(nyi khri): par 'byung ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom
280b5(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
280b6(nyi khri): chos sum cu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis rlom sems su mi byed/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rlom sems su mi
280b7(nyi khri): byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom
281a1(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs
281a2(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa
281a3(nyi khri): med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na//
281a4(nyi khri): de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su
281a5(nyi khri): mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed/gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/gzungs
281a6(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom
281a7(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang
281b1(nyi khri): dge par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis rlom
281b2(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems
281b3(nyi khri): su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su
281b4(nyi khri): mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/rmi lam gyis rlom
281b5(nyi khri): sems su mi byed/rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do//de nas sangs
281b6(nyi khri): rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /sum curtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /
281b7(nyi khri): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan
282a1(nyi khri): dan gyi phye mas/bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal
282a2(nyi khri): te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams
282a3(nyi khri): kyis/sangs rgyas kyi mthus shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyi chos ston pa/mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/shes rab kyi
282a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing
282a5(nyi khri): yongs su 'dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur te/lho dang nub dang /byang dang byang shar dang /shar lho dang /lho nub dang /nub byang dang /'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re
282a6(nyi khri): zhing yang /sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis chos ston pa mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag goso/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid
282a7(nyi khri): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing yongs su 'dri ba sems
282b1(nyi khri): kyis mthong bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
282b2(nyi khri): pa yang sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par
282b3(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang /sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med/
282b4(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
282b5(nyi khri): rnam pa gang dang /rtags gang dang /mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
282b6(nyi khri): rgyas nas/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka'
282b7(nyi khri): stsal to//'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/gzugs
283a1(nyi khri): rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/
283a2(nyi khri): bdag med ces bya ba 'am/gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
283a3(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//gzugs bcings zhes bya ba 'am/grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzugs 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ma 'ongs zhes bya ba'am/da ltar byung zhes
283a4(nyi khri): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar tshos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam
283a5(nyi khri): par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/
283a6(nyi khri): mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa bcings zhes bya ba 'am/
283a7(nyi khri): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam par shes pa 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//skye mched
283b1(nyi khri): dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba'am/mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug
283b2(nyi khri): bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/mi sdug ces bya bar
283b3(nyi khri): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rten cing 'brel par 'byung bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bcings zhes bya ba 'am/
283b4(nyi khri): grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
283b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang
283b6(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am//
283b7(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba 'am/mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi
284a1(nyi khri): zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bcings zhes bya ba 'am/grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//byang
284a2(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
284a3(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
284a4(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
284a5(nyi khri): ro//mngon par shes pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/mngon par
284a6(nyi khri): shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi
284a7(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//mngon par shes pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am/grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro/mngon par shes pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba'am/ma 'ongs
284b1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba'am/da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi
284b2(nyi khri): 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/gzungs kyi sgo rnams
284b3(nyi khri): sdug ces bya ba'am/mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams
284b4(nyi khri): bcings zhes bya ba 'am/grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston
284b5(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces
284b6(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
284b7(nyi khri): rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas
285a1(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings zhes bya ba 'am/grol zhes
285a2(nyi khri): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//
285a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba 'am/sdug bsngal
285a4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/bdag med ces bya ba 'am/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/mi sdug ces bya
285a5(nyi khri): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba'am/ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bcings zhes bya ba
285a6(nyi khri): 'am/grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ma 'ongs zhes bya ba 'am/da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par
285a7(nyi khri): mi 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
285b1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas nas/chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur ston na ci zhig gis ston par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par
285b2(nyi khri): dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur
285b3(nyi khri): ro//skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
285b4(nyi khri): dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shin tu rnam par ngag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//'phags pa'i bden pa
285b5(nyi khri): rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
285b6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag
285b7(nyi khri): pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa'i
286a1(nyi khri): stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag go zhes
286a2(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro//
286a3(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/
286a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
286a5(nyi khri): yongs su dag pa'o//rab 'byor skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//pha rol
286a6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
286a7(nyi khri): pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
286b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
286b2(nyi khri): dag pa'o//ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs
286b3(nyi khri): pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//rnam pa
286b4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs yongs su dag pa'i
286b5(nyi khri): slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ji ltar na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/shes rab
286b6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ji ltar na skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
286b7(nyi khri): su dag pa lags/ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/shes rab
287a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
287a2(nyi khri): 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa
287a3(nyi khri): rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/
287a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /sangs rgyas
287a5(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su
287a6(nyi khri): dag pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /
287a7(nyi khri): kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzugs yongs su dag pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la skye ba med
287b1(nyi khri): pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o//skye mched dang khams dang /rten cing 'brel
287b2(nyi khri): par 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byed pa med pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o//pha rol
287b3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
287b4(nyi khri): dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ni/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad
287b5(nyi khri): med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /stong pa
287b6(nyi khri): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par
287b7(nyi khri): byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa
288a1(nyi khri): med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su dag pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so /
288a2(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par
288a3(nyi khri): byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su dag pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun
288a4(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su dag pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/
288a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mapa' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu yin pa yongs
288a6(nyi khri): su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir
288a7(nyi khri): nam mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/rab 'byor nam mkha' la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji
288b1(nyi khri): ltar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' gzung du
288b2(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//rab 'byor nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//gsol
288b3(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab
288b4(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/nam mkha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar/nam mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//rab 'byor nam mkha'
288b5(nyi khri): brjod du med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
288b6(nyi khri): pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/
288b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom
289a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das ji ltar na nam mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
289a2(nyi khri): pa/rab 'byor nam mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do//rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
