289a3(nyi khri): pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/shes rab
289a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /kun nas
289a5(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
289a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor chos thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das rigs
289a7(nyi khri): kyi bu 'o ma rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/bcom ldan
289b1(nyi khri): 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//rna ba'i nad dang /sna'i nang dang /lho'i nod dang /lus kyi nang dang /yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro//lus ngan par mi 'gyur
289b2(nyi khri): ro//rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spongs pas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro//de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang
289b3(nyi khri): po 'brang bar 'gyur te/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro//gang na chos smra ba'i rigs
289b4(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa der yang /tshes brgyad dang /bcu bzhi dang /bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro//rigs
289b5(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung
289b6(nyi khri): po rab tu mang ba/tshad ma mchis pa/grangs ma mchis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/gzhal du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa/rab tu 'phel
289b7(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshes brgyad dang /bcu bzhi dang bco
290a1(nyi khri): lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lha'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/bsod nams
290a2(nyi khri): kyi phung po mang po dang /tshad med pa grangs med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshungs pa med pa gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de ci'i
290a3(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o//rab 'byor de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni 'di yin te/sems can dmyal ba
290a4(nyi khri): las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o//byol song gi skye gnas dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /mi dang lha dbul po las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o//rgyal rigs che zhing
290a5(nyi khri): mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o//bram ze che zhing mtho bo'i rigs 'byin pa'o//khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin
290a6(nyi khri): pa'o//'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o//lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
290a7(nyi khri): dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o//dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub 'byin pa'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/don
290b1(nyi khri): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rgyas par bstan te/de la bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho
290b2(nyi khri): ba rnams yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /dga' ldan dang /
290b3(nyi khri): 'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do//tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang /chung
290b4(nyi khri): snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang /tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang /che ba dang chung che dang /ched med che ba dang /
290b5(nyi khri): 'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
290b6(nyi khri): yod do//rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes ming min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
290b7(nyi khri): bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub yod do//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
291a1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub yod do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yod na/bsam gtan bzhi yod do//tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
291a2(nyi khri): 'jug pa bzhi yod do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
291a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//nang stong pa nyid yod do//
291a4(nyi khri): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
291a5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /mngon par shes
291a6(nyi khri): pa rnams yod do//ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /gzungs kyi sgo thams cad yod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so
291a7(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
291b1(nyi khri): kyi bar du yod do//de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos de thams cad rgya cher bstan te/de la bslabs na rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//bram
291b2(nyi khri): ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba yod do//khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//sum cu rtsa gsum dang /mtshe ma dang /
291b3(nyi khri): dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs lha nye phan dang /tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /tshangs chen dang /snang ba dang //
291b4(nyi khri): chung snang dang /tshad med snang ba dang /kun snang dang ba dang /dge ba dang /chung dge dang tshad med dge ba dang /dge rgyas dang tsha ba dang /chung che dang tshad med che ba dang /
291b5(nyi khri): 'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang mi gdung ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang //
291b6(nyi khri): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do//
291b7(nyi khri): lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do//byang chub sems dpa' rnams yod do//de bzhin
292a1(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do//de bas na de ni pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o//pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che de
292a2(nyi khri): la ni chos gang yang skye ba 'am/'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/rnam par byang ba 'am/yongs su bzung ba 'am/dor ba meng ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni
292a3(nyi khri): 'di ltar gang skye ba 'om/'gag pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/rnam par byang ba 'am/yongs su gzung ba 'am/dor bar bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do//rab 'byor
292a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin po rin po che 'di la ni dge ba 'am/mi dge ba 'am/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/zag pa med pa 'am/'dus
292a5(nyi khri): byas sam/'dus ma byas kyi chos gang yang dmigs su med de/rab 'byor rnam grangs nges kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do//rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa
292a6(nyi khri): rin po che la ni gang gis kyang 'gro ba med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med de/rab 'byor de'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa
292a7(nyi khri): 'di ni 'gro ba mang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che'o//rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/de ltar
292b1(nyi khri): 'du shes par yang mi byed la/de ltar mi rtog cing de ltar mi dmigs te/de ltar 'phro bar yang mi byed na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
292b2(nyi khri): phyin pa la sgom pa'o//de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing /sangs rgyas bcom
292b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang /bkur stir bya ba dang /bsti stang du bya ba dang /mchod par bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/sems
292b4(nyi khri): can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed cing /sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
292b5(nyi khri): pa 'di ni chos gang yang ston pa 'am/rnam par ston pa 'am/yongs su ston pa 'am/'dzin par byed pa 'am/'byin par byed pa 'am/skye bar byed pa 'am/'gag par
292b6(nyi khri): byed pa 'am/kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/rnam par byang bar byed pa 'am/'grib par byed pa 'am/'phel bar byed pa 'am/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /
292b7(nyi khri): de ltar byung bar byed pa med do//rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/'dod pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/gnas par byed pa ma yin//
293a1(nyi khri): gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/gnas par byed pa ma yin/gzugs med pa'i khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/gnas par
293a2(nyi khri): byed pa ma yin/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
293a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/nang stong pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/
293a4(nyi khri): 'dor ba ma yin/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma
293a5(nyi khri): yin/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor
293a6(nyi khri): ba ma yin/rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes
293a7(nyi khri): pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
293b1(nyi khri): rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgrub pa ma yin//
293b2(nyi khri): 'dor ba ma yin/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid bsgrub pa
293b3(nyi khri): ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/rang byang chub sgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
293b4(nyi khri): bsgrub pa ma yin/'dor ba ma yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phyag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
293b5(nyi khri): pa 'di ni 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/'dus ma byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa
293b6(nyi khri): rnams ma byung yang rung /chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa de ni de bzhin du gnas pa yin te de ni de bzhin gshegs pas
293b7(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//mngon par thugs su chud do//mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo //ston to///
294a1(nyi khri): brjod do//'grel to/rnam par 'byed do//gsal bar mdzad do//yang dag par ston to//de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po steng go bar snang la 'khod nas lhung
294a2(nyi khri): lhung ljags kyi sgra phyung ste/lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+palA dang /pad+mo dang /ku mu da dang /puN+Da ri ka dang /man+da ra ba dang /man+da ra ba chen po 'thor zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par
294a3(nyi khri): gyur to//kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas/lha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur te/'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo
294a4(nyi khri): gnyis pa bskor ba mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/'di ni chos
294a5(nyi khri): kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba'ang ma yin/gcig tu bskor ba'ang ma yin no//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/mi 'khor bar bya
294a6(nyi khri): ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor bar bgyi ba 'am/mi 'khor bar bgyi ba'i
294a7(nyi khri): slad du/nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes
294b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
294b2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo //nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
294b3(nyi khri): du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo //dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo //yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul
294b4(nyi khri): gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brkyang
294b5(nyi khri): pas stong ngo //'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par
294b6(nyi khri): thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par
294b7(nyi khri): shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo //ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa
295a1(nyi khri): rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi
295a2(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo //rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo //lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir
295a3(nyi khri): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo //dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong ngo //lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam
295a4(nyi khri): pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo //rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo //gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
295a5(nyi khri): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'din chen mo ste/'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o//de ni chos thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyis stong la/
295a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
295a7(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya'ang /chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma mchis/chos kyi 'khor lo'ang bskor la chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am mi 'khor ba 'am rab tu 'khor bar
295b1(nyi khri): bgyid pa ma mchis te/de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba 'am yongs su ma mthong ba ma mchis so//nga ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyi ba'am mi 'khor
295b2(nyi khri): bar bgyi ba 'am rab tu 'khor bar bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/de ni 'di ltar chos thams cad kyang shin tu mngon par ma grub pa'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/spyong pa
295b3(nyi khri): nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so//mtshan ma ma mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so//smon pa ma mchis
295b4(nyi khri): pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so//de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang /rab tu bstan pa dang /bsgrags pa dang rab tu dgod pa dang
295b5(nyi khri): gzhag pa dang /rnam par dbye ba dang /rnam par dgrol ba dang smos pa dang gsal bar bgyi ba dang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag
295b6(nyi khri): pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa de'ang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ngo //gang sus kyang ma bstan sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis so//
295b7(nyi khri): gang sus kyang mngon du ma bgyis pa de la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/chos bstan pa 'di la gang su'ang sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so//shes rab kyi
296a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o////de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
296a2(nyi khri): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nam mkha'
296a3(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
296a4(nyi khri): pa/chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom
296a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thub pa med
296a6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
296a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ming dang lus med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan
296b1(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/
296b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par
296b3(nyi khri): dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mong ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
296b4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
296b5(nyi khri): byiphyin pa 'don 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
296b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom
296b7(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skad cig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad byang zhing zad
297a1(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
297a2(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad skye ba dang /'geg pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byed pa po ma
297a3(nyi khri): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/byed pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
297a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom
297a5(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'pho ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'chi ba dang skye ba dmigs su
297a6(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
297a7(nyi khri): stsal ba/chos thams cad 'dzag pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
297b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgra brnyan gyi pha
297b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyan pa dang /sgrar brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
297b3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mig yor gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
297b4(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom
297b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol
297b6(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ma rig pa'i
297b7(nyi khri): mun pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
298a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
298a2(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di
298a3(nyi khri): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dmigs su ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
298a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/spros pa
298a5(nyi khri): thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rlom sems ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
298a6(nyi khri): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
298a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
298b1(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad ma nor ba yang dag pa nyid du
298b2(nyi khri): mngon par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
298b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsolnga pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni na
298b4(nyi khri): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams tsod mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
298b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dod chags ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dod chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol
298b6(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zho sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/zhe sdang yod pa ma yin
298b7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gti mug ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
299a1(nyi khri): stsal pa/mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma
299a2(nyi khri): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/yongs su rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
299a3(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sems can med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
299a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rab tu spangs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro//gsol
299a5(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha'
299a6(nyi khri): rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
299a7(nyi khri): stsal pa/chos thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
299b1(nyi khri): phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar byed pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
299b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol
299b3(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad kyi tshad
299b4(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nam mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
299b5(nyi khri): pa/chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi rtag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom
299b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi pha
299b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad 'chol bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
300a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro//
300a2(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams
300a3(nyi khri): cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom
300a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni nang stong
300a5(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
300a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
300a7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro///
300b1(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stong pa nyid stong pa
300b2(nyi khri): nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
300b3(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
300b4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus byas
300b5(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
300b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol
300b7(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mtha' las
301a1(nyi khri): 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
301a2(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di
301a3(nyi khri): lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su
301a4(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
301a5(nyi khri): stsal pa/'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams
301a6(nyi khri): cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
301a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i'o
301b1(nyi khri): phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
301b2(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom
301b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
301b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
301b5(nyi khri): papopa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
301b6(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lus dang tshor ba
301b7(nyi khri): dang sems dang chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom
302a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
302a2(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom
302a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni dbang po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
302a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stobs lnga dmigs
302a5(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das
302a6(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni lam gyi pha
302a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste//
302b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med
302b2(nyi khri): pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
302b3(nyi khri): zhi ba'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan
302b4(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/smon pa med pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa'i pha rol
302b5(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
302b6(nyi khri): byin pa 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dmigs
302b7(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
303a1(nyi khri): sbyin pa dang /ser sna dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
303a2(nyi khri): phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshul khrims dang /tshul khrims ngan pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
303a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gnod sems dang bzod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/
303a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/le lo dang brtson 'grus dmigs
303a5(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
303a6(nyi khri): pa/bsam gtan dang 'khrug pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o///
303a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shes rab dang 'chal pa'i shes rab dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
303b1(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad thub pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes
303b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes zhum pa med pa'i phyir ro//
303b3(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rnam
303b4(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa dang /thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
303b5(nyi khri): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las yang dog par 'das pa'i phyir ro//
303b6(nyi khri): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/brjod pa
303b7(nyi khri): thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis
304a1(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi pha
304a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ro//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
304a3(nyi khri): pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u nyi shu dgu pa'o///de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du gyur te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu dang /rigs
304a4(nyi khri): kyi bu mo gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni de bzhin
304a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sems can gang gi rna lam du grag pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o///
304a6(nyi khri): gang 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing gzung ba dang /bcang ba dang /klag pa dang /kun chub par byas nas kyang
304a7(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du byed pa lta ci smos te/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi
304b1(nyi khri): dngangos skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis/sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su dris so//yongs su zhus so//rigs
304b2(nyi khri): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur la 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang /
304b3(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba mang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes
304b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod do snyam pa dang /de nas tshe dang ldan po shA ra dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
304b5(nyi khri): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur la/'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang /
304b6(nyi khri): tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang 'dra bar gzung bar bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das
304b7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa ste/sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug la ma spyad pas ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang mos par bgyi bar mi
305a1(nyi khri): nus so//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas spang bar sems pa dag gis ni sngon gyi mthar yang
305a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spangs par gyur to//de ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
305a3(nyi khri): bshad pa'i tshe/dad pa dang mos pa ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub
305a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos rnams la bsnyen bkur ma bgyis te/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar spyad par bgyi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
305a5(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar
305a6(nyi khri): spyad par bgyi/nang stong pa nyid ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni ji
305a7(nyi khri): ltor bsgom par bgyi/yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
305b1(nyi khri): dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med
305b2(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med
305b3(nyi khri): pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
305b4(nyi khri): dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi zhes yongs su ma zhus/yongs
305b5(nyi khri): su ma dris so//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu
305b6(nyi khri): zab na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/sngon ma spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/sbyin
305b7(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
306a1(nyi khri): dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po meng pa'ang bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
306a2(nyi khri): dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
306a3(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
306a4(nyi khri): dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang
306a5(nyi khri): dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mos par mi 'gyur ba lta ngo mtshar kyang ci che/btsun pa
306a6(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo//gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal
306a7(nyi khri): ba'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/de de bzhin no//kau shi ka de de bzhin te/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag
306b1(nyi khri): 'tshal ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shi ka 'ad las byung ba ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//
306b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod do//kau shi ka thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos
306b3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang bar
306b4(nyi khri): 'dod pa dang /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//sems can rnams rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
306b5(nyi khri): bu la dgod par 'dod pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par 'dod pa dang /rang byang chub la dgod par 'dod
306b6(nyi khri): pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//sems can rnams
306b7(nyi khri): 'tshang rgya ba nyid la dgod par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//khams gsum gyi phul du 'gyur bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am
307a1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//bdud thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha
307a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu bar 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o//de skad ces
307a3(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
307a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
307a5(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
307a6(nyi khri): kyipha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin po la 'artson par bgyid pa lags/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
307a7(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid la
307b1(nyi khri): rtson par bgyid pa lags/ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la brtson par bgyod pa lags/ji ltar na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la brtson
307b2(nyi khri): par bgyid pa lags/ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
307b3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams la
307b4(nyi khri): brtson par bgyid pa lags/ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par bgyid pa lags/ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs
307b5(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par bgyid pa lags/bcom
307b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kau shi ka de ltar khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di yongs su zhu bar sems pa legs so//
307b7(nyi khri): legs so//kau shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byung ngo //kau shi ka 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
308a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/gzugs la brtson par byed pa yin no//tshor ba
308a2(nyi khri): dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/rnam par shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no//
308a3(nyi khri): mig la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe mig la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/mig la brtson par byed pa yin no//rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe
308a4(nyi khri): yid la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/yid la brtson par byed pa yin no//gzugs la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe gzugs la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/gzugs la brtson par byed
308a5(nyi khri): pa yin no//sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe chos la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/chos la brtson par byed pa yin no//mig gi rnam par shes pa
308a6(nyi khri): la mi gnas/mig gi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas/rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa
308a7(nyi khri): la mi gnas/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la mi gnas/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la mi
308b1(nyi khri): gnas pa de'i tshe/yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la brtson par byed pa yin no//sa'i khams la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe sa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/sa'i khams
308b2(nyi khri): la brtson par byed pa yin no//chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang /rlung gi khams dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe rnam par
308b3(nyi khri): shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/rnam par shes pa'i khams la brtson par byed pa yin no//ma rig pa la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe ma rig pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/ma
308b4(nyi khri): rig pa la brtson par byed pa yin no//'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug dang reg pa dang tshor ba dang /sred pa dang len pa dang srid pa dang skye ba
308b5(nyi khri): dang rga shi la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe rga shi la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/rga shi la brtson par byed pa yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe sbyin po'i pha
308b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson
308b7(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi//
309a1(nyi khri): gnas pa de'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par byed pa yin no//nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe nang stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa de'i
309a2(nyi khri): tshe/nang stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mi
309a3(nyi khri): gnas pa de'i tshe/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
309a4(nyi khri): rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po
309a5(nyi khri): rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
309a6(nyi khri): la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtson par byed pa yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa
309a7(nyi khri): rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/gzugs med
309b1(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no//rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
309b2(nyi khri): med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon por shes pa rnams la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la
309b3(nyi khri): brtson par byed pa yin no//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
309b4(nyi khri): brtson par byed pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
309b5(nyi khri): bco brgyad la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no//
309b6(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub la mi gnas te/gang gi tshe
309b7(nyi khri): rang byang chub la mi gnas pa de'i tshe/rang byang chub la brtson par byed pa yin no//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas te/gang gi
310a1(nyi khri): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi gnas pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/kau shI ka dan
310a2(nyi khri): 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba dang /dang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i gzugs mi dmigs so//gang la gnas par bya ba dang /gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i tshor ba
310a3(nyi khri): dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so//gang la gnas par bya ba dang /gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i skye mched dang /khams dang rten
310a4(nyi khri): cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so//gang la gnas par bya ba dang /gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
310a5(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs so//gang la gnas par bya ba dang /gang la brtson par bya ba de lta bu'i 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam
310a6(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
310a7(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs
310b1(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang //
310b2(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs so//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom
310b3(nyi khri): pa nyid dang /rang byang chub mi dmigs so//lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
310b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/gang gi tshe gzugs la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/gzugs la brtson
310b5(nyi khri): par byed pa yin no//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/rnam par
310b6(nyi khri): shes pa la brtson par byed pa yin no//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/gang gi tshe rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa
310b7(nyi khri): de'i tshe/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la brtson par byed pa yin no//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
311a1(nyi khri): bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/gang gi tshe byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
311a2(nyi khri): brtson par byed pa yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang //
311a3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes
311a4(nyi khri): pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/gang gi tshe mngon par shes pa rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/mngon par shes pa rnams la brtson par byed pa yin no//ting nge
311a5(nyi khri): 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/gang gi tshe gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtson par byed pa
311a6(nyi khri): yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs
311a7(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
311b1(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad la brtson par byed pa yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mi sbyor mi 'byed de/gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi sbyor mi 'byed pa de'i tshe//
311b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtson par byed pa yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
311b3(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/gzugs sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//gzugs dbus su mi dmigs so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /
311b4(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam par shes pa dbus su mi dmigs so//skye mched dang khams
311b5(nyi khri): dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dbus su mi dmigs so///
311b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun phyi
311b7(nyi khri): ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dbus su mi dmigs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa
312a1(nyi khri): rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
312a2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//mngon par shes pa rnams phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
312a3(nyi khri): so//mngon par shes pa rnams dbus su mi dmigs so//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams phyi ma'i mthar
312a4(nyi khri): mi dmigs so//gzungs kyi sgo rnams dbus su mi dmigs so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa
312a5(nyi khri): bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
312a6(nyi khri): bco brgyad phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dbus su mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sngon gyi mthar
312a7(nyi khri): mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dbus su mi dmigs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa
312b1(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bus/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i
312b2(nyi khri): bu gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid zab
312b3(nyi khri): paba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol
312b4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa zab bo//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi
312b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar
312b6(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de
312b7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
313a1(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar rgyu
313a2(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag dga'o//bcom ldan 'das
313a3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam
313a4(nyi khri): par shes pa gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gting dpag dka' ba'i
313a5(nyi khri): phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting
313a6(nyi khri): dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
313a7(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams
313b1(nyi khri): gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o//ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313b2(nyi khri): gting dpag dka'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting
313b3(nyi khri): dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
313b4(nyi khri): gting dpag dka'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs tshang
313b5(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha
313b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//pha rol tu
313b7(nyi khri): byin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//'phags pa'i
314a1(nyi khri): bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
314a2(nyi khri): 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//ting nge 'dzin dang /
314a3(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig
314a4(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad tshad med pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du tshad med
314a5(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
314a6(nyi khri): spyod pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs
314a7(nyi khri): zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes
314b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//skye mchod dang khams dang rterton cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams
314b2(nyi khri): cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad do//'phags pa'i bden pa
314b3(nyi khri): rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
314b4(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
314b5(nyi khri): spyod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi
314b6(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
314b7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab ces bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag
315a1(nyi khri): shu lnga pa//bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma yin no//tshor ba dang 'du
315a2(nyi khri): shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa ma yin no//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i zab pa nyid
315a3(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi
315a4(nyi khri): zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang //
315a5(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma
315a6(nyi khri): med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin no//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs
315a7(nyi khri): kyi sgo rnams kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin no//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so
315b1(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi zab pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma yin no//rnam pa
315b2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi thub pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
315b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gral te tshor ba dang 'du shes
315b4(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gtang dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung
315b5(nyi khri): ba gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi
315b6(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan
315b7(nyi khri): rnams dang /tshang meng pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
316a1(nyi khri): dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams gtid dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes
316a2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
316a3(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gting dpag dA/
316a4(nyi khri): zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gting dpag dka'o zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha
316a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma yin no//tshor po dang /'du shes dang /
316a6(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i gting dpag dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi gting dpag
316a7(nyi khri): dka' ba gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//shA radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
316b1(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/gal te gzugs tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//gal te tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes
316b2(nyi khri): pa tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes
316b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun tshad med do zhes bya bar mi
316b4(nyi khri): spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
316b5(nyi khri): par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang /
316b6(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshad med do zhes bya bar mi
316b7(nyi khri): spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs
317a1(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad tshod med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
317a2(nyi khri): du tshad med do zhes bya bar mi spyod na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs kyi tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/gzugs ma
317a3(nyi khri): yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam par shes pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
317a4(nyi khri): bar du tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/kye ma bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
317a5(nyi khri): ni de ltar zab bo//de ltar gting dpag dka'o//de ltar rtogs par dka'o//bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'o//bcom
317a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i mdun du bshad par mi bgyi ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas
317a7(nyi khri): 'jigs dngangs shing skrag par 'gyur du mchi'o//the tshom dang nem nur 'tshal du mchi'o//mos pa ma mchis par gyur du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i
317b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan par bgyi ste/des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas mi
317b2(nyi khri): 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur ro//the tshom dang nem nur 'tshal bar mi 'gyur te/thos nas kyang gong nas gong du mos pa dang 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang klog
317b3(nyi khri): pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid par 'gyur ro//de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so///
317b4(nyi khri): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad na nyes pa cir
317b5(nyi khri): 'gyur/shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/kau shi ka gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
317b6(nyi khri): mo 'di bshad na/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/'jigs par 'gyur/dngangs par 'gyur/skrag par 'gyur te/phyir ldog par 'gyur ro///
317b7(nyi khri): spong bar 'gyur ro//de ni mos par yang mi 'gyur te/kau shi ka theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
318a1(nyi khri): pa 'di thos nas/spangs pa'i phyir de log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las mngon par 'du byed cing sogs par 'gyur te las byas pa dang bsags pa des
318a2(nyi khri): kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dka' bo de lta bu'i gnas yod do//brgya byin gyis smras pa/btsun pa
318a3(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi
318a4(nyi khri): 'gyur ba lta yod dam/smras pa/kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/mi 'jigs mi dngangs
318a5(nyi khri): skrag par mi 'gyur ba de dag ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
318a6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig gam/gnyis las mi 'da' bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du lung bstan par 'gyur ro//de nas
318a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
318b1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas/mi 'jigs mo dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur zhing thos nas kyang gong nas gong du 'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang
318b2(nyi khri): klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang /ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de dag ni yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'o//pha
318b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa'o//sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'o//shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so//
318b4(nyi khri): bde bar gshegs pa de'i dpe gsal bar bdag gis spobs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/shA ra dwa ti'i
318b5(nyi khri): bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lom na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing
318b6(nyi khri): bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsom pa dang /bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang /tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba nas//
318b7(nyi khri): snying po byang chub la mchis pa'i bar du gyur na'ang bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig
319a1(nyi khri): par bgyi na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnyid kyis ma log pa zhig gis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa dang //
319a2(nyi khri): bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag pa dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang /bzod pa bsgrubs pa dang /tshul khrims bsrungs pa dang /sbyin pa yongs su gtang ba lta
319a3(nyi khri): smos kyang ci 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur par rig par bgyi'o//
319a4(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par gyur te/thos nas kyang 'dzin cing de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid pa de dag ni/dge pa'i
319a5(nyi khri): rtsa ba yongs su smin pa ste/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /klog cing kun chub par
319a6(nyi khri): bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de dag ni yun ring po nas/theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o//sangs rgyas mang po bsnyen
319a7(nyi khri): bkur ba'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
319b1(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang nyo bar gyur pa ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang /rigs
319b2(nyi khri): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'thad cing 'thad par gyur nas kyang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang /tshul bzhin du
319b3(nyi khri): yid la bgyid pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bgyi ba dag go//bcom ldan
