386a6(nyi khri): rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do//'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin
386a7(nyi khri): nyid do//'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do//zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/
386b1(nyi khri): zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do//zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/'das pa dang /ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do//'das pa dang /
386b2(nyi khri): ma 'ongs pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do//'dus byas dang /'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi de
386b3(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do//lan cig phyir 'ong
386b4(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid do//phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid do//dgra bcom pa
386b5(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do//rang byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do//bla na med pa yang
386b6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/de bzhin nyid gcig pa nyid de tha mi dang
386b7(nyi khri): pa'i de bzhin nyid do//tha mi dad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/mi zad pa ste mi zad pa'i phyir gnyis su med de/gnyis su byar med do//rab 'byor de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de/de bzhin
387a1(nyi khri): gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/de bzhin gshes
387a2(nyi khri): pa bskyed pa'o//'jig rten 'di ston pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do//ma nor ba
387a3(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid thugs su chud do//de bzhin nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol
387a4(nyi khri): pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
387a5(nyi khri): dang rnam nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid des na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub brjod cing smos so//bcom ldan 'das slar mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
387a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /gang zag lta ba phun sum tshogs pa rnams dang /dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa rnams ma gtogs par su zhig 'di la mos par 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
387a7(nyi khri): pas chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can rnams la gsungs pa ni shin tu zab bo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar de bzhin nyid mi zad pa
387b1(nyi khri): ste/ci'i phyir mi zad ce na/chos thams cad ni mi zad pa'i phyir te/de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
387b2(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can rnams la gsungs te/'di ltar chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu
387b3(nyi khri): lnga pa las/le'u sum cu gnyis pa'o///de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag
387b4(nyi khri): lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon par 'thor zhing /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'khod do//phyogs cig
387b5(nyi khri): tu 'khod nas/'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang ji snyed pa de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo/
387b6(nyi khri): bshad na/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi
387b7(nyi khri): mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di ni/smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do//
388a1(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do//
388a2(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/'gag pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag
388a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/rnam par byang ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/dngos po med pa'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi
388a4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha
388a5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do//lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
388a6(nyi khri): 'di ni/mtshan nyid de lta bu yin yang /de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi brdar bka' stsal te/don dam par ni ma yin no//lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin
388a7(nyi khri): du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis gzhan du bya bar mi nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yang mtshan nyid der zad de/lha'i bu dag mtshan nyid ni mtshan
388b1(nyi khri): nyid gzhan du mi byed do//mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid shes par mi byed do//mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do//mtshan nyid med pa ni mtshan nyid med pa shes par mi byed do//de ltar na mtshan
388b2(nyi khri): nyid dang /mtshan nyid med pa dang /mtshan nyid yod pa dang /mtshan nyid med pa de gnyis ka la'ang gang gis shes par bya ba dang /gang shes par bya ba dang /gang shes par byed pa de lta bu mi srid do//lha'i
388b3(nyi khri): bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni gzugs kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pas 'du byas pa ma yin no//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung
388b4(nyi khri): bas 'du byas pa ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
388b5(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'du byas pa ma yin no//stong pa nyid thams cad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis 'du byas pa ma
388b6(nyi khri): yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no//bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
388b7(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi
389a1(nyi khri): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis 'du byas pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis 'du byas pa ma yin no//'i
389a2(nyi khri): bu dag mtshan nyid de dag ni mi 'am/mi ma yin pa 'am/zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/zag pa med pa 'am/'jig rten pa 'am/'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/'dus byas sam/'dus ma byas kyis ma yin te/
389a3(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag la la zhig 'di skad du nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhes zer na/ci de yang dag par smra bas/yang dag par smra ba yin nam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/yang dag par spangs
389a4(nyi khri): yang dag par smra ba ma lags so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma bgyis pa'i slad du nam mkha' pa ni mtshan nyid gang yang ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de
389a5(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings de ni de bzhin du gnas so//mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings ji lta ba bzhin du gnas
389a6(nyi khri): pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pas ma nor bar mngon par sangs rgyas te/de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis
389a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gzigaso pa chos thams cad la thogs
389b1(nyi khri): pa ma mchis par 'jug cing mtshan nyid de dag la zhugs pas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan nyid thams cad kyi
389b2(nyi khri): chags pa las 'das pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bstan pas mtshan nyid rnams rab tu bstan pa ni/de bzhin
389b3(nyi khri): gshegs pas/mtshan nyid zab mo mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
389b4(nyi khri): rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul du gyur te/de la spyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
389b5(nyi khri): te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /mtshan nyid thams cad rab tu dbye bar mdzad de/'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang tshor ba dang 'du shes
389b6(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang /skye mched kyi mtshan nyid dang khams kyi mtshan nyid dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan
389b7(nyi khri): nyid rab tu dbye ba mdzad pa ngo mtshar che'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag gzugs
390a1(nyi khri): ni gzhig tu rung ba'i mtshan nyid de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//de bzhin du tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid/'du shes ni 'dzin
390a2(nyi khri): pa'i mtshan nyid/'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid/rnam par shes pa ni so so'i bye brag shes pa'i mtshan nyid de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par
390a3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas so//phung po rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid/khams rnams ni gdug pa'i mtshan nyid de/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so///
390a4(nyi khri): skye mched rnams ni 'byung ba'i sgo'i mtshan nyid de/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni 'du 'phrod kyi mtshan nyid de/de
390a5(nyi khri): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su gtong ba'i mtshan nyid de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan
390a6(nyi khri): nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gdung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/brtson 'grus kyi
390a7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa ni thub pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yang dag par sdud pa'i mtshan nyid/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de/de dag ni de
390b1(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//bsam gtan ba ni dang chad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dag na mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid de/
390b2(nyi khri): dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med
390b3(nyi khri): par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid ni dben pa'i mtshan nyid do//de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rnam par thar
390b4(nyi khri): pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i mtshan nyid de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa ni sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid
390b5(nyi khri): de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rnam par thar pa rnams ni 'grel pa'i mtshan nyid de/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par
390b6(nyi khri): rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//stobs rnams ni shin tu rnam par gdon mi za ba'i mtshan nyid/mi 'jigs pa rnams ni shin tu brtan pa'i mtshan nyid/so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yongs su mi chod pa'i
390b7(nyi khri): mtshan nyid/byams pa chen po ni phan par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid/snying rje chen po ni skyob pa'i mtshan nyid/dga' ba chen po ni rab tu dga' ba'i mtshan nyid/btang snyoms chen po ni ma 'dres pa'i mtshan
391a1(nyi khri): nyid/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi 'phrogs pa'i mtshan nyid de/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so///
391a2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid de/de ni de bzhin gshegs pas mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//lha'i bu dag de ltar de bzhin
391a3(nyi khri): gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/de'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pa ni chags pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes can zhes bya'o//de nas bcom
391a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig/
391a5(nyi khri): rten ston pa'o//de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di la brten cing rnam par spyod do//chos
391a6(nyi khri): de la rim gror mdzad cing mchod pa mdzad do//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de bzhin gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang bkur sti mdzad pa dang bsti stang mdzad pa dang /mchod pa mdzad po de ni chos
391a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa ste/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las byung ste/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
391b1(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa mkhyen pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni byas pa dgongs pa'o//rab 'byor gang la la zhig yang dag par smra bas byas pa shes shing
391b2(nyi khri): byas pa dran pa'o zhes smra na/de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa dgongs pa'o zhes yang dag par slu bas/yang dag par smra'o//rab 'byor ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pas byas pa mkhyen cing byas pa
391b3(nyi khri): dgongs pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gang gis byon pa dang /lam gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
391b4(nyi khri): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i theg pa de nyid dang lam de nyid la/de bzhin gshegs pa rim gro mdzad pa dang /bkur sti mdzad pa dang bsti stang mdzad pa dang mchod pa mdzad pa dang /yongs su bsrung ba mdzad pa'i
391b5(nyi khri): phyir te/rab 'byor de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang /byas pa dgongs par blta'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la brten te/byed pa po med pa'i
391b6(nyi khri): phyir/chos thams cad ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//lus med pa'i phyir ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so//rab 'byor de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
391b7(nyi khri): phyin pa la brten te/chos thams cad la bya ba med par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ni/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byas pa mkhyen pa dang byas pa dgongs pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
392a1(nyi khri): pa la brten te/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes byas pa med pa/chos thams cad la 'jug pa med pa'i brdas 'jug ste/rab 'byor rnam
392a2(nyi khri): grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed pa'o//'jig rten 'di ston pa'o//rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar chos thams cad la shes pa po
392a3(nyi khri): ma mchis shing /mthong ba po ma mchis na/ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing 'jig rten 'di ston pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de
392a4(nyi khri): bzhin no//de de bzhin te/chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o//rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa/gsog/gsog/dbang med pa/snying po med pa ste/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos
392a5(nyi khri): thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad ni shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med
392a6(nyi khri): pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mi gnas shing khongs su chud pa ma yin pa ste/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na chos thams cad shes pa po med cing mthong ba po med pa ste/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab
392a7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten 'di ston pa'o//de'ang gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mthong ba po med pa'i
392b1(nyi khri): phyir ston pa'o//skye mched dang /khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar na/shes rab
392b2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ji ltar na tshor ba dang /'du shes
392b3(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ji ltar na skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags/ji ltar na
392b4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mthong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du ston pa lags////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bzhi bcu drug pa//bcom ldan 'das kyis
392b5(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor nam gzugs la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/gzugs mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//nam tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la
392b6(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/rnam par shes pa mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//nam skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i
392b7(nyi khri): tshe/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//nam pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//
393a1(nyi khri): nam stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
393a2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge
393a3(nyi khri): 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la/
393a4(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dmigs pa'i rnam par
393a5(nyi khri): shes pa mi 'byung ba'i tshe/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mthong ba med pa'i phyir ston pa'o//rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten
393a6(nyi khri): ston pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor 'di la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten du
393a7(nyi khri): stong pa zhes brjod de/'jig rten du ci stong pa zhes brjod ce na/phung po lnga stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//skye mched bcu gnyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//khams bco
393b1(nyi khri): brgyad stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//pha rol tu phyin pa drug stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//
393b2(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun stong ngo zhes bya bar
393b3(nyi khri): 'jig rten du brjod do//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis
393b4(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo
393b5(nyi khri): rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
393b6(nyi khri): stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong ngo zhes bya bar 'jig rten du brjod do//rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed
393b7(nyi khri): cing 'jig rten ston pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston/'jig rten stong zhes bya bar brjod/'jig rten stong zhes bya bar shes
394a1(nyi khri): par byed de/rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs
394a2(nyi khri): pa la 'jig rten stong zhes bya bar ston te/'jig rten ji ltar stong zhes bya bar ston ce na/'jig rten na phung po stong zhes bya bar ston to//'jig rten na skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par
394a3(nyi khri): 'byung ba stong ngo zhes bya bar ston to//'jig rten na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi
394a4(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun stong zhes bya bar ston to//'jig rten na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
394a5(nyi khri): dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
394a6(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar ston to//'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po
394a7(nyi khri): dang snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong zhes bya bar ston to//'jig rten na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong zhes bya bar ston to//rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi
394b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston to//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston te/ji ltar
394b2(nyi khri): 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston ce na/phung po'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab
394b3(nyi khri): ces bya bar ston to//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar ston to//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/de bzhin gshegs
394b4(nyi khri): pa la 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston te/'jig rten ji ltar dben zhes bya bar ston ce na/phung po'i 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//skye mched dang /khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'jig
394b5(nyi khri): rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten dben zhes bya bar ston to//rab 'byor de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig
394b6(nyi khri): rten ston to//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ji ltar 'jig rten mtha' las 'ongs pa stong pa
394b7(nyi khri): zhes bya bar ston ce na/phung po'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar
395a1(nyi khri): ston to//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin
395a2(nyi khri): gshegs pa la 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston te/ji ltar 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/phung po'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//skye mched dang
395a3(nyi khri): khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//rab 'byor de
395a4(nyi khri): ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo
395a5(nyi khri): bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to/ji ltar 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston ce na/phung po'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//skye mched dang khams
395a6(nyi khri): dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ston to//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
395a7(nyi khri): ston to//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to/ji ltar 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston ce na/phung po'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar
395b1(nyi khri): ston to//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten zhi zhes bya bar ston to//rab 'byor gzhan yang shes
395b2(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa la 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston te/ji ltar 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston ce na/phung po'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//skye
395b3(nyi khri): mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'jig rten stong pa nyid ces bya bar ston to//rab 'byor de ltar na shes
395b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/de bzhin gshegs pa skyed cing 'jig rten ston pa'o//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'jig rten ji ltar ston ce na/ci nas kyang 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su'ang
395b5(nyi khri): mi 'gyur la/'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su'ang mi 'gyur ba de ltar ston te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang gis 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes su 'gyur ba 'am/'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes su
395b6(nyi khri): 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu med do//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis
395b7(nyi khri): mi khyab pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don dpag tu ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don gzhal
396a1(nyi khri): du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'don don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
396a2(nyi khri): pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas so//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /don
396a3(nyi khri): dpag tu med pa dang /don gzhal du med pa dang /don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so//rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin
396a4(nyi khri): zhen/rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don chen po ste/'di ltar sems can thams cad bskyab pa'i don dang /sems can
396a5(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'i don to//rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang /de bzhin
396a6(nyi khri): gshegs pa nyid dang /rang byung nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mo khyab ste/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
396a7(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so//rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin
396b1(nyi khri): zhe na/rab 'byor sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa la/gang gis sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bsam pa dang /dpag par nus pa/
396b2(nyi khri): de lta bu gang yang med de/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar
396b3(nyi khri): gnas so//rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang /rang byung nyid dang /thams
396b4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzhal du med de/sus kyang gzhol bar mi nus so//rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
396b5(nyi khri): rgyas rnams kyi don gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so//rab 'byor ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/rab 'byor de bzhin
396b6(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mnyam pas mnyam pa yang su yang med na/lhag pa lta ci smos te/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de
396b7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs
397a1(nyi khri): pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam gyis mi khyab la dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa lags sam/bcom
397a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni bsam
397a3(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab bo//rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang rang byung nyid dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dpag tu med gzhal du med de mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//rab 'byor
397a4(nyi khri): gzugs kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'ang bsam gyis mi khyab//
397a5(nyi khri): dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//skye mched rnams dang khams rnams dang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/
397a6(nyi khri): mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang bsam/
397a7(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni sems mi dmigs so//sems las byung ba'i chos rnams kyang mi/
397b1(nyi khri): dmigs so//rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa
397b2(nyi khri): bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
397b3(nyi khri): du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi dmigs so//rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'ang mi
397b4(nyi khri): dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu ma mchis gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du tshor ba dang 'du
397b5(nyi khri): shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis/gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du skye mched dang khams dang rten cing
397b6(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu ma mchis/gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
397b7(nyi khri): du bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu ma mchis/gzhal du ma mchis shing /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs
398a1(nyi khri): la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang
398a2(nyi khri): tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rnam pa
398a3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la'ang bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du gzugs la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang ched dang
398a4(nyi khri): mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags//
398a5(nyi khri): ci'i slad du skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
398a6(nyi khri): la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med tshad med/
398a7(nyi khri): gzhal du med la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir gzugs la bsam pa dang /dpag pa dang tshad dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam
398b1(nyi khri): par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mo khyab/dpag tu med tshad med gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rnam par shes pa la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshong dang mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa mi dmigs
398b2(nyi khri): so//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med tshad med/gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bsam pa
398b3(nyi khri): dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ngo bo nyid bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med tshad med/gzhal du med la/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste//
398b4(nyi khri): de'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bsam pa dang dpag pa dang tshad dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mi dmigs so//rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/gzugs gang bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med gzhal
398b5(nyi khri): du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la gzugs dmigs su yod dam/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gang bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam
398b6(nyi khri): pa dang mnyam pa de la tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dmigs su yod dam/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med gzhal du
398b7(nyi khri): med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su yod dam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med/gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa
399a1(nyi khri): dang mnyam pa de la/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dmigs su yod dam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de bas
399a2(nyi khri): na rnam grangs 'dis chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab dpag tu med/gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni
399a3(nyi khri): bsam pa dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//dpag pa dang bral ba'i phyir dpag tu med pa'o//tshad dang bral ba'i phyir gzhal du med pa'o//mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dang bral ba'i phyir/mi mnyam
399a4(nyi khri): pa dang mnyam pa ste/rab 'byor rnam grangs des na/chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med/gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
399a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//dpag pa las yongs su 'das pas na/dpag tu med pa'o//chad las yongs su 'das pas na gzhal
399a6(nyi khri): du med pa'o//mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa las yongs su 'das pas na/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o//rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba 'di ni bsam du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//rab 'byor
399a7(nyi khri): dpag tu med ces bya ba 'di ni dpag tu mi rung ba'i tshig bla dgas so//rab 'byor gzhal du med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i tshig bla dgas so//rab 'byor mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba 'di ni
399b1(nyi khri): mnyam pas mnyam pa med pa'i tshig bla dgas te/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab/dpag tu med/gzhal du med pa ste/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par
399b2(nyi khri): rab 'byor bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya ba ni nam mkha' bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro//dpag tu med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro//gzhal du med ces bya ba ni nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir ro//mi
399b3(nyi khri): mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir te/rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos de dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa dpag tu med pa/gzhal du med
399b4(nyi khri): pa/mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/de dag ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/bsam pa 'am dpag par mi nus te/de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhal du med do//sangs rgyas kyi chos
399b5(nyi khri): rnams ni gzhal du med do//de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /dpag tu med pa dang gzhal du med pa dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe//
399b6(nyi khri): dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//dge slong ma brgya phrag nyi shu nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//dge bsnyen stong phrag
399b7(nyi khri): drug cu dang /dge bsnyen ma stong phrag sum cu ni/chos rnams la rdul dang bral zhing dri ma dang bral ba'i chos kyi mig rnam par dag go//byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag nyi shu ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste/
400a1(nyi khri): de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u sum cu dum
400a2(nyi khri): no///de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni za ste/bcom ldan 'das shes rab
400a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni don chen po'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o//don ched ma mchis pa dang /don dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /don gzhal du ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o//bcom ldan
400a4(nyi khri): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor
400a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/don chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/don tshad med pa dang /don dpag tu med pa dang /don gzhal du med pa dang //
400a6(nyi khri): don mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga 'dus so//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
400a7(nyi khri): byin pa 'dir ni/nang stong pa nyid 'dus so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi 'dus so//yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
400b1(nyi khri): bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stongs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'dus so//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir ni 'phags pa'i
400b2(nyi khri): bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang //
400b3(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
400b4(nyi khri): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad 'dus so//rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
400b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'dir ni/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du 'dus so//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba srid brtan par gyur pa'i rgyal po'i dgos pa
400b6(nyi khri): 'am/yul gyi dgos pa gang ci'ang rung ste/de dag thams cad la blon po las su bcug na/de'i tshe rgyal po ni rgyal po'i dgos pa dang /yul gyi dgos pa la snying las chung zhing khur bor ba yin/rab
400b7(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi chos sam/rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang rung ste/de dag thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'dus te/
401a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni de dag gi bya ba byed do//rab 'byor de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/bya ba chen po'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu
401a2(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni/bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba
401a3(nyi khri): gzhal du med pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bya ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phyir nye bar gnas pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
401a4(nyi khri): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la yongs su 'dzin
401a5(nyi khri): pa med pa dang /mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o///
401a6(nyi khri): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /mngon par chags pa med par nye bar gnas pa'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol
401a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di gzugs la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ji ltar na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes
401b1(nyi khri): pa la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang /mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/ji ltar na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa dang //
401b2(nyi khri): mngon par chags pa ma mchis par nye bar gnas pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis gzugs gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/mngon
401b3(nyi khri): par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/chos gang yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /mngon par chags par byed pa'am/gang gis yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/mngon par chags par bya ba de lta
401b4(nyi khri): bu'ang mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
401b5(nyi khri): par shes pa gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba 'am/mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/chos gang yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /mngon par chags par byed pa'am/gang gis yongasasu gzung
401b6(nyi khri): pabar bya ba 'am/mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'ang mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
401b7(nyi khri): khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba 'am/mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'ang mthong ngam/chos gang yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /mngon par chags
402a1(nyi khri): par byed pa'am/gang gis yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'ang mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom
402a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba 'am/mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/chos gang
402a3(nyi khri): yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /mngon par chags par byed pa'am/gang gis yongs su gzung bar bya ba 'am/mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'ang mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das
402a4(nyi khri): de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yongs su gzung bar bya ba 'am/mngon par
402a5(nyi khri): chags par bya ba de lta bu mthong ngam/chos gang yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang /mngon par chags par byed pa 'am/gang gis yongs su gzung bar bya ba'am/mngon par chags par bya ba de lta
402a6(nyi khri): bu'ang mthong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor legaso legs so//rab 'byor nges kyang gzugs yang dag par rjes
402a7(nyi khri): su ma mthong ste/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin/yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar mi len to//rab 'byor ngas kyang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par
402b1(nyi khri): shes pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin/yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar mi len to//rab 'byor ngas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
402b2(nyi khri): byang chub kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin/yongs su mi 'dzin pas nye bar mi len to//rab 'byor ngas kyang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /thams
402b3(nyi khri): cod shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas yongs su mi 'dzin/yongs su mi
402b4(nyi khri): 'dzin pas nye bar mi len to//rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/gzugs la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//tshor ba dang /'du
402b5(nyi khri): shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par chags par mi
402b6(nyi khri): bya'o//yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam
402b7(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo
403a1(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ba
403a2(nyi khri): dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//
403a3(nyi khri): yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//sangs rgyas nyid dang /thams cad shes pa nyid
403a4(nyi khri): dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la mngon par chags par mi bya'o//yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i
403a5(nyi khri): lha'i bu dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/zab cing lta dka' lo//rtogs par dka' ba ste/mi rtag pa rtag pa'i spyod yul mo lag
403a6(nyi khri): bzhi zhing phral/mkhas pa dang /byang ba dang /yid gsal bas 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni sngon gyi rgyal po la bgyi ba gyis
403a7(nyi khri): pa'o//bcom ldan 'das sems can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mos pa de dag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'o//dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o//bcom ldan 'das gal
403b1(nyi khri): testong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir
403b2(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang rang sangs rgyas su gyur te/de dag thams cad la ye shes dang /spong ba gang ji snyed cig mchis pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zab mo 'di la gdugs
403b3(nyi khri): gcig tu mos shing bsams te/gzhal ba dang /brtag pa dang /dpyad pa nyid la/gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gdugs gcig tu mos pa de nyid ches legs pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro//de
403b4(nyi khri): ci'i slad du zhe na/de ni 'di ltar dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs
403b5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
403b6(nyi khri): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang brgyad pa dang
403b7(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /phyir mi 'ong ba dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gang ji tsam pa dang /spong ba gang ji tsam pa de ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
404a1(nyi khri): po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod par 'dus so//lha'i bu dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan cing
404a2(nyi khri): thos nas 'dri ba dang /bris nas lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa de dag ni myur du 'byung bar shes par bya'i/nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i
404a3(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba/mdo sde gzhan la bskal pa 'am/bskul pa'i lhag mar spyod pa de dag ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar
404a4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las phul du bya bo'i chos gang la/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang /rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir
404a5(nyi khri): 'ong ba dang phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bslab par bya ba dang /gang la de
404a6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bslabs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /mngon
404a7(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag rgya cher bstan to//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis ched du brjod
404b1(nyi khri): pached du brjod de/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/pha rol tu phyin pa chen mo ste/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/dpag tu ma
404b2(nyi khri): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab sa
404b3(nyi khri): de la bsgrubs shing /dang pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams byung bar gyur te/byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /brgyad pa dang rgyun tu zhugs pa dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /
404b4(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa rnams byung bar gyur te/byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/de la bslangs shing rang sangs rgyas rnams byung bar gyur te/byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur/de la bslabs shing byung
404b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu byung bar gyur to/byung zhing 'byung bar 'gyur yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'grib pa 'am
404b6(nyi khri): 'phel bar yang mi gda'o zhes nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod po'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan
404b7(nyi khri): gsum du g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ste/de dag shin tu'ang mi ring ba zhig tu phyin nas mi snang bar gyur to//'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni 'dod pa'i khams
405a1(nyi khri): su 'khod do//gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag ni gzugs yod pa'i khams su 'khod do//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas /
405a2(nyi khri): to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur zhing /gong du 'dri ba dang /'dzin pa dang /'chang ba dang
405a3(nyi khri): klog pa dang /kun chub par bgyid cing /tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par gyur pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems
405a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos ma thag tu mos shing zhum par mi 'gyur/yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur la/rmongs par mi 'gyur zhing the tsom mi za/nem nur mi
405a5(nyi khri): byed la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par mngon par dga' zhing /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas kyang yid la bya ba de dag dang bral bar mi byed la/yid la bya ba de
405a6(nyi khri): dadog 'gro 'am/'ong ngam/'grong ngam/'dug gam/nyal kyang rung ste/rtag tu rgyun mi chad par bsrung bar byed cing /chos smra ba'i gang zag de la 'ang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par 'brang ste/rab
405a7(nyi khri): 'byor dper na/ba brus ma be'u mi 'dor ba ltar/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i don du/nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mngon du
405b1(nyi khri): ma byas dran pas 'dris par ma byas/yid kyis rtogs par ma byas/lta bas khong du chud par ma byas kyi bar du chos smra ba de mi gtong na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
405b2(nyi khri): gang zag de ni mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas/mi'i nang du skyes pa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu des sngon yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
405b3(nyi khri): thos nas bzung ba dang /bcangs pa dang /bklags pa dang /kun chub par byas pa dang /tshul bzhin du yid la byas par gyur to//gong du'ang bris shing glegs bam du byas te/me tog dang
405b4(nyi khri): phreng ba dang /spos dang /byug pa dang /phye ma dang /na bza' dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan mang pos rim gror byas par gyur to//bkur sti dang /bsti stang dang /mchod pa
405b5(nyi khri): byas par gyur to//dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes te/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la'ang thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur bar lta'o//gsol pa/bcom
405b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di zos ma thag tu mos shing mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri ba dang /bris nas kyang lung 'bog pa dang /kha ton 'gyid
405b7(nyi khri): cing tshul ba zhon du yid la bgyid bgyid pa las yon tan 'di dag nyid dang ldan zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa las shi 'phos te/'dir skyes pa de lta bu 'i
406a1(nyi khri): rnam grangs mchis sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs
406a2(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag la bsnyen bkur byed byed pa las/de nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos ma thag tu mos par 'gyur ro//
406a3(nyi khri): mos par gyur nas kyang 'dri'o//bris nas kyang lung 'bog go//kha ton byed do//tshul bzhin du yid la byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
406a4(nyi khri): des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos so thos nas kyang bzung ngo bcangs so yongs su bcangs so//bklags so kun chub par byas so//
406a5(nyi khri): kha ton du byas so//tshul bzhin du yid la byas so//de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang /yid la byed pa de nyid kyis 'dir skyes pa'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
406a6(nyi khri): chen po dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang /skal ba mnyam pa las shi 'phos nas mi'i nang du skal ba mnyam par skyes na'ang /de ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe
406a7(nyi khri): na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngas ni/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su
406b1(nyi khri): dri ba dang /yongs su brtag pa byas pas de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'dir skyes par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi
406b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur sems zhum par 'gyur/sems
406b3(nyi khri): kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa po gang gis sngon gyi mthar bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
406b4(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thos nas kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
406b5(nyi khri): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
406b6(nyi khri): pa gang gis/sngon gyi mthar nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid thos nas kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
406b7(nyi khri): bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhon yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
407a1(nyi khri): gang gis/sngon gyi mthar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
407a2(nyi khri): 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
407a3(nyi khri): theg pa pa gang gis/sngon gyi mthar dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa da ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe//
407a4(nyi khri): nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis//
407a5(nyi khri): sngon gyi mthar yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag
407a6(nyi khri): brgyad pa thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum
407a7(nyi khri): par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/sngon gyi mthar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /bsam gtan
407b1(nyi khri): bzhi dang /tshad med pa bzhi dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i ma sbyang
407b2(nyi khri): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa
407b3(nyi khri): bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/
407b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byung
407b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang gis/sngon gyi mthar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du thos kyang yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas pa de ni/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
407b6(nyi khri): zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/nem nur du 'gyur/rmongs par 'gyur/sems zhum par 'gyur/sems kyi rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa' theg
407b7(nyi khri): pa pa gang gis/sngon gyi mthar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos nas yongs su ma dris/yongs su brtag pa ma byas te/nyi ma gcig gam/gnyis sam/gsum mam/bzhi 'am/
408a1(nyi khri): lngar rjes su ma 'brangs na/gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bde/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri zhing rtog pa dang /nyi ma gcig gam/gnyis sam/
408a2(nyi khri): gsum mam/bzhi 'am/nyi ma lhur rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i tshe/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'phrogs par mi 'gyur te//yongs su dri ba dang yang mi ldan par 'gyur ro//
408a3(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni de ltar yang 'gyur te/gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su ma dris/yongs su ma brtags/rjes su 'brang ba ma byas pa de ni/shes
408a4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mnyan pa la/de tsam gyi dge ba'i bsam pa dang /mos po skye bar 'gyur te/de ni bar bar mos shing bar bar mos pa med par 'gyur te/de ni ldam ldem gyi
408a5(nyi khri): blo des 'phrogs shing /shing bal gyi gzegs ma bzhin du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de ni/yun ring po nas theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa ma yin par
408a6(nyi khri): rig par bya ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma bzung ba'o//yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'o//rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
408a7(nyi khri): pa pa des no/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di'i lung ma mnos/kha ton du ma byas la/tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas te/des ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so//
408b1(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma bslabs so//
408b2(nyi khri): nang stong pa nyid la ma bslabs so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslabs so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la ma bslabs so//yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /rdzu 'phrul
408b3(nyi khri): gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /dbang po lnga dang /stobs lnga dang /byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ma bslabs so//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam
408b4(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par
408b5(nyi khri): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs
408b6(nyi khri): bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la ma bslabs so//rnam pa
408b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la ma bslabs so///shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po bzhi bcu bdun pa//rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems
409a1(nyi khri): dpa'i theg pa pa de ni/theg pa la gsar du zhugs par rig par bya ste/de ni dad pa tsam dang /dga' ba tsam dang /mos pa tsam dang ldan par zad de/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
409a2(nyi khri): phyin pa zab mo 'di bri ba 'am/klag pa 'am/lung 'bog pa 'am/kha ton du bya ba 'am/tshul bzhin du yid la bya bar mi nus so//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
409a3(nyi khri): 'am/rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri zhing lung mi 'bog pa dang /kha ton mi byed cing tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed la/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dis
409a4(nyi khri): gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
409a5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /nang stong pa nyid kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis gzhan lo phan mi
409a6(nyi khri): 'dogs pa dang /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar gyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
409a7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis gzhan la phan mi 'dogs pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
409b1(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par mi spyod/nang stong pa nyid dang mthun par mi spyod/dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
409b2(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar dang mthun par mi spyod/dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang mthun par mi spyod/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang mthun par mi spyod/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
409b3(nyi khri): dang mthun par mi spyod na/de ni gnas gnyis dang /sa gnyis po las gcig la gnas par 'gyur te/de ni 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di
409b4(nyi khri): ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ma bris ma bstan/kha ton du ma byas/tshul bzhin du yid la ma byas la/shes rab kyi pha
409b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'dis kyang pha rol la phan ma btags/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'ang mthun par ma spyad pas/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des gnas
409b6(nyi khri): gnyis dang /sa gnyis po de dag las gcig la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u sum cu bzhi pa'o///rab 'byor
409b7(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig par gyur la/de'i mi rnams shing ngam/shing dum mam/shing leb 'am/rgyal ba 'am/rol mi 'ju mi 'dzin na/rab 'byor mi de dag ni rgya mtsho chen
410a1(nyi khri): po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du ma phyin par dus byed par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor mi gang rgya mtsho'i dbus su gru zhig pa'i tshe/shing ngam/shing dum mam/shing leb bam/rkyal pa
410a2(nyi khri): 'am/ro la 'ju zhing 'dzin pa de dag ni rgya mtshor dus byed par mi 'gyur te/bde zhing nyams nyes med par rgya mtsho chen po nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par 'gyur te/ma nyes ma nyams par thang la
410a3(nyi khri): phyin par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dad pa tsam dang /dga' ba tsam dang /mos pa tsam dang ldan pa gang shes rab kyi pha
410a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
410a5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing mi rten pa dang /nang
410a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /
410a7(nyi khri): bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa rnams dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
410b1(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs
410b2(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /rnam pa thams
410b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi 'dri mi ston/kha ton du mi byed/tshul bzhin du yid la mi byed cing /mi rten pa de dag ni bar ma dor byang chub las nyams par 'gyur te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
410b4(nyi khri): ma thob par/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon du byed par 'gyur ro//rab 'byor gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
410b5(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i don du dad pa yod cing /bzod pa dang mos pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /dga' ba dang /spro ba dang /mi gtong ba yod cing /brtson 'grus ma gtong ba de ni
410b6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dri'o//lung 'bog go//kha ton byed do//tshul bzhin du yid la byed do//rten to//de ltar na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag
410b7(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dad pa yod de/bzod pa yod/mos pa yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa yod/spro ba yod/mi gtong ba yod/brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba yod pa yin te/de'i phyir shes ra
411a1(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims
411a2(nyi khri): kyipha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
411a3(nyi khri): dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad
411a4(nyi khri): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
411a5(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi
411a6(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su bzung bas bar ma dor nye zho med par nyan thos kyi sa las 'das/rang sangs rgyas
411a7(nyi khri): kyis las 'das te/sems can yongs su smin par byas nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
411b1(nyi khri): bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/bud med dam skyes pa la la zhig/bum pa ma bsregs shing /so ma btang bas chu bcu par sems na/rab 'byor bum pa de ni ring por mi gnas te/
411b2(nyi khri): myur du 'gyes shing 'jig par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni bum pa de so ma btang ba'i phyir te/de ni tha mar sa nyid du 'gyur ro//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
411b3(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag la'ang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir/dad pa'ang yod//bzod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yod//
411b4(nyi khri): lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/spo ba'ang yod/mi gtong ba'ang yod/brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod mod kyi/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /
411b5(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
411b6(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung /dran
411b7(nyi khri): po nye bar bzhag pa dang /yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /lam gyis yongs su ma bzung /'phags pa'i bden
412a1(nyi khri): pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
412a2(nyi khri): pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs
412a3(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis
412a4(nyi khri): yongs su ma bzung /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis yongs su ma bzung na/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bar ma dor nye zhor
412a5(nyi khri): 'gyur bar shes par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo/de dag gi bar mdor nye zho 'byung ba gang zhe na/'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/
412a6(nyi khri): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/skyes pa 'am/bud med la la zhig bum pa so legs par btang bas chu klung ngam/mtsho 'am/mtshe'u 'am/khron pa nas chu
412a7(nyi khri): 'chu na/rab 'byor chu 'chu ba de'i bum pa des ni bde bar khyim du phyin par rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la/bla na med pa yang dag
412b1(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir/dang pa'ang yod//bzod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yang /lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yang /dga' ba'ang yod/spro ba'ang yod/mi gtong ba'ang yod/brtsan
412b2(nyi khri): 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod la/de'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /brtson 'grus
412b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
412b4(nyi khri): gyis yongs su bzung na rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bar ma dor nyi zhor mi 'gyur te/mnyes ma nyams
412b5(nyi khri): par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/rgya mtsho'i gru ma bsdams shing zag lhan ma byas par
412b6(nyi khri): bcug ste tshul btung na/rab 'byor byu do ni zhig par 'gyur te/gru'ang logs shig/rdzas kyang logs shig tu song nas de ltar tshong pa de thabs la mi mkhas pas/gnod pa chen po dang
412b7(nyi khri): ldan par 'gyur zhing /rin po che chen po las yongs su 'phang bar rig par bya'o//rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bya
413a1(nyi khri): chub kyi phyir/dad pa'ang yod//bzod pa'ang yod/mos pa'ang yod/lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang yod/dga' ba'ang yod/spro ba'ang yod/mi gtong ba'ang yod/brtson
413a2(nyi khri): 'grus mi 'dor ba'ang yod mod kyi/de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi
413a3(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung /stong pa nyid thams cad kyis yongs su
