441a4(nyi khri): go cha de ni mthong ba po dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
441a5(nyi khri): rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab
441a6(nyi khri): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam
441a7(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shin tu med la/byang chub
441b1(nyi khri): sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid
441b2(nyi khri): dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha de'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni nang stong pa nyid dang 'brel ba ma yin
441b3(nyi khri): zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dngos po meng
441b4(nyi khri): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang
441b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems
441b6(nyi khri): dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni yang dag par spong ba dang /
441b7(nyi khri): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor
442a1(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
442a2(nyi khri): dang 'brel pa ma yin zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang 'brel pa ma yin te/de ci'i phyir zhe na/
442a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shin tu med la/byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'ang med pas/de'i phyir go cha de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'brel pa ma yin
442a4(nyi khri): zhes bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa gang dag sems can thams cad bdag cag gis yongs su mya ngan las
442a5(nyi khri): 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha bgos pa de dag gi go cha ni chos thams cad dang 'brel pa ma yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can
442a6(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba des/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bgyi ste/bcom ldan 'das sems
442a7(nyi khri): can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes go cha 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba'i gnas dang skabs
442b1(nyi khri): ma mchis te/de na gnas ma mchis so//de ci'i slad du nan/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa mtshams bcad de/sems can gyi don du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags su/
442b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor khyod kyis don gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gi cha 'gros shing shes rab kyi ra
442b3(nyi khri): byin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa des/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas gnyis su dogs par mi bya'o zhes spras/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa'
442b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po sems can nyi tshe nyung zad cig gi slad du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags/ye shes cung zad nyi che zhig gi slang du go cha 'tshal ba ma lags te/de ci'i slang du zhon/bcom ldan 'das
442b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i slad du ko cha 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
442b6(nyi khri): pos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi slad du go cha 'tshal to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa'
442b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos ni sems can nyung zad na tshe'i don du go cha bgos pa ma yin te/ye shes nyung zad nyi tshe'i don dugacha bgos pa ma yin gyi/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
443a1(nyi khri): chen pos ni sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi don du go cha bgos so//gsol pa/bcom
443a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu zab pa ste/de ni sus kyang bsgom par mi bgyi/ci'ang bsgom par mi bgyi/gang du'ang bsgom par mi bgyi'o//de ci'i slad du zhe na/
443a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la gang bsgom pa 'am/gang bsgom par bgyi ba'am/gang gis bsgom par bgyi ba'i chos gang yang yongs su grub pa dmigs su
443a4(nyi khri): ma mchis te/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni nam mkha' bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni chos
443a5(nyi khri): thams cad bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu
443a6(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgom pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de ni bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan
443a7(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de gang bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa yin/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi
443b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed
443b2(nyi khri): dang /rnam par shes pa bsgos pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel
443b3(nyi khri): 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste
443b4(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sems can dang /srog dang /'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang /byed pa
443b5(nyi khri): po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
443b6(nyi khri): phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brgyad
443b7(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol
444a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'i
444a2(nyi khri): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//
444a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
444a4(nyi khri): lam bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med
444a5(nyi khri): pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
444a6(nyi khri): dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom
444a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
444b1(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
444b2(nyi khri): pa 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir
444b3(nyi khri): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang /rang byang chub bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni rnam pa
444b4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha
444b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni gzugs bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du
444b6(nyi khri): byed dang /rnam par shes pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par
444b7(nyi khri): 'byung ba bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni bdag bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha
445a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa di ni/sems can dang /srog dang /'gro ba dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu dang /gang zag dang /shed can dang /shed bdag dang /
445a2(nyi khri): byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang /mthong ba po bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni pha rol tu
445a3(nyi khri): phyin pa thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/stong pa nyid thams cad bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab
445a4(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
445a5(nyi khri): pa 'di ni/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
445a6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi
445a7(nyi khri): sgo bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par
445b1(nyi khri): rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//rab 'byor 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
445b2(nyi khri): 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rab 'byor 'di
445b3(nyi khri): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir mi ldong
445b4(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha
445b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
445b6(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'
445b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid dang /phyi stong pa nyid dang /phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /dngos po
446a1(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par
446a2(nyi khri): bya'o//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
446a3(nyi khri): yongs su brtag par bya'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa dang /mthar
446a4(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /
446a5(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes gzungs kyi sgo rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//de bzhin gshegs
446a6(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
446a7(nyi khri): brgyad la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//rnam pa thams cad
446b1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la mngon par chags pa med dam zhes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su brtag par bya'o//phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
446b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/pha rol gyis smras pa dang pha rol gyis bstan pa la snying por mi blta 'am phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
446b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/pha rol gyi dad pas mi 'gro 'am/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
446b4(nyi khri): chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed pas 'phrogs pa ma yin nam zhe sdang bcas pa dang /gti mug dang bcas
446b5(nyi khri): pa'i sems bskyed pa'i 'phrogs pa ma yin nam/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i tshe/sbyin pa'i pha rol
446b6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
446b7(nyi khri): dang bral bar ma gyur tam/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar ma gyur tam zhes yongs su brtag par bya ste/
447a1(nyi khri): gal te phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang ba'i mi 'jigs mi dngas skrag par mi
447a2(nyi khri): 'gyur la zhum pa dang /yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /de'i yid phyir nur bar mi 'gyur te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par dga' la/thos nas kyang 'dzin
447a3(nyi khri): cing 'chang la/klog cing kun chub par byed de/tshul bzhin du yid la byed la/de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed na/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des
447a4(nyi khri): ni sngon gyi mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs su dris shing yongs su brtag pa byas pa dang /bzung zhing bcangs te kun chub par byas pa dang /tshul bzhin
447a5(nyi khri): du yid la byas par rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang
447a6(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur la zhum par mi 'gyur yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur zhing de'i yid phyir mi ldog la/thos nas kyang ched du 'dzin cing 'chang la klog
447a7(nyi khri): cing kun chub par byed de/tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'i phyir ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
447b1(nyi khri): zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur zhing /zhum par mi 'gyur yongs su zhum par mi 'gyur na/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
447b2(nyi khri): chen po des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ji ltar brtag par bgyi/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des rnam pa
447b3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di brtag par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
447b4(nyi khri): gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor stong pa nyid la
447b5(nyi khri): gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa la gzhol ba'i
447b6(nyi khri): bsam pa dang /nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /'gag pa med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med
447b7(nyi khri): pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /de bzhin nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /bsam
448a1(nyi khri): gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
448a2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin/rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan la gzhol ba'i bsam pa dang /sgra brnyan dang /smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas
448a3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rtog pa yin no////shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa//bam po
448a4(nyi khri): bzhi bcu dgu pa//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ltar stong pa nyid la gzhol ba'i bsam pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/
448a5(nyi khri): rtog par 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa dang /nam mkha' dang skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag pa ma mchis pa dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
448a6(nyi khri): mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang /de bzhin nyid dang /chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa nyid dang /bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang /
448a7(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang /rmi lam dang gzugs brnyan dang sgra brnyan dang smig rgyu dang sgyu ma dang /sprul pa la gzhol ba'i bsam pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
448b1(nyi khri): zab mo 'di la rtog par 'gyur na bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rtog pa lags sam/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la rtog
448b2(nyi khri): pa lags sam/skye mched dang khams dang rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rtog pa lags sam/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi
448b3(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa lags sam/'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang /bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
448b4(nyi khri): 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med/
448b5(nyi khri): pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa lags sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang so so//
448b6(nyi khri): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa lags sam/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa
448b7(nyi khri): lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gzugs la rtog pa ma yin no//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
449a1(nyi khri): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la rtog pa ma yin no//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rtog pa ma yin no//pha rol tu phyin
449a2(nyi khri): pa rnams dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog pa ma yin no//'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad
449a3(nyi khri): med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i
449a4(nyi khri): sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//de bzhin
449a5(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
449a6(nyi khri): 'dres pa rnams la rtog pa ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog pa ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
449a7(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni sus kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas/mngon par ma byas/gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/gang du'ang ma song /phyogs na'ang mi gnas/yul na'ang mi gnas gang
449b1(nyi khri): na'ang mi gnas pa ste/de la grangs mi dmigs so//'gro ba dang 'ong ba'ang mi dmigs so//gang la grangs mi dmigs shing 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mi dmigs pa de la ni gang gis kyang mngon
449b2(nyi khri): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te gzugs kyis ma yin no//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pas ma yin no//skye mched dang /khams dang rten cing 'brel par
449b3(nyi khri): 'byung bas ma yin no//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
449b4(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin no//nang stong pa nyid kyis ma yin no//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no//dran
449b5(nyi khri): pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis ma yin no//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang /byang chub kyi yan lag
449b6(nyi khri): rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas ma yin no//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyis ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gzugs nyid kyang rnam pa thams
449b7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid do//tshor ba nyid dang /'du shes nyid dang /'du byed nyid dang /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
450a1(nyi khri): bco brgyad nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
450a2(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
450a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten tsong 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
450a4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /stong pa nyid thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang
450a5(nyi khri): yin pa dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang /tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs
450a6(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan
450a7(nyi khri): ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad
450b1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa'o//de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa
450b2(nyi khri): chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig
450b3(nyi khri): pa'o//shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/le'u sum cu bdun pa'o////de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams
450b4(nyi khri): lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye ma dang /lha rdzas kyi me tog ut+pa la dang pad mo dang /ku mu da dang /puN+Da ri ka mang po khyer te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su 'thor bar gyur to//gtor
450b5(nyi khri): nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag bcol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//'khod nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod
450b6(nyi khri): pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams shes
450b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las 'di skad du gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par
451a1(nyi khri): shes pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid
451a2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad
451a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha
451a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nang stong pa nyid rnam pa
451a5(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad
451a6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o///
451a7(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
451b1(nyi khri): s+t+waM/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang chad med pa dang /gzugs meng ba'i rnams par 'jug
451b2(nyi khri): nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o//rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
451b3(nyi khri): dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
451b4(nyi khri): stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams
451b5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/
451b6(nyi khri): gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang
451b7(nyi khri): yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad
452a1(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa
452a2(nyi khri): dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
452a3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa
452a4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam
452a5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de
452a6(nyi khri): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su bar med do//dran pa nye bar
452a7(nyi khri): bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
452b1(nyi khri): yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang //
452b2(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med
452b3(nyi khri): pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med
452b4(nyi khri): cing gnyis su byar med do//rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon
452b5(nyi khri): par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen
452b6(nyi khri): po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su
452b7(nyi khri): byar med do//rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang sangs rgyas dang /byang chub sems
453a1(nyi khri): dpa' dang /sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su
453a2(nyi khri): med cing gnyis su byar med do zhes ston pa ni 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag
453a3(nyi khri): tu ma mchis la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma lags pa ste/zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bgyi ba ste/'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba'o//de
453a4(nyi khri): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/lha'i
453a5(nyi khri): bu dag gzugs nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs so//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa nyid rnam
453a6(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o//skye mched dang /khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
453a7(nyi khri): pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
453b1(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
453b2(nyi khri): phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//nang stong pa nyid rnam pa thams
453b3(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
453b4(nyi khri): pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o//yang
453b5(nyi khri): dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/
453b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid rnam pa
453b7(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o//rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam
454a1(nyi khri): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi
454a2(nyi khri): 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/rnam pa thams cad
454a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa
454a4(nyi khri): ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
454a5(nyi khri): pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams
454a6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang
454a7(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i
454b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
454b2(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
454b3(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /
454b4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
454b5(nyi khri): pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /
454b6(nyi khri): stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
454b7(nyi khri): nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i de bzhin
455a1(nyi khri): nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
455a2(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /
455a3(nyi khri): ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi
455a4(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//
455a5(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid
455a6(nyi khri): gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do//lha'i bu dag don gyi dbang de gzigs
455a7(nyi khri): pas de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las chung ba la thugs gzhol te chos bstan pa la gzhol ba ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar 'di lta ste/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi
455b1(nyi khri): chos byang chub 'di ni zab cing blta dka' la khong du chud par dka' zhing brtag tu med la rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin te/zhi zhing phra ba zhib mo mkhas shing rtogs pas rig par bya ba 'jig rten thams
455b2(nyi khri): cad kyis yid ches par dka' ba ste/de ni sus kyang mngon par sangs ma rgyas nam yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas/gar yang mngon par sangs ma rgyas te/gang la gnyis su kun nas rgyu ba med pa
455b3(nyi khri): de ni chos rnams kyi zab pa nyid do//lha'i bu dag nam mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag chos kyi dbyings zab pa'i
455b4(nyi khri): phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag yang dag pa'i mtha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag
455b5(nyi khri): mtha' yas mu med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag mi skye mi 'gag pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par
455b6(nyi khri): byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /rnam par byang ba med pa dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di
455b7(nyi khri): zab bo//lha'i bu dag mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po//lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//sems
456a1(nyi khri): can dang srog dang 'gro ba dang gso ba dang /skyes bu dang gang zag dang shed can dang shed bdag dang byed pa po dang /tshor ba po dang /shes pa po dang mthong ba po zab pa'i phyir
456a2(nyi khri): chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'dri zab bo//lha'i bu dag skye mched dang
456a3(nyi khri): khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod
456a4(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo lha'i bu dag nang stong
456a5(nyi khri): pa nyid zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag dran pa nye bar bzhag pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab
456a6(nyi khri): go//yang dag par spong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zab pa'i phyir chos
456a7(nyi khri): 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rnam par
456b1(nyi khri): thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi
456b2(nyi khri): sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zab pa'i phyir chos
456b3(nyi khri): 'di zab bo//lha'i bu dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo//lho'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten thams cad kyis yid ches
456b4(nyi khri): par dka' ba'i chos bstan pa ni ngo mtshar to//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/tshor ba dang 'du
456b5(nyi khri): shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa
456b6(nyi khri): ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
456b7(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
457a1(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
457a2(nyi khri): dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags mi bzung ba'i slad du ma lags chos zab mo 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
457a3(nyi khri): 'bras bu gzung ba'i slad du bstan pa ma lags mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang
457a4(nyi khri): chub dang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzung ba'i slad du bstan po ma lags/mi gzung ba'i slad du ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das
457a5(nyi khri): 'jig rten ni bdag gi gzugs so//bdag ni gzugs can no//bdag ni tshor ba'o//bdag gis tshor bar bya'o//bdag gi 'du shes so//bdag ni 'du shes can no//bdag
457a6(nyi khri): gi 'du byed do//bdag gis mngon par 'du bya'o//bdag gi rnam par shes pa'o//bdag gis rnam par shes par bya'o//bdag gi skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel
457a7(nyi khri): par 'byung ba'o//bdag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos can no//bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par
457b1(nyi khri): bya'o//bdag gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bdag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//bdag gi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bdag gis
457b2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//bdag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bdag gis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//bdag
457b3(nyi khri): gi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bdag gis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//bdag giso shes rab kyi pha
457b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//bdag gi nang stong pa nyid do//bdag gis nang stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o//bdag gi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ro//
457b5(nyi khri): bdag gis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la goms par bya'o//bdag gi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'o//bdag gis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la spyad par bya'o//bdag gi yang dag par
457b6(nyi khri): spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o//bdag gis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
457b7(nyi khri): la spyad par bya'o//bdag gi 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i
458a1(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo'o//bdag gis
458a2(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo la spyad par bya'o//bdag gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos
458a3(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa'o//bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la spyad par bya'o//bdag gi rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o//bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs par 'gyur ro//bdag gi lan
458a4(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bdag ni lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ro//bdag gi phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o//bdag ni phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro//bdag gi dgra bcom
458a5(nyi khri): pa nyid do//bdag ni dgra bcom par 'gyur ro//bdag gi rang byang chub bo bdag ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//bdag gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do//bdag ni
458a6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro zhes bgyi bar 'dzin pa la spyod do//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/lha'i bu dag
458a7(nyi khri): chos 'di ni gzugs gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/mi
458b1(nyi khri): gzung ba'i phyir ma yin skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
458b2(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i
458b3(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin ma gzung ba'i phyir
458b4(nyi khri): ma yin mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos
458b5(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin/mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir bstan pa ma yin mi gzung ba'i phyir ma yin no//lha'i bu dag
458b6(nyi khri): gang yang gzugs gzung ba'i phyir ram/mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang skye mched dang
458b7(nyi khri): khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gzung ba'i phyir rim mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
459a1(nyi khri): cu rtsa bdun gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam
459a2(nyi khri): par thar pa dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa gzung ba'i phyir ram/mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang mngon
459a3(nyi khri): par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang
459a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du gzung ba'i phyir ram mi gzung ba'i phyir spyod pa de dag
459a5(nyi khri): gis ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan
459a6(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par mi nus so//nang stong pa nyid bsgom par mi nus so//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bor du bsgom par mi
459a7(nyi khri): nus so//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bsgom par mi nus so//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan
459b1(nyi khri): lag rnams dang /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par mi nus so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom par mi nus so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
459b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni chos thams cad dang rjes su mthun pa ste chos 'di ni chos gang rnams dang rjes su mthun pa lags she na/chos 'di ni shes
459b3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /tshul
459b4(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni nang stong pa nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
459b5(nyi khri): kyi bar dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang
459b6(nyi khri): po rnams dang /stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang /
459b7(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa
460a1(nyi khri): dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang mi 'jigs
460a2(nyi khri): pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni rnam pa thams cad
460a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dang rjes su mthun pa'o//chos 'di ni gang la'ang thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ci la thogs pa ma mchis she na/gzugs la thogs pa ma mchis so//tshor
460a4(nyi khri): ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa la thogs pa ma mchis so//skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la thogs pa ma mchis so//pha rol tu phyin pa
460a5(nyi khri): thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la thogs pa ma mchis so//'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang /tshad med pa dang /
460a6(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa
460a7(nyi khri): la thogs pa ma mchis so//mngon par shes pa rnams dang /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs//
460b1(nyi khri): pa rnams dang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang /byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la thogs pa ma mchis so//rnam pa thams
460b2(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la thogs pa ma mchis so//chos 'di ni nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid dang de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha'
460b3(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid dang /skye ba ma mchis pa dang /'gag/
460b4(nyi khri): pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang /rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi slad du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do//chos
460b5(nyi khri): 'di ni gzugs kyi skye ba mi dmigs pa dang tshor ba dang /'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung
460b6(nyi khri): ba'i skye ba ma dmigs pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi skyo ba mi dmigs pa dang /'phags pa'i bden
460b7(nyi khri): pa dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang
461a1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /
461a2(nyi khri): mi 'jigs pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa dang /byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i skye ba mi dmigs pa dang /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
461a3(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mi dmigs pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o//chos 'di ni gzugs kyi rten mi dmigs pa dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i rten
461a4(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa dang skye mched dang khams dang rton cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rten mi dmigs pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
461a5(nyi khri): cu rtsa bdun gyi rten mi dmigs pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas
461a6(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo dang /
461a7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa dang byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rten mi dmigs pa dang
461b1(nyi khri): nam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du rten ma mchis pa'o//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis/bcom
461b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su skyes so//de ci'i slad du zhe na/'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ci dang ci ston pa de thams/
461b3(nyi khri): cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing ston to//mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing ston to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs
461b4(nyi khri): yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes zer ba ni
461b5(nyi khri): ji ltar rjes su skyes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa yin zhe na/gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su skyes pa ste/
461b6(nyi khri): ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ma 'ongs ma song ba de bzhin du/gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma 'ongs ma song bas na/thog ma nas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin
461b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de'o//chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
462a1(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang de ste/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de'ang de bzhin nyid ma yin no//de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs
462a2(nyi khri): pa'i rjes su skyes so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ji lta ba de bzhin du/gnas brtan rab 'byor gnas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so//ji ltar de bzhin
462a3(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ji ltar de
462a4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ci la'ang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ci la'ang thogs pa med de/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang
462a5(nyi khri): yin pa dang /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig cing gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med la de bzhin nyid de'ang ma byas pa ste/de bzhin nyid de ni/
462a6(nyi khri): gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang med de de bzhin nyid de ni gang gi de bzhin nyid du ma gyur pa yang med pa de'i phyir de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa ste de ltar
462a7(nyi khri): na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med
462b1(nyi khri): pa ste/de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du 'gyur ba med cing rnam par rtog pa med la/ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid tha mo dad pa/dbyer
462b2(nyi khri): med pa 'byed pa ma yin pa dmigs su med pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang tha mi dad pa dbyer med pa/'byed pa ma yin pa dmigs su med pa ste/de ltar na gan so
462b3(nyi khri): brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so//ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gud na yod pa ma yin te/de'ang de bzhin/
462b4(nyi khri): nyid ma yin pa ma yin zhing rtag tu de bzhin nyid yin pa de bzhin du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyang rnam pa gzhan ma yin par de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes kyang gar yang rjes su skyes pa med
462b5(nyi khri): pa ste/de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so//de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so zhes bya ste/'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid
462b6(nyi khri): kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do//ma 'ongs pa'i
462b7(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa
463a1(nyi khri): nyid do//da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis
463a2(nyi khri): mnyam pa nyid kyis/da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid do//de ltar na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid
463a3(nyi khri): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis gzugs kyi de
463a4(nyi khri): bzhin nyid do//de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang
463a5(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de ltar na rnam par
463a6(nyi khri): shes pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//skye mched dang /khams dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de
463a7(nyi khri): bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung/
463b1(nyi khri): ba'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
463b2(nyi khri): nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid de de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid//
463b3(nyi khri): de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi
463b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de
463b5(nyi khri): bzhin nyid de de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de
463b6(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar na nang stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
463b7(nyi khri): nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
464a1(nyi khri): bzhin nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
464a2(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
464a3(nyi khri): bzhin nyid kyis dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su
464a4(nyi khri): med de gnyis su byar med do//yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang /
464a5(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i
464a6(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid de de ltar na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//'phags pa'i bden
464a7(nyi khri): pa rnams dang bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
464b1(nyi khri): par 'jug pa dgu dang /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin
464b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/de ltar na mngon par shes pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la
464b3(nyi khri): gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//ting nge 'dzin rnams dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /so so yang
464b4(nyi khri): dag par rig pa rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas
464b5(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de/de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su
464b6(nyi khri): byar med do//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do//de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
464b7(nyi khri): kyi de bzhin nyid de/de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//'di ni rab 'byor de bzhin
465a1(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin nyid de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya
465a2(nyi khri): ba'i ming thob par 'gyur ro//de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/g.yos so rab tu g.yos so///
465a3(nyi khri): kun tu g.yos so//'gul to rab tu 'gul to kun tu 'gul to//ldeg go rab tu ldeg go kun tu ldeg go//chem chem rab tu chem chem kun tu chem chem mo//'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur
465a4(nyi khri): kun tu 'ur 'ur ro//shig shig rab tu shig shig kun tu rab tu shig shig go/shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma'/shar phyogs dma' na ni nub phyogs mtho//byang phyogs mtho na ni
465a5(nyi khri): lho phyogs dma'/byang phyogs dma' na ni lho phyogs mtho//dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma'/dbus dma' na ni mtha' mtho bar gyur to//de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /gzugs
465a6(nyi khri): yod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang gnas brtan rab 'byor la lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye mas gtor/mngon par gtor/rab tu gtor nas/'di skad du
465a7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa ngo mtshar to zhes tshig tu brjod do//de nas
465b1(nyi khri): gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi gtam de nyid kyi rgyud nas bzung ste/lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//de ltar lha'i bu dag gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gzugs kyi rjes su
465b2(nyi khri): ma skyes/gzugs las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//tshor ba dang 'du shes
465b3(nyi khri): dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i rjes su ma skyes rnam par shes pa las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin
465b4(nyi khri): nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//skye mchod dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rjes su ma skyes rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//rten cing
465b5(nyi khri): 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /stong pa nyid thams
465b6(nyi khri): cad dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad
465b7(nyi khri): dang /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs
466a1(nyi khri): kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang byams pa chen po dang /snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas
466a2(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rjes su ma skyes/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid
466a3(nyi khri): kyi rjes su ma skyes/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi rjes su ma skyes rnam pa
466a4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid las
466a5(nyi khri): gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//'dus byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/'dus byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/'dus byas kyi de
466a6(nyi khri): bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//'dus ma byas kyi rjes su ma skyes/'dus ma byas las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes
466a7(nyi khri): 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan gyi rjes su ma skyes so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar gang rjes su skyes pa dang gang gis rjes su skyes pa dang /gang rjes su bskyed pa dang
466b1(nyi khri): gang gis rjes su bskyed pa dang /gang rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'am/gang gis rjes su skye bar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA
466b2(nyi khri): radwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /chos nyid dang
466b3(nyi khri): chos kyi dbyings dang /chos kyi gnas nyid dang /chos skyon med pa dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni zab pa ste/de la gzugs mi dmigs/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/
466b4(nyi khri): gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa mi dmigs/rnam
466b5(nyi khri): par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/skye mched dang khams dang rten
466b6(nyi khri): cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
466b7(nyi khri): de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
467a1(nyi khri): bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
467a2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dang /mtshan me med pa dang /smon pa med pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs kyi sgo dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi
467a3(nyi khri): 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mi dmigs/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs
467a4(nyi khri): te/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
467a5(nyi khri): bar du mi dmigs/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de
467a6(nyi khri): bzhin nyid dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te de bzhin nyid 'di ni zab pa ste/de la gzugs
467a7(nyi khri): mi dmigs gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/gzugs nyid kyang mi dmigs na/gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de la tshor ba dang /'du shes
467b1(nyi khri): dang /'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnams mi dmigs/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid
467b2(nyi khri): lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/skye mched dang khams dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rten cing 'brel pa
467b3(nyi khri): 'byung ba nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang stong pa nyid thams cad dang /byang chub kyi
467b4(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nyid kyang mi dmigs na/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
467b5(nyi khri): nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid mi dmigs te/rnam pa
467b6(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi de bzhin nyid lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur/de bzhin nyid dang ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin
467b7(nyi khri): pa de bzhin nyid kyi le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe/dge slong nyis brgya nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo//dge slong ma lnga brgya ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med/
468a1(nyi khri): cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong dang /lha dang mi rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo//byang chub sems dpa'
468a2(nyi khri): yongs su nyams pa'i chos can drug cu ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol te/shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis ni sangs
468a3(nyi khri): rgyas lnga brgya bsnyen bkur te thams cad du'ang sbyin pa byin/tshul khrims bsrungs bzod pa bsgoms/brtson 'grus brtsams/bsam gtan bsgrubs/shes rab bsgoms kyang
468a4(nyi khri): de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bas/sbyin pa byin no//'di ni sbyin pa'o//'di la bdag gis sbyin par bya'o//
468a5(nyi khri): 'di ni tshul khrims so//bdag gis ni bsrung bar bya'o//'di ni bzod pa'o//bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o//'di ni brtson 'grus so//bdag gis ni brtsam par bya'o//
468a6(nyi khri): 'di ni bsam gtan no//bdag gis ni mnyam par bzhag par bya'o//'di ni shes rab bo//bdag gis ni bsgom par bya'o//zhes tha dad par spyod pas de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
468a7(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung bar sbyin pa gtong /tshul khrims bsrung /bzod pa bsgom/brtson 'grus brtsom/bsam gtan la mnyam par
468b1(nyi khri): bzhog/shes rab la goms par byed cing /de dag 'du shes sna tshogs kyis spyod pas tha mi dad pas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par ma zhugs so//de dag
468b2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi zhugs pas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob/dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du thob bo//shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
468b3(nyi khri): kyi lam stong pa nyid dam mtshan ma med pa 'am smon pa med pa yod mod kyi/de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su ma bzung na yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du
468b4(nyi khri): byas nas/nyan thos sam/rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la
468b5(nyi khri): bsgom du 'dra'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du bgyis shing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur la/byang
468b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung ba dag ni/stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /smon pa ma mchis pa'i chos de dag nyid la bsgom du bas kyang /thabs/
468b7(nyi khri): mkhas pa la brten cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la kha
469a1(nyi khri): cig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang bral ba/stong pa nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos 'ba' zhig bsgom pa ni thabs mkhas pa
469a2(nyi khri): ma thob pas nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro//shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral
469a3(nyi khri): ba rnams ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la bsgom zhing thabs mkhas pa thob pas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug cing bla na med pa
469a4(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/bya zhig la lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am
469a5(nyi khri): dpag tshad sum brgya pa 'om/dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa'am/dpag tshad lnga brgya pa zhig yod la/de sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas 'dir 'ong bar 'dod la/bya de la'ang 'dab
469a6(nyi khri): ma med pa zhig ste/de 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas so snyam nas/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas bdag nyid mchongs te/gal te bya des lam nas ga re bdag gis sum cu rtsa
469a7(nyi khri): gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/bya des phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris su gnas par nus sam gsol pa/
469b1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gal te lam nas 'di snyam du ma la bdag gis ci nas kyang ma smas ma snad par 'dzam bu'i gling du 'dug par
469b2(nyi khri): bya'o snyam na/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la ji snyam du sems/bya de 'dzam bu'i gling du ma smas ma snad par 'dug par 'gyur ram/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//bcom
469b3(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni 'dzam bu'i gling du lhung nas smras pa 'am snang bar yang 'gyur/'gum pa 'am/gum la thug par sdug bsngal bar yang 'gyur ro//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan
469b4(nyi khri): 'das de ltar lus che la 'dab ma ma mchis pa de ni de ltar 'gyur du gdon mi 'tshal lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bskal
469b5(nyi khri): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa gtong zhing /tshul khrims bsrung /bzod pa bsgom/brtson 'grus brtsom/bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog cing /bla na med pa yang
469b6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir de'i smon pa'ang che/de'i sems bskyed pa'ang che/yongs su 'dzin pa'ang tshad med du zin kyang /shes
469b7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral zhing thabs mkhas pas yongs su mi bzung na/nyan thos kyi sa 'am/rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ngo //de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ni 'di ltar byang chub
470a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi ldan par sbyin pa byin/tshul khrims bsrungs/bzod pa bsgoms/brtson 'grus brtsams
